content.cn: 第5天，过滤装置的设计漏洞比我想象中还要严重……好在只有我接触到了内容物，这才过了多久，我已经感到大脑开始变得迟钝了……我不能让<@nar.mark>罗普</>也接触到它。这里的实验器材还勉强能用。只要我把漏洞修补好……<@nar.mark>罗普</>，等着我……
content.en: Day 5 - The filtration unit's design flaw is worse than I feared... At least I alone was exposed to the contents. Already, my mind slows like rusted clockwork... I must keep <@nar.mark>Ropp</> from touching it. These battered lab tools will suffice. Just need to patch the breach... <@nar.mark>Hold on, Ropp</>...

content.cn: 第19天，我很难掌握自己现在的身体状况……侵蚀偷走了我的时间……我有时能看到一些影子，像是<@nar.mark>罗普</>，也像是我自己，但当我触碰他们时就会消失殆尽。仿佛那些记忆正在逐渐离我远去……我不想忘记这一切，我修改了保险柜的密码，提醒自己不要忘记自己的责任……还有他……
content.en: Day 19 - I can no longer gauge my own deterioration... The Blight steals time itself. Phantoms flicker at the edges of vision: sometimes <@nar.mark>Ropp</>, sometimes a shadow that might've been me. They dissolve at my touch. My memories bleed away like sieve-held water... I rewrote the safe's code. A failsafe against forgetting: Remember the duty. Remember him.

content.cn:
第173天，我……要做什么来着？对了……处理过滤装置的设计漏洞……但是，为什么呢？想不起来了……这本日记上写了很多事情，试验……还有叫<@nar.mark>罗普</>的人……
设计漏洞似乎已经解决了……那我接下来要做什么呢？
content.en:
Day 173 - I... what was I meant to do? Ah yes. The filtration unit's flaw... but why? The reason slips through my fingers. These pages speak of experiments... someone named <@nar.mark>Ropp</>... 
The schematics seem corrected now. Then what... what remains?

content.cn: 一个很坚强很可爱很伟大很甜头发很蓬松发质很好的女孩子！
content.en: She's such a nice girl! She's strong and cute and powerful and sweet and got a beautiful head of smooth and fluffy hair!

content.en: Be strong! Miss Gilberta will never leave us behind!!!

content.cn: 本发明涉及一种净水设备。特别申明，本发明是具有侵蚀相关物质滤膜和上游污水贮水器的过滤装置。
content.en: Disclosed is a device using a water purification method. Specifically, a Blight material filter membrane and an upstream raw water storage container are used by the filtration device.

content.cn: 发明背景
content.en: BACKGROUND

content.cn: 目前市面上已在大规模应用的续流型稳定碳质和密闭滤膜的中小型过滤装置存在以下问题：低浓度侵蚀物质将会留存于稳定碳质和密闭滤膜之间，这样会阻碍水流正常通过该装置。为此，具有小型蚀质分离阀的过滤装置被研制出来。蚀质分离阀提供了从稳定碳质与滤膜之间的空间到装置外的通路。
content.en: Currently available medium to small continuous flow filtration systems of the prior art used in large scale employ a form of stabilized carbon and a hermetic filter membrane. However, the systems of the prior art have the following issue: low concentrations of Blight matter often remain in the space between the stabilized carbon and the hermetic filter membrane, and cause disruptions to water flow through this device. To solve said issue of the prior art, the application provides a filter device using a small Blight matter separator valve. Said small Blight matter separator valve creates a passage for a fluid to flow from the space between the stabilized carbon and the hermetic filter membrane to outside the purification system.

content.cn: 又有一段日子见不到她了……
content.en: Guess I won't be seeing her for a while again...

content.cn: 今天跑出来的数据不太对，也许不能按时休假了……还是尽量坚持一下吧！
content.en: The readings today don't look right. There goes my weekend... I'll just put up with this for a while longer!

content.cn: 深夜才出实验室。今天看不到几颗星星。
content.en: I left the lab really late in the night. Hardly saw any stars today.

content.cn: 突然怀疑，那种所谓的“美好生活”，真的会到来吗？
content.en: I suddenly began to doubt if the beautiful life would ever come true for me.

content.cn: 每天在实验室里昏天黑地地拉磨，实在太累了……
content.en: I spent countless days and nights slogging in the lab. I'm working myself to the bone...

content.cn: 好在离见面的里程碑不远了。加油！！
content.en: Thank goodness our milestone meeting is coming up. Keep it up!!

content.cn: 今天去二号园区开会，没有去找她。但当我来到熟悉的地方时，她仍在等着我……
content.en: I had a meeting at Park 2 today and didn't seek her out. But when I passed by that familiar place, she was still there, waiting for me.

content.cn: 人们面对感动的事物时，突然哑口无言的现象，叫什么来着？
content.en: What's that word again for describing that speechless feeling you get when seeing something moving?

content.cn: 她在灯光下远远地望着我……微笑着。
content.en: She just stood in the distance beneath the light ... and smiled as she gazed at me.

content.cn: 项目结束以后，我会把该说的话都告诉她。
content.en: Once the project is over, I'll tell her everything that needs to be said.

content.cn: 她说，她会等我。
content.en: She said she'll wait for me.

content.cn: 我听说……
content.en: I heard...

content.cn: 事情过去这么久了，我还是无法接受。
content.en: It's been a while already, but I still couldn't force myself to accept this.

content.cn: 这个冬天长得要命。
content.en: When will this blighted winter end?

content.cn: 我真的……
content.en: I'm really...

content.cn: 今天四号谷地的调职信来了。这里的一切都让我痛苦得想要尖叫，我要离开这里，我要开始新的生活……
content.en: The Valley IV re-assignment letter arrived. Everything at this blighted place cuts like razor and hurts like hell. I just want to leave this place and start a new life...

content.cn: 讽刺的是，他们选中我的理由，还是因为小美。
content.en: Funny thing is, Masie was the reason why they chose me.

content.cn: 就好像她在送我离开一样。
content.en: It feels as though she's the one who got me sent away.

content.cn: <@nar.center>火中的巨物啊——</>
content.en: <@nar.center>O colossus wreathed in flame —</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>你曾狂奔，烈焰如潮；</>
content.en: <@nar.center>You once raced across the earth, tides of fire in your wake;</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>你曾毁灭，万邦俱寂；</>
content.en: <@nar.center>You once wrought ruin, as kingdoms fell silent;</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>你曾高踞王座之巅，不服者，皆堕为焦炭。</>
content.en: <@nar.center>You once perched atop the throne of embers. All who defied you turned to ash.</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>灰烬散于雪原，昭示熔岩不熄。</>
content.en: <@nar.center>Cinders drift over the snowfields, a testament that the magma never dies.</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>我等虔诚信徒，跪于灰烬之上，于寒夜呼唤：</>
content.en: <@nar.center>We, your devoted, kneel upon these ashes, calling through the frozen night:</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>愿你从沉睡中苏醒，再度以灼世之名，清洗世间；</>
content.en: <@nar.center>Awaken from slumber, and once again scour the world in searing glory;</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>愿上古之炎重燃，让信仰与毁灭并存，永照万世。</>
content.en: <@nar.center>Let the ancient fires reignite. May faith and devastation endure as one, and illuminate the ages.</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>寒风吹灭星火</>
content.en: <@nar.center>Boreal wind snuffs out the last ember</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>战士的生命归于枯萎</>
content.en: <@nar.center>The warrior's life fades into withering silence</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>漆黑的树枝</>
content.en: <@nar.center>Charred branches</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>被积雪一层复一层地埋葬</>
content.en: <@nar.center>Lie buried, layer upon layer, beneath the relentless snow</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>来人步履蹒跚，眼眸闪烁着渴望。</>
content.en: <@nar.center>The figure staggers forward, eyes ablaze with yearning.</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>他伸出手，将剑紧紧握住——</>
content.en: <@nar.center>He reaches out, seizing the blade —</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>火沿着手臂攀爬，灼入皮肉，熔为一体。</>
content.en: <@nar.center>Fire climbs his arm, searing into flesh, merging with his form.</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>焚身之焰燃起，前所未见的力量涌入躯体。</>
content.en: <@nar.center>Flames of sacrifice ignite, unseen power flooding his veins.</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>仇敌在脚下哀嚎，化为匍匐的薪柴。</>
content.en: <@nar.center>Foes wail at his feet, reduced to prostrate kindling.</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>他以为支配了火，可火从不真正属于他。</>
content.en: <@nar.center>He believed he mastered the flame, yet fire has never been truly his to command.</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>沉睡的意志悄然苏醒，浸染躯壳，篡夺心智。</>
content.en: <@nar.center>A slumbering will stirs, seeping into limb and mind, usurping all.</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>当烈焰燃尽，持剑者颓然倒地，仅余劫灰。</>
content.en: <@nar.center>When the inferno fades, the wielder falls, only embers remaining.</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>残火渐熄，利剑蛰伏于冰冷的岩石，无声低鸣。</>
content.en: <@nar.center>Dying cinders cool, the blade lies dormant on cold stone, humming a silent dirge.</>

content.cn: <@nar.center>一切重归沉寂，静候下一个他的到来。</>
content.en: <@nar.center>All returns to silence, awaiting the next arrival.</>

content.en: <@nar.center>...Beyond portals guarded by the deathly kind, she continues to wait and bide...</>

content.cn: ……今时不同往日，由于文明环带近十年来在材料研究和抗侵蚀干扰技术领域的一系列突破，对侵蚀采取扫描、封锁、清除措施已不再是过于超前的幻想。
content.en: ...Times are now different. Breakthroughs in material science and anti-Blight interference technology achieved by Civilization Band scientists during the last decade mean that scanning, containing, and eliminating Blight masses in the field is no longer science fiction.

content.cn: 我们可以找到侵蚀区域的“最初接触点”，像解开线团那样解除它的威胁。当然，侵蚀扫描平台应当以何种形态被投放至怎样的应用场景，现在仍未有定论。但无论如何，假如某种技术能够允许我们在第一线、第一时间遏制侵蚀的危害，它就有被实现的价值。
content.en: We are now capable of locating a Blight patch's "origin of contact" and neutralizing it like untangling a ball of yarn. Although the exact form of the Blight scanner platform as well as the deployment and applicable scenarios thereof have yet to be determined, any technology that enables immediate, on-site control of the Blight is highly promising. It is a goal worth realizing.

title.cn: 工团大会预算申报宣讲草稿（第八版）
title.en: UWST Assembly Budget Proposal Briefing Draft (Version 8)

content.cn: 关于侵蚀扫描平台的具体设计，现在有两套原型方案。
content.en: We now have 2 design proposals for the Blight scanning platform prototype:

content.cn: 方案一：使用移动地块级别的重型平台搭载扫描设备，以地区为单位展开作业，扫描并清理侵蚀区域。
content.en: PROPOSAL 1: Load the scanner on a heavy platform on par with a nomadic city plate, and start scanning and clearing out Blight zones one region at a time.

content.cn: 方案二：反其道而行之，将扫描设备小型化，安装到轮式作业平台上去。
content.en: PROPOSAL 2: Miniaturize the scanner and mount it on a wheeled mobility chassis.

content.cn: 如果是后者，只需要一支行动小组，就可以深入侵蚀区域执行任务。伊冯这个想法很好，不过我有几个地方不放心：小型化会废弃许多功能，必须靠人力完成剩余操作；而且，把那台原型机缩小到轮式平台的尺寸可不容易，我担心目标设得太高，最后无法实现。
content.en: If it's the latter, a single field team would be enough to carry out missions deep inside the Blight zone. Yvonne's idea is solid, but I have a few concerns: miniaturization would mean sacrificing a number of functions, leaving the rest to be handled manually. Also, shrinking the prototype down to fit a wheeled platform won't be easy. I'm worried the objective might be overly ambitious and hard to pull off.

content.cn: P.S. 但伊冯还是把蓝图画好了。文件详见附件——千万别弄丢！
content.en: PS: But Yvonne drew up the blueprints anyway. See the attached files. PLEASE DON'T LOSE THEM!

content.cn: 原型机的完成度已经相当高了，不过伊冯坚持要给原型机定制一套辅助智能和表情交互界面。
content.en: The prototype is nearly complete, but Yvonne insists on adding a custom support AI and a facial expression interface to it.

content.cn: 这家伙显然有点太上心了。我问伊冯是不是还打算给原型机起个名字，结果真有一个！TA-TA，这到底是什么意思……
content.en: She's clearly getting way too invested. I asked Yvonne if she planned to name the prototype — turns out she already did! TA-TA. What is that even supposed to mean...?

content.cn: 希望那名字不是随手在键盘上敲出来的。总之，你要的零件也到货了，记得来拿。
content.en: Let's hope she didn't just smash the keyboard to get that name. Anyway, the parts you requested are here. Don't forget to pick them up.

content.cn: P.S. 接口参数详见附件——千万别弄丢！
content.en: PS: The port parameters are in the attachment. PLEASE DON'T LOSE THEM!

content.cn: （飞舞的手写体）你们记好了，TA-TA的全称是，全、频、超、域、抑、稳、自、动、机！
content.en: (Flamboyant handwriting) The full name of TA-TA is Trans-Æther Tranquilizer-Automata. MEMORIZE IT!

content.cn: ……纵使历经数次迭代，枢壤仪的性能仍远未达到预期。
content.en: ...Even after several iterations, the performance of the Xiranite Nexus still falls far short of expectations.

content.cn: 在武陵城长期面临息壤储备短缺的严峻现实下，庄方宜天师做出了艰难抉择：暂缓枢壤仪的开发，将其改造后，置于息壤炉中，作为稳定炉心、维系息壤生产的核心部件……
content.en: Faced with the harsh reality of long-term Xiranite shortages in Wuling City, Tianshi Zhuang made a difficult decision: pause development of the Xiranite Nexus and repurpose it as a stabilized core component within the Xiranite forge to maintain Xiranite production.

content.cn: 当被问及这一计划的停滞是否意味着某种遗憾时，庄方宜天师的回答异常简洁：
content.en: When asked if the stagnation of this plan implied any regret, Tianshi Zhuang's reply was remarkably brief:

content.cn: “是一人使得还是千万人使得，没什么好犹豫的。”
content.en: "Whether it serves one person or millions, the choice is clear."

content.cn: 阿吉画下了帮助难民暂居处的人们。笔触依旧很稚嫩，画中的笑脸越来越多了。
content.en: Ginny made a drawing of people who helped out the refugee camp. A typical drawing made by a child with many smiling faces.

content.cn: <image>Reading/collection_listen_record</image>
content.en: <image>Reading/collection_listen_record</image>

content.cn: 阿杜用斯托布传授的技术，编排运输机器人们跳了一支舞。这也许是他独创的道谢方式。
content.en: Dewey learned some techniques from Staub and got the logistics robots to perform a dance routine. Perhaps it's his special way to convey his gratitude.

content.cn: <image>Reading/reading_f1m4_can</image>
content.en: <image>Reading/reading_f1m4_can</image>

content.cn: 来自难民暂居处自行生产的第一批柑实罐头。对暂居处的人来说，它们有着特别的纪念意义。
content.en: From the very first batch of canned citromes produced by the refugee camp. This tin carries special meaning to the camp residents.

content.cn: 一切来得太突然了。侵蚀摧毁了营地，撤离途中，裂地者又突然出现了。
content.en: Catastrophe struck without warning. The Blight ravaged the camp. Landbreakers emerged from the wastes like blades through smoke.

content.cn: 他们什么时候胆子大到敢直接进攻工团的营地了？
content.en: Since when did they grow bold enough to strike directly at UWST?

content.cn: 奥莉加的伤势在加重，我必须省下能源，让她的辅助行动装置坚持到避难点。
content.en: Olga isn't getting any better. I must save energy to keep her Supporter device going till we reach the shelter.

content.cn: 帕维尔主动提出要帮我照看她，但我看得出来，他也快撑不住了。他年纪太大，经不起这种折腾。
content.en: Pavel offered to help look after her, but I can tell he's barely holding on. He's too old to withstand this kind of torture.

content.cn: 我们遇到救援队了！带队的是个年轻人，看得出经验不多，但人挺不错。
content.en: We've met the rescue team! The one leading the team is a young man. You can tell he doesn't have much experience, but he's nice.

content.cn: 奥莉加的情况终于稳定了，我们还拿到了一批补给。事情似乎开始往好的方向发展了。
content.en: Olga's condition has finally stabilized, and we've also received a batch of supplies. Things seem to be starting to take a turn for the better.

content.cn: 早上诺夫曼问我要不要放慢速度，我拒绝了。侵蚀还在持续扩散，撤离行动一刻都拖不得。
content.en: In the morning, Noffman asked me if we should slow down, but I refused. The Blight is still spreading continuously, we can't rest now.

content.cn: 奥莉加和帕维尔支持我的决定。我们仨走在队尾，互相照应——只要不掉队，就没问题。
content.en: Olga and Pavel support my decision. The three of us are walking at the end of the team, looking out for each other. As long as we don't fall behind, everything will be fine.

content.cn: 一批工团配发的常规设备，包括便携终端、防身用快捷施术单元、通用型号的源石电池组等。其中，三个通信设备遭到人为破坏，损坏痕迹清晰可辨。
content.en: A batch of standard-issue UWST gear, including handyterms, quick-cast Arts Units for self-defense, and universal Originium battery packs. Three comm devices show clear signs of deliberate sabotage.

content.cn: 应急委员会的各位同志：
content.en: Comrades of the Emergency Committee,

content.cn: 你们好。
content.en: Hope you are all well.

content.cn: 我郑重提出申请，请解除我“基建前站负责人”的相关职责，重新安排其他合适人选。
content.en: I write to formally request the removal of my duties as Infra-Station Chief, and that a more suitable replacement be appointed in my stead.

content.cn: 这段时间以来，我始终尽力履行岗位使命，带领同伴完成救援与建设任务。然而，个人经验的不足与判断的失误，已对集体造成不可逆的损失。我深知，无论出于何种理由，责任终究无法推卸。
content.en: These past weeks, I have striven to uphold my post - leading rescues, pushing for construction, doing all within my power. Yet my inexperience, my flawed judgments… they have cost us irreparably. No excuses can absolve such failure.

content.cn: 过去几日，我反复回想那次救援行动的每一个节点。我曾试图为失误找出合理解释，但最终我必须承认：我还不具备承担这份责任的能力。在关键时刻，我没能带回所有人，也没能为避难点的稳定提供最优解……
content.en: These last nights, I've replayed that fateful rescue in my mind, over and over. I searched for justifications, for some sliver of reason to soften the truth. But I cannot lie: I am unworthy of this responsibility. When it mattered most, I failed to bring everyone back. Failed to secure the shelter, to chart the best path…

content.cn: 根据管理员提供的新线索，失踪的三人仍存在一定的生还可能。目前尚未发现三人的遗体，无法确认他们已死亡。而那些获得他们设备的裂地者，似乎未曾与三人遭遇。
content.en: From the new leads provided by the Endministrator, there remains a chance the three missing souls yet live. No trace of their remains has been found to confirm their end. What's more, the Landbreakers that seized their equipment show no signs of having crossed blades with them.

content.cn: 我一直反复叮嘱巡逻队，务必留意关于三人的一切线索。事态稍有稳定后，我也曾亲自前往他们失踪的区域进行过数次勘察。然而，始终一无所获。唯一尚未彻底探察的地方是裂地者频繁出没的活跃区。但那里……他们不可能藏身在那种地方，而我也不能让巡逻队的队员去赌命。
content.en: I've drilled it into the patrols, scour every corner for even a scrap of clue about the three. Once things settled a little, I trekked back to where they vanished, combing the area again and again. Nothing. Not a single trace. The only spot left unplumbed is the Landbreaker hive, where those things swarm thickest. But… they couldn't possibly be hiding there. And I won't send the patrols in to play Russian roulette with their lives.

content.cn: 随着时间推移，我想他们生存的概率已经微乎其微。
content.en: As time creeps on, their chances of survival grow slimmer than a thread.

content.cn: 或许唯一的希望就是瞭望塔了。
content.en: Perhaps the only hope lies with the watchtower.

content.cn: 在维护旧设备的过程中，注意到有一台退役状态的老式信号基站，其核心模块依旧保存完整。其中包含三个辅助施术单元与一个主施术单元，完整性尚可，没有明显的被侵蚀破坏的痕迹。
content.en: While maintaining the old device, a decommissioned vintage signal base station was noticed. Its core module remains fully intact. It houses three Support units and one main Arts Unit, all in decent condition with no visible signs of Blight damage.

content.cn: 设备编号为“M-026G”，出厂序列匹配工团第二代野外作业支援设备，原本用于野外作业中的通信联络。
content.en: The device, numbered "M-026G," matches the factory sequence of the UWST's second-generation field operation support equipment, originally designed for communication and liaison during field operations.

content.cn: 主施术单元理论输出功率正常，可以正常使用。
content.en: The main Arts Unit's theoretical output power checks out.

content.cn: 辅助施术单元结构稳固，若进行模块隔离处理，理论上可单独驱动一道固定术式通道（如定点灼烧或屏障冲击）。
content.en: The supporting Arts Units boast stable structures. With module isolation, they could theoretically drive a fixed artifice channel independently - such as pinpoint incineration or barrier impact.

content.cn: 回路接口为早期的工团标准格式，可通过中继线与现有瞭望塔系统实现联动（需增加稳定器）。
content.en: The circuit interface follows the early UWST standard format, enabling linkage with the existing watchtower system via a relay line. Though a stabilizer must be added.

content.cn: 适配源石电池组扩展方案，有一定操作空间。
content.en: It accommodates an Originium battery pack expansion scheme, leaving room for maneuver.
Written by: ■■■■■■

content.cn: 协作单位：四号谷地应急委员会
content.en: Collaborator: Valley IV Emergency Committee

content.cn: 概述
content.en: Overview

content.cn: 在部署信号接收器进行全域扫描期间，系统于裂地者控制区域边缘捕捉到短暂异常信号，频率特征与失联工团成员奥莉加携带的辅助行动装置一致。因该信号极其微弱，信号特征仅维持0.7秒后即消失。
content.en: During the deployment of the signal receiver for a full-area scan, the system picked up a fleeting anomalous signal at the edge of the Landbreaker's controlled zone, its frequency signature matching the auxiliary operation device carried by Olga, the missing UWST member. The signal, however, was extraordinarily faint, its characteristics persisting for a mere 0.7 seconds before vanishing entirely.

content.cn: 详细分析
content.en: Detailed Analysis

content.cn: 信号特征编码：与工团第二代辅助行动系统编码结构高度匹配，编码匹配度达93.7%。
content.en: Signal signature encoding: Highly consistent with the coding structure of the UWST's second-generation Support operation system, with a matching rate of 93.7%.

content.cn: 来源位置：疑似信号位于四号谷地东北矿脉源区山道交汇点附近。该地为裂地者高频出没区域，地图标记为“不可通行”，但存在未被正式记录的小型裂谷与天然通道，具备短期藏匿的条件。
content.en: Source location: The suspected signal emanates near the mountain path junction of the northeastern Origin Lodespring in Valley IV. A hotbed for Landbreaker activity, the area is marked "impassable" on official maps - yet unrecorded minor rifts and natural passages weave through it, offering fleeting shelter for those in hiding.

content.cn: 信号状态：可初步判断为设备异常或自动回传机制，并非人工主动触发，应为持续性释放的设备信号。由于信号极其微弱，故未能捕捉到持续性的信号特征。
content.en: Signal status: Initial analysis suggests this is either an equipment anomaly or an automatic transmission mechanism, not manually triggered. It appears to be a continuously emitted device signal, though its extreme faintness prevented the capture of sustained signature patterns.

content.cn: 初步结论
content.en: Preliminary Conclusion

content.cn: 发出该信号的设备需要长期维护，虽然缺乏连续信号佐证，但本次侦测结果强烈表明失联工人中至少奥莉加仍存活。建议加装增幅器，继续捕捉该信号。
content.en: The device emitting this signal requires long-term maintenance. While there's no corroborating continuous signal, this detection result strongly suggests that at least Olga, among the missing workers, is still alive. It is recommended that an amplifier be installed to continue capturing the signal.

content.cn: 尸体发现于四号谷地枢纽区的002号临时仓库，呈半卧位，尸体的大腿、手腕能看到明显的割伤，腰部能看到较深刺伤，其致命伤位于脖颈，初步判断，死因为颈动脉遭利器切断后导致的大出血。死者护具几乎完好无损，四处伤口都在护甲缝隙。
content.en: Body discovered in temporary depot unit 002, Hub area of Valley IV. Positioned in a semi-seated posture. Clear slash wounds visible on thighs and wrists, with deeper stab wounds at the waist. The fatal injury is located at the neck. Preliminary assessment indicates death resulted from severe hemorrhage due to a severed carotid artery caused by a sharp weapon. The victim's protective gear remains largely intact, with all four wounds precisely targeting gaps in the armor.

content.cn: 我们过去掌握了一些碾骨氏族危险目标的情报，死者很可能是“断头台”盖比。他之所以被称作“断头台”，是因为他手中的大斧威力惊人，其威力或许足以劈开装甲车……这样的话，杀死他的人作战经验或许很丰富？一个手持利器、行动敏捷的高手，首先在盖比的腰部造成了重伤，让他几乎没有办法发力劈下大斧，然后攻击手腕，进一步止住他的攻击……最后是腿部，彻底断绝盖比的逃跑可能……
content.en: Based on previously gathered intelligence regarding high-risk targets within the Bonekrusher Clan, the deceased is likely "Guillotine" Gabbi. His moniker stems from the terrifying power of his great axe, said to be capable of cleaving even armored vehicles... Which suggests his killer must possess considerable combat experience? The attacker, armed with a sharp weapon and remarkable agility, first inflicted a severe waist injury, crippling Gabbi's ability to wield his axe, then targeted the wrists to further neutralize his offensive capacity... Then finally striking the legs to eliminate any chance of escape.

content.cn: 嗯……但这好像也有点说不通？
content.en: But ... something doesn't quite add up.

content.cn: 袭击者可以精准地刺入护甲缝隙，那么他一定能直接一刀封喉吧？一个在高速运动作战中的高手，为什么要额外刺出三刀？
content.en: If the attacker could precisely strike armor gaps, why not deliver a single, immediate killing blow to the throat? Why expend three additional strikes during high-speed combat?

content.cn: 我有一个猜测，袭击者或许是一位复仇者，所以他很熟悉盖比，熟悉他的防具和攻击手段，而并非自身战斗技巧高超。
content.en: One theory: the attacker may be a revenge-seeker. Someone intimately familiar with Gabbi's gear and fighting style, rather than a naturally superior combatant.

content.cn: 盖比替许多人做过事，杀人、绑架、抢劫……在聂菲斯还寂寂无闻时，盖比就应该已经受雇于聂菲斯了，他的仇人一定不少。
content.en: Gabbi served numerous leaders: assassination, kidnapping, robbery... He was likely employed by Nefarith long before she rose to prominence. The list of those holding grudges against him must be extensive.

content.cn: 这个裂地者只在后颈有一条清晰的伤口，除了尘土几乎没有沾染其他污渍。
content.en: This Landbreaker only has one clean wound on the back of the neck. Aside from dust, there's almost no other staining on the body.

content.cn: 他甚至没能来得及握紧武器，也许是第一个被伏击干掉的倒霉鬼。
content.en: He didn't even have time to grip his weapon properly. Probably the first unlucky soul ambushed.

content.cn: 箱子被巨大的力量摧毁，栏杆上有着细小的切痕。
content.en: Containers were smashed with tremendous force, tiny cut marks are found on the railings.

content.cn: 两处破坏应该不是来自同一种武器，持斧的裂地者在这里发生过激烈战斗。
content.en: The two types of damage likely came from different weapons. The axe-wielding Landbreaker clearly fought fiercely here.

content.cn: 尸体发现于四号谷地阿伯莉采石场的杂物存放区，呈半卧位，尸体的背部有大片电击伤，喉部有大片瘀伤，似乎有内出血，死因初步判断为触电导致的心脏骤停。
content.en: Body discovered in the depot area of Aburrey Quarry, Valley IV. Positioned semi-upright. Large electrical burn on the back, extensive bruising and apparent internal bleeding in the throat. Preliminary cause of death: cardiac arrest from electrocution.

content.cn: 对比内部资料，我可以确信，遇袭者是“鬼火”维奇尔，一名焰术师。碾骨氏族的焰术师应该算是一种历史悠久的“符号”。这些人只要全神贯注地举一会儿手，就能在火光里转移到另一处地点，十分灵活。
content.en: Cross-referencing internal files confirms the victim is "Will-o-Wisp" Vichir, a pyromancer. Bonekrusher pyromancers are practically historic symbols. These guys can focus, raise a hand, and teleport through flames with ridiculous flexibility.

content.cn: 这样看下来，维奇尔死在了对他最不利的位置，一处被高压阻拦网合围的区域……我几乎可以想象到灵活的维奇尔在围困中四处转移，但总是能被人追上的样子……
content.en: But here's the thing: Vichir died in the worst possible position ... trapped within a high voltage fence. I can almost picture agile Vichir blinking around while being systematically cornered...

content.cn: 等等……这反而有些不对劲……
content.en: Wait ... that's what doesn't add up.

content.cn: 维奇尔的尸体上只有喉部的瘀伤和背部的电击伤，他的身体上甚至没有任何钝器或利器伤害，这是为什么？
content.en: Vichir only has throat bruising and back burns, no blunt or sharp weapon injuries. Why?

content.cn: 难道袭击者没带武器？
content.en: Did the attacker come unarmed?

content.cn: 维奇尔和袭击者一同被围困在高压阻拦网之间，局势对两人一样不利……倒不如说对袭击者更不利一些，维奇尔毕竟拥有人数优势……
content.en: Vichir and the attacker were both trapped by the high voltage fence. A situation equally bad for both, or worse for the attacker since Vichir had numbers on his side...

content.cn: 维奇尔之死似乎只有一种可能，一位焰术师和敌人一起被围困在狭窄地形内，他的第一反应一定是立刻转移……这绝对在袭击者的计算之中，他凶猛且快速地击中了维奇尔的咽喉，打断了转移……能量被扼在体内，这也正是维奇尔内出血的原因……
content.en: There's only one plausible scenario. A pyromancer trapped in close quarters would instinctively teleport immediately. The attacker anticipated this: striking Vichir's throat violently and fast, interrupting the transfer... Energy trapped inside his body explains the internal bleeding...

content.cn: 这些裂地者集体倒在地面上，以一个奇怪的姿势对着房间。看起来像是在求着什么……而且他们似乎是被同时击杀的。

content.cn: 尸体发现于四号谷地矿脉源区的蚀崖观测站，呈卧位。除喉部一处深度切割之外，未见新鲜显著伤口，推测死因为过度失血和窒息导致的心肺功能停止。
content.en: Body discovered at the Blightcliff Observation Post in Valley IV, positioned lying down. Aside from a deep laceration at the throat, no other fresh significant wounds were found. Presumed cause of death: cardiopulmonary failure due to excessive blood loss and suffocation.

content.cn: 因为伤口出现在常见致命位置，我最初怀疑死者遭到了来自前方的弩箭狙击。但伤口的深度和宽度并不支持这个假设——从宽度看，那应当是一支巨大的弩箭，但即便事后被拔出，它也应该刺得更深，而非仅仅划破动脉。
content.en: Given the wound's location in a commonly fatal area, I initially suspected the victim was sniped by a crossbow from the front. However, the depth and width of the injury don't support this theory. Based on the width, it would have required a massive bolt, but even if removed afterward, it should have penetrated deeper rather than merely slicing the artery.

content.cn: 如果箭矢是从极限射程发射，已经耗尽了动能，几乎不可能在那种距离命中咽喉。目前来看，现场能发射如此箭矢的武器似乎只有死者手边的劲弩。
content.en: If the bolt had been fired from extreme range with depleted kinetic energy, hitting the throat accurately at that distance would be nearly impossible. Currently, the only weapon on-site capable of firing such a bolt appears to be the powerful crossbow beside the deceased.

content.cn: 我认为事实更可能是另一种：死者手持箭头完成了自害，随后将其丢弃。
content.en: I believe the more likely scenario is another: the victim used the arrowhead to inflict self-harm, then discarded it.

content.cn: 通过比对图片资料，结合现场态势，推测他很可能正是“血眼”撒萨罗，一位拥有许多忠诚追随者的重要氏族干部。他的拥趸均会携带黑色羽兽挂饰作为象征。
content.en: Cross-referencing image data and assessing the scene, it's speculated he may be "Bloodeye" Sazaro, an important clan cadre with many loyal followers. His adherents all carry black fowlbeast pendants as symbols.

content.cn: 但这就意味着，一位善战的领导者，因为不明原因选择了自尽，这一切甚至发生在碾骨氏族入侵四号谷地期间。
content.en: But this means a combat-capable leader, for unknown reasons, chose suicide... All occurring during the Bonekrushers' invasion of Valley IV.

content.cn: 虽然不打算同情他，但一位加害者这样死于加害途中，显然并不是常见的情况……
content.en: While I don't intend to sympathize with him, a perpetrator dying this way mid-harm is clearly not a common situation...

title.cn: 瑟斯顿的现场记录·矿脉源区

content.cn: 尸体被发现于四号谷地供能高地的变电室，呈仰卧位，尸体的腕部、背部、左胸、颈部、面部有多道伤口，致命伤位于心脏位置，死因可推断为心脏遭刺穿导致的大出血。另外，从血液颜色判断，割伤死者的兵器似乎淬了毒。
content.en: Body discovered in the substation of Power Plateau, Valley IV. Positioned supine. Multiple wounds on wrists, back, left chest, neck, and face. Fatal injury located at the heart. Cause of death determined to be massive hemorrhage from cardiac puncture. Additionally, based on blood discoloration, the blade used appears to have been poisoned.

content.cn: 他一定是“火山”查查！这可是个足够有名气的裂地者，或许连文明环带内部，不怎么了解裂地者氏族划分的人都听过他的名字，甚至在聂菲斯统合碾骨氏族前，他的名字才是碾骨氏族的代表。更重要的是，他其实很年轻。有传言说他甚至还不到三十岁，如果没有聂菲斯横空出世，他一定才是能统一碾骨氏族的人。
content.en: This has to be "Volcano" Chacha! A Landbreaker notorious enough that even people within the Civilization Band with little knowledge of clan divisions might have heard his name. Before Nefarith unified the Bonekrushers, his name was the face of the clan. More importantly, he was remarkably young. Rumors claimed he wasn't even thirty. Had Nefarith not emerged unexpectedly, he would likely have been the one to unite the Bonekrushers.

content.cn: 那么是谁杀了他，聂菲斯？但聂菲斯没必要用毒药……
content.en: So who killed him? Nefarith? But she wouldn't need poison...

content.cn: 更重要的是，尸体背部、左胸、颈部的伤口似乎都在尚未愈合的状态下，再次遭到了反复攻击。要知道这些伤口大部分被遮掩在了护甲下，单靠战斗中的敏锐观察是绝对没办法发现它们的。
content.en: Crucially, the wounds on his back, left chest, and neck appear to have been repeatedly attacked before they could heal. Most of these injuries were concealed beneath armor, which are impossible to detect through combat observation alone.

content.cn: 除非，袭击者本来就对“火山”查查足够熟悉。
content.en: Unless the assailant was already intimately familiar with "Volcano" Chacha.

title.cn: 瑟斯顿的现场记录·供能高地

content.cn: “火山”来联系了。
content.en: "Volcano" has made contact.

content.cn: 他想要武装、庇护所，还有更多通行权。显然，会有其他人加入他的计划。
content.en: He wants weapons, shelter, and more access rights. Clearly, others will join his plan.

content.cn: “火山”不符合我们的标准。企业的合作对象必须理解规矩什么时候应该存在，什么时候不应该，而不是把所谓“原则”和“传统”看得如此重要。
content.en: "Volcano" doesn't meet our standards. Corporate partners must understand when rules should exist and when they shouldn't, not cling to so-called "principles" and "tradition" so tightly.

content.cn: 更多人在观望，筹码暂时还在你这边。我们会假意配合“火山”，但拖延不了太久，你需要行动。
content.en: More people are watching. The chips are still on your side for now. We'll pretend to cooperate with "Volcano," but we can't delay for long. You need to act.

content.cn: 做你该做的，证明你依然有资格上桌。
content.en: Do what you must. Prove you still deserve a seat at the table.

title.cn: 笔迹潦草的裂地者笔记

content.cn: 这批差点逃跑的长耳兽，最新的实验反馈结果出奇地好。抓回来后，它们的测试表现与之前的相比有天壤之别。
content.en: The clutch of long-ears that nearly escaped confinement actually displayed remarkable test results. Post-recapture performance literally went through the roof.

content.cn: 一个合理的推测是，这与它们在外期间吃的东西有关。
content.en: A good explanation would be related to the things they ate during their brief escape.

content.cn: 当时是林奈帮我抓回了长耳兽。他说长耳兽误食了一些被废弃药剂污染的草，这是个重要线索。
content.en: Linnaeus was the one who helped me bring the long-ears back to their pens. He told me that the herby-little-furballs ate grass contaminated by pharmaceutical waste. It sounds like a good lead to me.

content.cn: 我从他的实验室拿了些药剂制备的中间产物，给部分长耳兽试了一下，出乎意料，效果很好。这批长耳兽表现出的环境敏感性更为明显。
content.en: I took some pharmaceutical intermediates from his lab and administered them to a number of long-ears. Results went unexpectedly well. The treated long-ears exhibited significantly improved environmental awareness.

content.cn: 研究第一阶段的汇报已经顺利结束。
content.en: The first phase of the research project has been successfully reported.

content.cn: 接下来还有许多难点，如真菌的培育和更广泛的生物测试等。不过，这些暂且可以放一放。我确实需要给自己放个假了。
content.en: We'll be facing more challenges like culturing the fungus and expanding the scope of bio-testing. I'll set those aside for now because I really need a break.

content.cn: 今天琼来祝贺我，还带了点心。时光飞逝，想起当年我们一起加入工团的情景。她真是个不错的姑娘，温柔又热心。
content.en: Joan came to congratulate me and even brought some snacks. Time really flies in this place. Can't help but think about the time when we joined the UWST together. She's so nice, gentle, and friendly.

content.cn: 对参数进行调整后，本次模拟通过虚拟运算成功复现了泰拉的天灾。这说明以塔卫二目前的环境条件，在局部区域内将活性源石微粒浓度精确控制在某一范围内时，重现天灾是完全可能的。
content.en: After adjusting the parameters, this simulation used a virtual algorithm to successfully recreate the catastrophes of Terra. This result shows that triggering a Catastrophe at the current environmental conditions of Talos-II is theoretically possible, if the local density of active Originium particles can be precisely maintained within a certain range.

content.cn: 为了确保将来实地测试时的稳定性和准确性，建议继续增加浓度，再进行一个轮次的模拟。
content.en: To ensure the stability and accuracy of subsequent field trials, we recommend an additional round of simulation with increased density.

content.cn: 终末地工业的伊冯干员完成了超域扫描技术的研究，并制作出了第一台原型机。这是超域研究领域的突破性进展，使我们的研究得以推进到下一阶段。该项目的基础资料由麦斯·克劳教授提供，伊冯干员现正与我们展开更深入的技术合作和交流。
content.en: Endfield Operator Yvonne has completed the Æther scanner research project and built the first prototype for this new technology. This is a milestone achievement for Ætherside sciences and it helped propel our research to the next stage. Since Professor Matz Crowe provided the basic scientific data for our research, we're now expanding the scope of our technical partnership and discourse with Operator Yvonne.

content.cn: 这为我们下一步的研究工作奠定了良好基础。若能将超域扫描技术规模化，并结合本研究所目前的研究成果，清除大片区域的侵蚀将成为可能。
content.en: This has laid an excellent foundation for the next phase of our scientific work. If the Æther scanner could be adapted to mass production and integrated with other technologies developed by this Research Center, purging the Blight from entire regions will become a possibility.

title.cn: 超域扫描技术应用前瞻

content.cn: 我的研究失败了。已经进行上万次模拟实验了，但每次的结果都没有达到我的预期。
content.en: My project flopped. The number of my simulation runs has hit five digits, but none of the results met my expectations.

content.en: Maybe something's wrong with my mathematical model... But that's impossible...

content.en: My mathematical model is verified on a daily basis! Maybe the model knows what I'm trying to do. Maybe it changes itself whenever I start running the actual test! WHAT MANNER OF BLIGHTERY IS THIS?!

content.cn: 我不能再失败了……我已经花了太多的经费，我把这件事瞒了太久。
content.en: I can't afford to keep failing... I've spent too much of my grant and hid these results for too long.

content.en: BLASTED BREAKER VANDALS CAME AT THE WORST POSSIBLE TIME! I can't leave! This is the key moment I've been waiting for! I must run my tests...

content.cn: 大量源石在同一时刻活性化会产生巨大的能量，这种瞬时的能量有着极大的破坏力。如果能实现该能量的可控化，我们就有了改变塔卫二环境的强有力工具。
content.en: Vast amounts of energy are rapidly released when activating large quantities of Originium at the same time. These sudden energy bursts are extremely destructive. If we could control them, we'll have a powerful tool for changing the very environment of Talos-II.

content.cn: 本研究通过观测和模拟获得“大量源石瞬时活性化”这一现象的数据，构建了“大量源石瞬时活性化能量可控性”的数据模型，并以此为基础，提出源石活性化能量约束装置原型机的初步构想。
content.en: In this research, we used both observed and simulated data for "flash activations of large quantities of Originium", and constructed a mathematical model for "controlling flash activation of large quantities of Originium". The model was used as a basis for creating a preliminary proposal of an Originium activation energy restraining device prototype.

title.cn: 可控大量源石瞬时活性化的数据模型研究
title.en: Investigating the Mathematical Models for Flash Activation of Large Quantities of Originium

content.cn: 这些源石虫饿了，会自己吃东西，吃饱了就不会再进食了。你把食物加足就可以了。
content.en: These Originium Slugs will feed themselves when hungry and stop eating when they are full. Just remember to top up the slug-feed.

content.cn: 但记得一定要每天给它们新鲜的水。
content.en: They also prefer fresh water. Give it to them on a daily basis.

title.en: Memo on a Piece of Paper

content.cn: 不知道什么时候才能出去
content.en: When can I ever leave?

content.cn: 要规划好食物和水
content.en: Gotta ration the food and water properly.

content.cn: 管理员，您好。
content.en: Greetings, Endministrator.

content.cn: 在狼卫干员的协助下，我们已经完成了针对四号谷地裂地者遇袭现场的综合分析，现向您汇报结论。
content.en: With the assistance of operator Wulfgard, we have completed a comprehensive analysis of the Landbreaker attack sites in Valley IV. Below is our summary:

content.cn: 经综合判断，我们确信现场发生的是几场“内部肃清”：一个灵巧、狡猾的杀手，用伏击、诱骗等各种方式，以最省力的方式清理掉了预定目标。
content.en: After thorough evaluation, we confirm these incidents were orchestrated as "internal purges". A nimble, cunning slayer, using ambushes, deception, and minimal effort, eliminated designated targets with chilling efficiency.

content.cn: 据狼卫干员分析，这位被称作“影子”的袭击者大概率是碾骨氏族的布兰娜，一位双手沾满鲜血的残酷之徒。传闻在碾骨氏族合并之初，她曾向聂菲斯发起挑战，最终惨败。但从现场诸多受害者身上极其有针对性的伤害来看，聂菲斯没有选择取她性命，而是让她加入了自己的麾下。
content.en: According to operator Wulfgard, the attacker, codenamed "Shadow", is likely Brenna of the Bonekrusher Clan, a ruthless individual with bloodstained hands. Rumors suggest that after the clan's consolidation, she challenged Nefarith and suffered a crushing defeat. Yet, instead of executing her, Nefarith integrated Brenna into her ranks, a decision now justified by the precision of the attacks.

content.cn: “断头台”和“鬼火”死前仍在用“火山”的名号放狠话，“血眼”手上拿着“火山”的邀请信。显然，“火山”打算将这些人聚集起来，掀翻聂菲斯的统治。但他没有料到，“影子”布兰娜从一开始就不是他的同谋。聂菲斯拿着“影子”这把刀，轻松除掉了所有叛徒。
content.en: Victims like "Guillotine" and "Will-o-Wisp" died invoking "Volcano's" name, while "Bloodeye" was found holding an invitation from "Volcano". Clearly, "Volcano" aimed to rally dissidents to overthrow Nefarith. What he didn't anticipate? "Shadow", or Brenna, was never his ally. Nefarith wielded her like a blade, effortlessly excising traitors.

content.cn: 背叛与杀戮几乎是这些人的日常。但是，在与狼卫干员沟通之后，我们拼凑出了更多的线索：这些遇袭者之间存在共性，他们都是游离于聂菲斯所谓“赐福”边缘的人。
content.en: Betrayal and bloodshed are routine for them. But after collaborating with Wulfgard, we uncovered a critical commonality: all victims operated on the fringes of Nefarith's so-called "blessings".

content.cn: “断头台”盖比，佣兵气质极重，所事之主甚多。很难确认他有多少对碾骨氏族的归属感。
content.en: "Guillotine" Gabbi: A mercenary at heart, served numerous masters. His loyalty to the clan was always questionable.

content.cn: “鬼火”维奇尔，碾骨焰术师中的佼佼者。早在雅各布时期，焰术师就随着巢雕一同出现在劫掠场，氏族代代相传的技艺是他们的安身之本，令其更倾向于恪守传统。
content.en: "Will-o-Wisp" Vichir: An elite Bonekrusher Pyromancer. Since Jakub's era, such specialists have relied on traditional raiding tactics. Their adherence to old ways made them resistant to change.

content.cn: “血眼”撒萨罗，碾骨氏族精锐团体的领导者。这群人内部团结一致，当更迭转型发生，最容易成为阻力的也可能是他们。
content.en: "Bloodeye" Sazaro: Led a tight-knit elite group. Such cohesion often becomes a barrier during transitions.

content.cn: “火山”查查，您收集到的一切信息都在反映他压抑着的愤怒和仇恨。狼卫干员同步了一条情报，早在雅各布割据一方的初期，这位军阀身边就有查查祖父的身影。结合“火山”本人的言语记录，不难看出其顽固激进的“正统”意识。
content.en: "Volcano" Chacha: Every clue reflects suppressed rage and hatred. Operator Wulfgard also updated us with a piece of intel. Chacha's grandfather served the warlord Jakub back in those days as a personal enforcer. This, together with Chacha's chat records, reveal the "Volcano" to be a stubborn and extremist supporter of the "orthodoxy".

content.cn: 这些人谋划的“叛乱”，一定程度上正是“旧”碾骨氏族对聂菲斯的反抗。他们的失败代表着这些“陈旧杂质”正在被驱逐出“新”碾骨氏族。
content.en: Their attempted rebellion was, in essence, the "old" Bonekrusher Clan resisting Nefarith's new order. Their failure signals the purge of "outdated elements" from the evolving clan.

content.cn: 从本次事件可以看出，聂菲斯显然是个优秀的统治者。在大局上，她稳稳把握着氏族成员的思想，能够清晰意识到自己快速崛起带来的副作用，也能清晰意识到这些副作用应该用什么手段处理——针对四号谷地的袭击调动了大量碾骨氏族骨干，她亲手给对手们制造了一个千载难逢的机会。另一方面，她的手腕并不仅仅局限在碾骨氏族内部，“火山”自以为能倚仗的“外援”先一步被她斩断，足以证明其根系早已延伸到了文明环带（关于信中所提“企业”，相关跟踪调查已经启动）。
content.en: Nefarith has proven to be a shrewd ruler. She not only grips her clan's ideology but also anticipates the fallout of her rapid rise, hence orchestrating these attacks in Valley IV to lure dissenters into a trap. Moreover, her influence extends beyond the clan: "Volcano's" hoped-for external support was severed before it materialized, proving her roots already reach deep into the Civilization Band (investigations regarding the "corporation" mentioned in the letter are underway).

content.cn: 碾骨氏族并不稳定，这对我们来说是一个好消息，但恐怕仅仅目前是这样。
content.en: The Bonekrusher Clan's instability is currently advantageous for us, but this may be temporary.

title.cn: 杜曲生的秘酒酿造记录

content.cn: （落水的终端里有一则语音日志）
content.en: (Among the flooded terminals, an audio log plays back)

content.cn: “满分传说之神庄管代在上，如果毕业设计一遍过，哪怕让我顿顿吃肉，抽中限定款龙泡泡贴纸，分配到首墩工作我也愿意！
content.en: "By the almighty Legendary God of Perfect Scores, Viceroy Zhuang. If my thesis passes on the first try, I swear I'll be content eating meat every meal, pulling that limited-edition Chubby Lung sticker, and getting stationed at Marker Stone!"

content.cn: “嘿嘿，是不是既要又要了……能不能再许愿一个专用的实验室？
content.en: "Heh, am I getting greedy here... Fine, throw in a lab too!"

content.cn: “今天也没抢到实验名额，学院什么时候再扩建……哎哟！我的终端——”
content.en: "Another day with no lab access... When are we getting that new research wing? Agh! My Termi—"

content.cn: （背包中有一封没有收件人的信，以及一块石头。信件被水浸透，字迹有些模糊不清）
content.en: (Inside the backpack lies a letter with no recipient and a single stone. The letter has been waterlogged, its ink now blurred and unreadable)

content.cn: 在你失足<@nar.mark>落水</>后，武陵一直都是阴天，没有太阳。天气太差了，我考虑之后搬家去<@nar.mark>塔罗斯</>城了。
content.en: The sky's been gray since the day we <@nar.mark>lost you in the river</>. Even the weather mourns. Maybe <@nar.mark>Talos</> City won't remind me of every detail.

content.cn: 水是流动的。你最喜欢黏着我了，要不要变成<@nar.mark>露水</>，乘着风跟我一起来？
content.en: You always followed me around, yet the water moves on... So won't you come back as <@nar.mark>morning dew</>, and let the wind carry you home?

content.cn: ……人们说水渠有<@nar.mark>鬼</>在闹动静。虽然你不是在这里……但水是流动的，万一真的是你呢？
content.en: ...Another <@nar.mark>water ghost</> rumor. It can't be you... You're gone. But rivers carry memories. Could the whispers be your voice, tangled in the reeds?

content.cn: 如果真的是你……别那么狠心……来我梦里……看看我吧……
content.en: ...Maybe it's selfish to ask. But the dead visit others. Why never me?

content.cn: 防御装甲板受损严重，预计使用时间剩余2小时，建议及时更换。
content.en: Defense armor plating severely compromised. Estimated usage life remaining: 2 hours. Recommend swapping out the damaged component ASAP.

content.cn: 爸，妈，你们最近好吗？我已经在四号谷地正式入职终末地工业了！
content.en: Mom, Dad, you alright? I got an official job at the Valley IV site of Endfield Industries!

content.cn: 同事们人都很好，很照顾我这种新人。我入职当天食堂还做了异香兽排，很好吃，但不知道为什么，大家都不肯告诉我原材料是什么……
content.en: My colleagues are really cool and they take care of newbies like me. The canteen even served savory fillet on my first day and it's so yummy! But nobody wants to tell me about the source of the mystery meat. No idea why...

content.cn: 差点忘写了，四号谷地很安全，非常安全，我感觉这里就算再过一百年也不会遇到大规模天使袭击。
content.en: Almost forgot to mention this, but Valley IV is safe. SUPER SAFE. I don't think this place will ever get attacked by an Aggeloid host. Not in a hundred years.

content.cn: 总之我一切都好，你们千万不要担心，我一定会干出一番事业的！
content.en: In any case, I'm doing great and everything's good. No need to worry about me. I'll definitely make a name for myself here!

content.cn: 一如既往，和它在泰拉时的数据天差地别。
content.en: Just as usual. Its numbers can't be more different than those recorded at Terra.

content.cn: 源石究竟发生了什么……
content.en: What happened to the Originium...?

content.cn: 协议核心实验性投放的日期没有调整，届时管理员会亲临四号谷地。
content.en: The date for the PAC experimental deployment has NOT changed. The Endmin will also be paying Valley IV a personal visit.

content.cn: 各位！务必打起精神！
content.en: Alright people! Look lively! That's everyone!

content.cn: 我会和各位一起努力，尽早完成测试环境的最终确认工作！
content.en: I shall be working by your side! We must ensure that final validation of the testing environment is completed ASAP!

content.cn: 这几天时间紧任务重，我特意给大家申请了一批营养补充剂，放在桌子上了，随意自取。
content.en: I know work is hard these couple of days so I got everyone a mega carton of energy supplements. It's on the table. Help yourselves.

content.cn: 扛不住了就喝一管，加油啊！
content.en: Take a swig if you're feeling flat. Go for it, people!

content.cn: 听说安德烈都快二十四小时连轴转了，咱们也不能输啊！
content.en: I heard Andre is slogging nearly 24 hours a day. We can't let him beat us!

content.cn: 各位，四号谷地这次受损严重，诊所那里伤员都快躺满了。
content.en: Alright, people. Valley IV has taken a serious hit. The medical bay is filled with the sick and injured.

content.cn: 想都不用想，大家肯定也缺吃的。
content.en: It goes without saying that everyone's pretty low on chow as well.

content.cn: 咱们的工作都和餐饮有关，总不能看着工友们挨饿吧？
content.en: Our job is tied to food services. We can't let the crew go hungry.

content.cn: 我建议咱们统合一下库存，出一批耐储存的食物，分发下去。
content.en: I suggest we consolidate our remaining stores, prep a batch of durable food, and hand them out.

content.cn: 大灾大难正是需要团结的时候。
content.en: Unity is essential in the face of disaster.

content.cn: 第58届全联盟工团工人代表大会召开在即，你们说这次会上能不能聊到四号谷地的事情？
content.en: The 58th Worker Representatives' Congress of the UWST is about to start. I wonder if they'll say anything about Valley IV.

content.cn: 跟终末地的合作也好，在供能高地的各项实验也罢，我们四号谷地的成果足够让人眼前一亮了吧？
content.en: We got a partnership with Endfield and ran quite a few tests at the Power Plateau. Our achievements at Valley IV should be remarkable enough, right?

content.cn: 四号谷地未来可期呀……
content.en: Sitch at Valley IV is looking up for us...

content.cn: 说不定上面认为发展前景不错，大手一挥，真的把这里从偏远生产基地改造成巨型综合科学城，那可就太好了。
content.en: Maybe those on top might be impressed with our prospects, toss in some serious dough, and convert this place from a marginal production base into a scientific megalopolis. That would be super incredible.

content.cn: 参加工团北极合作考察的同事们应该都抵达玛尔斯波利斯了，滑雪板和护目镜暂时用不到了，都收回仓库吧。
content.en: The crew of the UWST joint polar exploration mission should have reached Morospolis already. I don't think they need the snowboards or visors. Better move them back to the storage depot.

content.cn: 之后把冲击镐、斧头、防护盔这些拿出来。
content.en: I'll then hand out the pneumatic drills, axes, and hard hats.

content.cn: 我昨天不知道为什么忽然心悸，这怕不是不祥之兆……难道这里要出事……
content.en: I don't know why my heart skipped a beat yesterday. Feels like a bad omen to me... Is something going to happen to this place...?

content.cn: 失窃物：特殊实验电池*20，灭火器套组*6，箱装应急食品*10，箱装应急药品*12
content.en: LOST: Special experimental battery×20; Fire extinguishing set×6; Emergency food supplies×10 crates; Emergency medication supplies×12 crates.

content.cn: 受损物：运输车*4（其中2辆完全损毁），安全防护门*1
content.en: DAMAGED: 4 transport trucks (2 were damaged beyond repair); 1 security gate.

content.cn: 备注：我很难理解裂地者是怎么破开那扇巨大厚重的安全防护门的。一位工团姐妹说是什么火焰的黑色巨像，什么喷发烟气的巨人……她一定是被吓傻了，等她从急救室出来我再去问问。
content.en: NOTE: I don't know how the Landbreakers managed to bash through that massive and heavy security gate. A UWST crew mate mentioned something about a colossus of onyx fire spewing noxious fumes ... but I think she's suffering from PTSD. I'll talk to her once she comes out from ICU.

content.cn: 我已抵达玛尔斯波利斯，公务亦已处理妥当。
content.en: I've reached Morospolis. The business has been taken care of.

content.cn: 不幸之处在于，刚刚接到通知，返程路线上确认观测到了一定数量的天使，我不得不延后返回日期。
content.en: Unfortunately, I just received a message about the sighting of a substantial number of Aggeloi on the road back. I've been forced to delay my return.

content.cn: 唉，这下估计真的来不及了。
content.en: Ugh. I don't think I can make it on time.

content.cn: 你们一定要帮我要到管理员的签名啊！
content.en: Please! Someone help me get the Endmin's signature!

content.cn: 另外，我已按各位所托付之采购清单购齐所需物品，无须担心。
content.en: Also, I've bought everything on your shopping lists. No need to worry about that.

content.cn: 我是不是该另辟蹊径地优化一下现有的源石电池设计？
content.en: Maybe I should look for a clever short cut to optimize existing designs of Originium batteries.

content.cn: 可还有什么路径呢……去超域试验场？并不现实……
content.en: But where could I find these short cuts...? The Æther Test Site? That doesn't sound realistic at all...

content.cn: 难道要利用那些黑色油脂……
content.en: Maybe I should try using the black grease...

content.cn: 燃烧效率低，比源石差远了……没什么利用价值。
content.en: The grease burns too poorly. The heat of combustion is way below that of Originium... The substance is hardly useful.

content.cn: 有些研究者猜测那种黑色油脂……“化石燃料”确实合适，我就也叫它化石燃料吧。
content.en: A few scientists came up with various theories about the black grease... "Fossil fuel" does sound like a fitting name. I guess I'll start using this name as well.

content.cn: 有些人说，这种燃料理应也存在于泰拉，而之所以没在泰拉发现，是因为它被源石“啃”了个干干净净。
content.en: Some believe that such fuels also exist on Terra. The only reason we failed to find it there was Originium. The crystal "ate" it all up, supposedly.

content.cn: 这让我产生了某种猜测……在泰拉，是否有一些比源石更优秀的燃料也被它“啃食”干净了？
content.en: I generated another hypothesis... Perhaps we had better fuels on Terra, but they were all "eaten up" by Originium.

content.cn: 那塔卫二或许还有机会？我们是不是能在这里发现更好的燃料？
content.en: Perhaps Talos-II offered a better chance. Maybe we can find better sources of fuel in this place.

content.cn: 如果自然环境里挖不到，或者说它根本就不存在……那也有别的方法。
content.en: If we fail to dig it out from the natural environment, or if such substance never existed ... we'll come up with something else.

content.cn: 利用天使……这有一定可行性。
content.en: We can utilize the Aggeloi... This actually sounds like a feasible plan.

content.cn: 人类偶尔会在天使残骸中找到性质特殊的材料，它们多半是因天使形成过程中的物质被锚点牵引，强行“揉”在一处而产生的——就像炎国人前些年发现的那种极优秀的合金。
content.en: Humanity has occasionally found materials with special properties from Aggeloid remains. Ankhors would forcibly gather and "mash" various bits of matter together in the process of Aggeloid formation, and give rise to these special materials at the same time — It's just like how the Yanese forged their superb alloys all those years ago.

content.cn: 但这涉及对锚点的理解……我目前还有所欠缺……
content.en: But this requires better understanding of Ankhors... A field of expertise that I'm lacking in...

content.cn: 厂房里的三条入料传送线怎么才能改成锚点那种感觉呢……
content.en: How would I design the three material input ports of a processing facility to achieve Ankhor-like production...?

content.cn: 我或许可以先画个图纸……
content.en: I can start by sketching a blueprint...

content.cn: 工团标语怎么说的来着，流水线工人也能有搞大研究的本事！
content.en: What did those UWST slogans say again? Even a shop floor crew mate can do serious science!

content.cn: 推平了一个据点，杀死了所有敢抵抗的人。
content.en: We conkered a outpost n' killed evry'wun who rezizted.

content.cn: 不抵抗的人，就抓起来，运走，造巢雕。
content.en: We grabd zos who did not reziz. Wheeled them to our turf to build the denstakk.

content.cn: 我们要让巢雕遍布大地。
content.en: We shall cover the lands with our denstakks.

content.cn: 那里被我们攻破，它们的首领控制岩石和土块，碾碎了我们很多人。
content.en: We conkered a new place. Deyr chief kontrold the rokks n' mudd. Many gud brekkahs gotz krusshed.

content.cn: 但它们依旧失败了，我们的头领切碎了它们的土石和身体。
content.en: But deyz got dey-feeeted. Our baws slashed 'em rokks and mudd bodys to peyses.

content.cn: 它们的首领很强，但我们的新头领更强。
content.en: Deyr boss stronk. But our nu-baws izz STRONKKERRz.

content.cn: 我们抢了一支商队。它们的车上有很多铳和弩。
content.en: We raided a kon-voyeez. Gotz trukkahs filledz with AArtzy hand-kahnons and crosbouz.

content.cn: 新头领要求效率。
content.en: Nu-baws dee-manz ef-FEE-shun-see.

content.cn: 更快的速度，抢来更好的东西。
content.en: We raidz fastah and grab bettah loot.

content.cn: 它们不抵抗。
content.en: Deyz dun reziz.

content.cn: 我们拥有了更多的新人。新人会造弩，会修弩。
content.en: We got morr nu peeps. Nu peeps who can mayk and fix dem crosbouz.

content.cn: 我们还会有更多新人。
content.en: We wil faynd MORR nu peeps.

content.cn: 一把斧子，两把斧子……塞进箱子里……
content.en: One axe, two axes ... stuffed in the crates...

content.cn: 有更多的斧子，我也能是碾骨之拳。
content.en: Get more axes and I'll be a Bonekrushing fist.

content.cn: 四号谷地缆车转运站位于枢纽区北侧，由联盟工团设计员亚历山大·康德拉图克完成最初设计，终末地工业工程师裴蜀负责改进设计，<@nar.mark>四号谷地基建团</>承担施工建造与升级，于<@nar.mark>■■■</>年<@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日开通运营。
content.en: The Valley IV Cable Car (V4CC) station is located at the northside of the Hub. Original designs were proposed by UWST architect Aleksandr Kondratyuk and later revised by Endfield engineer Pei Shu. Construction, maintenance, and upgrade of the V4CC was carried out by the <@nar.mark>Valley IV Infrastructure Crew</>. The station was finally opened for service on <@nar.mark>■■■■</>, <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>.

content.cn: 该缆车转运站连接枢纽区与供能高地，设仓储区、装卸平台、综合车场、架空索道，并接入四号谷地综合运输网络，以保证与各工厂、矿场、研究所的顺畅联系。
content.en: This V4CC station connects the Hub to the Power Plateau and includes a storage depot, a loading platform, an integrated parking lot, and overhead ziplines. The V4CC is connected to the Valley IV integrated transport network to ensure smooth commuting between various factories, mines, and research sites.

content.cn: 该缆车转运站采用智能调度系统，可根据需求实时调节运力分配，确保货物与人员的最优流通。来客可在任意终端接入自助引导服务。
content.en: This V4CC station also adopted a smart control system (SCS) to allocate and deploy cable cars in real time. The SCS ensures optimized flow of cargo and commuters. Passengers can connect with any SCS terminal and use the self-help services to plan their trips.

title.cn: 四号谷地缆车转运站简介

content.cn: Q：我来自文明环带核心区域，从来没见过天使，它们是什么？
content.en: Q: I came from the heartlands of the Band and have never seen an Aggelos before. What are they?

content.cn: A：天使是一种特殊构装体，大体上可以当作由“光环”和“躯体”两部分构成。光环就像是它们“活着”的象征，而躯体则是由锚点组装出来。
content.en: A: Aggeloi (singular: Aggelos) are construct organisms comprising 2 parts: (i) the halo and (ii) the body. Their halos symbolize their "living" state, while their bodies are constructed by the Ankhor.

content.cn: Q：我听人说天使其实没有什么可怕的，这是真的吗？
content.en: Q: People say Aggeloi aren't that scary. Is that true?

content.cn: A：这是绝对的谣言，绝大部分天使都有一个固定活动范围，任何进入这个范围里的人都会遭到毫不留情的攻击。
content.en: A: Absolutely not. Almost all Aggeloi have an active radius, and they will mercilessly attack any humans trespassing into this radius.

content.cn: Q：我求饶的话，它们会放过我吗？
content.en: Q: Will it let me go if I beg for mercy?

content.cn: A：天使没有情感，所以不会对人手下留情。
content.en: A: Aggeloi have no feelings and therefore will not show mercy to any human.

content.cn: Q：那一旦遭遇了天使，我该怎么办？
content.en: Q: What should I do if I encounter an Aggelos?

content.cn: A：若您不是作战人员，请立刻向已知安全区域“夺命狂奔”。
content.en: A: If you are a non-combatant, please proceed to the nearest safe zone as quickly as you can. Simply put, the best advice is to: RUN LIKE HELL.

content.cn: <image>Reading/reading_prts_001_2</image>

content.cn: 从爆炸痕迹判断，源石爆炸物炸穿了两层外部防护板，却受到了第三层防护板块的阻拦。
content.en: From the burn marks left by the explosion, the Originium explosives managed to blast through two layers of external shielding but was stopped by the third.

content.cn: 以D64钢为基础进行了再加工的特殊钢板明显不是裂地者的劣质爆炸物能够破坏的。
content.en: Low quality explosives made by the Landbreakers should be incapable of defeating re-processed D64 steel plating.

content.cn: 然而它依旧被凿穿了，就像是被某种巨大沉重的攻城器械撕开了一样。
content.en: But this particular weapon tore through the entire thing like a super heavy siege engine.

content.cn: 裂地者使用了什么？破口边缘处些微的侵蚀痕迹又从何而来？
content.en: What did the raiders use? What about the traces of Blight found along the edges of the breach?

title.cn: 源石副产物中心的观察结果（二）

content.cn: 哎，真是好久不见了，管理员，您最近好吗？我收到了您上传的文件，这里给您提供一些情报支持。
content.en: Ah, it's been a while, Endmin! How are you doing? I received the file you uploaded and I got some intel to support your endeavors.

content.cn: 我们以您所提供的资料为依据，对裂地者造成的破坏进行了分析。首先，我们可以判明的是，留下这些痕迹的并非裂地者的大型战争兵器，那么究竟是什么破坏了这扇大门，我们有若干猜测。
content.en: We used the data you provided to analyze the damage caused by the Landbreakers (LB). We have confirmed that the damage was not caused by a large LB weapon or machine, and made several guesses for the actual cause of this damage herein.

content.cn: 第一种可能性：大型野兽。
content.en: Proposal 1: A large beast

content.cn: 以裂地者稍显简陋的技术水平来看，假如他们驱使驮兽一类的野兽，给它们装配巨大的撞角，在以爆炸物开道的情况下，攻破大门似乎是可行的。当然，我本人不太相信这一说法，但组内其他同事认为，裂地者这种生活在荒地上的人总能搞出匪夷所思的东西，所谓的“土办法”或许才符合有关他们的真相。我可爱的同事们正在拿草稿纸计算这种方案的可行性……
content.en: Despite the slightly more rudimentary levels of LB tech, they could still harness a burdenbeast and furnish it with a large ram. With the aid of explosives, this solution can actually breach the gate. Of course, I do not support this proposal personally but other colleagues in the section believe that LBs who spent their lives surviving in the wildlands have always surprised us with their unexpected ingenuity. This "wild and improvised" solution might be closer to the truth. These lovely colleagues of mine are creating drawings to investigate the feasibility of such a beastly solution as we speak...

content.cn: 第二种可能性：高明的源石技艺。
content.en: Proposal 2: A powerful form of Originium Arts

content.cn: 这种就不好办了……这世上的源石技艺数量之多，种类之复杂，我想您比我清楚，能轻松破开这种等级钢板的高手毕竟不在少数。
content.en: Now this proposal is quite difficult to explain, given the complex diversity of Originium Arts in this world. I think you know better than I that plenty of skilled casters are capable of defeating steel plating of this grade.

content.cn: 第三种可能性：高明的源石技艺附加特殊的裂地者技术。
content.en: Proposal 3: A powerful form of Originium Arts supported by special Landbreaker tech

content.cn: 这是最恐怖的可能性，但……您提供的资料中有关“些微的侵蚀痕迹”与“来这里”的内容描述，却无可避免地指向了这种可能。我们不难推测，一位裂地者中的实力强劲者，身着特殊的装备，带着某种搜寻目的来到了枢纽区基地，为了完成某种命令，这个本领高强的裂地者以夸张的方式徒手“撕开”了大门……
content.en: This is the most terrifying proposal, but since the data provided includes minor traces of Blight and LB writings that read: "COME HERE", it is, unfortunately, the most likely. We can easily postulate that a powerful LB decked out in custom gear came to the Hub Base with a special mission of retrieving something. To complete this mission, this powerful LB "ripped open" the gate in an excessively brutal way with bare hands...

content.cn: 您的敌人会很恐怖。
content.en: You are facing extremely dangerous enemies.

content.cn: 我可能活不下来了。
content.en: I may not survive.

content.cn: 天使铺天盖地，我不想死，但我更不想死得窝囊，之后应该会主动顶在前线吧。
content.en: There are so many Aggeloi they've blotted out the sun. I don't wanna die, and definitely don't wanna die a coward. I'll probably volunteer for the frontline.

content.cn: 我没有亲人，也没什么朋友，遗产就只有宿舍里那些东西，你们看着分一分，存款藏得不是很隐蔽，帮我捐给因这次袭击而失去父母的孩子们。
content.en: I got no family or friends. All my belongings are in my dorm room. Divvy them up, it's your call. My cred stash isn't very well hidden. Help me donate the entire sum to the children orphaned by this attack.

content.cn: <@nar.quote>哈哈！管理员来了！我不死了！</>
content.en: <@nar.quote>HAHA! The Endmin's here! I'm gonna live!</>

title.cn: 被扔在垃圾桶上的遗书
title.en: Will Left on a Trash Bin

content.cn: 将源石虫放入水中可以更方便地剥去甲壳，把去壳后的源石虫肉和驮兽肉一同放入锅中熬制。随后放入苦叶椒和灰芦麦，等到味道充分融合后，加入碾碎的异香石。
content.en: Place the Originium slugs in water to make shelling them easier. Stew the deshelled slugs and burdo-fillet in a pot, then add some tartpepper and reed rye. Once the flavors have blended sufficiently, add crushed aggagrit.

content.cn: 批注：现在的年轻人在得知汤里除了驮兽肉还有源石虫后，都表示不能接受（明明在四号谷地的开拓时期那么受欢迎），于是我改进了一下，把源石虫肉替换成了终末地工业提供的罐头。
content.en: NOTE: Many youths refused to eat the borscht after learning it contains slugs in addition to burdo-fillet (though the dish was extremely popular during the pioneering days of Valley IV). I improved the recipe by replacing Originium slugs with canned food from Endfield.

title.cn: 《味蕾上的四号谷地：工团杂烩汤篇》

content.cn: 大家好，很高兴又和大家见面了，我有一个关于“天使赠礼”的新点子——这次不是用天使去做一些香辛料，而是做一口锅！
content.en: Greetings. Pleased to meet everyone again. I got a bright new idea for Aggeloid Bounties — This time, we won't be turning them into condiments and spice. Instead, we're making a pot out of them!

content.cn: 首先，和以前一样，从天使的残骸里取出一块大一点的碎石。接着用粉笔在石块上画出一口锅的轮廓，现在就可以用源石切割装备沿着线条切割。不用担心石头被刮花，这石头硬起来都能把切割装备卡坏。这样一口锅就算是做好了。
content.en: Like before, we first take a larger piece of rock from Aggelos remains. With a chalk, draw the outline of a pot and use an Originium saw to cut along the line. Don't worry about making scratches on Aggeloid rocks as some of them can be hard enough to break your Originium saw. And there you have it! An Aggeloid pot!

content.cn: 今天的点子就到这里了，好好享受从未有过的体验吧。只要有好点子，天使也可以用来重建四号谷地。
content.en: There's the bright idea for today. Enjoy a culinary experience like never before. Remember, a good idea can even turn the Aggeloi into materials for rebuilding Valley IV.

content.cn: 刚来的时候，总是一开店就清空了库存，当初选择来四号谷地果然是正确的！
content.en: When I first arrived, I literally sold out my stock whenever I open shop. Choosing to do business in Valley IV seemed like the right choice at that time!

content.cn: 在那段时间的客人里，环塔商会的商人总是会夸从我这儿买的装备都是实打实的结实耐用，还有那几个塞什卡的雇佣兵，之后碰上了可得好好感谢感谢他们，要不是他们帮我抬货箱，我现在都还在谷地要塞站着不知道咋办呢。
content.en: Buyers from the TGCC often praised my gear for sturdiness and durability. And thank Talos for the mercenaries of Seš'qa (if I ever run into them again, I better give them my most sincere token of appreciation). If they didn't help me carry the cargo crates, I'd probably get stuck at Valley Fort not knowing what to do.

content.cn: 见过了刚来时的繁荣，我便下定了决心，等到完全扎根四号谷地后，申请去矿脉源区开个分店，那里的工人老早就在和我抱怨，说我的商店离他们太远了，来回不方便。
content.en: So, having witnessed the prosperity shortly after arriving, I decided to set up a permanent place in Valley IV and apply for a branch at the Origin Lodespring. The crew mates complained that my shop is too far away from their place and the getting back and forth can be quite a hassle.

content.cn: 源石大树炸掉后，我总是反思自己到底怎么想的，怎么会想着要一直留在四号谷地！
content.en: When they blew up the Great Originium Oak, I kept thinking to myself: "What were you thinking? Why did you stay in Valley IV?"

content.cn: 来这里的商队比以前少太多了，工团的工人们也不怎么来我这里买东西，都跑去了采石场……只能希望那些当雇佣兵的萨卡兹能早点来我这里进货，不然实在是开不了张了……看着空荡荡的店铺，我有了个想法，干脆反馈下，换个人来经营商店吧。
content.en: The caravans dwindled to a trickle and the UWST crew mates hardly visit my place anymore. The lot of them went to the Quarry instead... I can only hope that the Sarkaz mercenaries from before stock up at my place or this entire venture is over... Looking at the empty shop got me an idea. Maybe I should reflect this problem and get someone else to run this store instead.

content.cn: 欸，写着写着，就收到终末地要来和我们进一步合作的消息了。我不走了！
content.en: While I was penning this, I received a message from Endfield about a potential partnership. Guess I'm staying after all!

（本段录音记录于一个风雪声极度嘈杂的冰原，说话的人是一位工团的哨兵，他此时身受重伤，气息奄奄）
哨兵：我……判断失误了……
哨兵：侵蚀怪物竟然……有两只，它们就像是双胞胎一样……
哨兵：我们不可能正面应对……也没有逃出生天的可能……
哨兵：万幸我被它们拖到了巢穴……
哨兵：我的肋骨应该断了三根……左手和右腿也废了……
哨兵：这条录音……也不知道能不能有人听到……就当作是我的遗言吧……
哨兵：接下来……我会用申请来的设备……和这两只怪物同归于尽……
哨兵：怪物被解决掉的话……记录小组的三个人应该能逃掉。
哨兵：突然失踪应该会吓到他们……但我没机会说对不起了……
哨兵：如果我的遗言能送回我们的基地……有任何朋友能听到的话……
哨兵：请转告我的父母和队长……
哨兵：死亡并不能使我恐惧，请他们为我骄傲……
content.en:
(This audio file was probably recorded during a powerful blizzard in the Icefield. A UWST Scout probably made this recording. According to his voice, the man was probably severely wounded or dying when making this recording.) 
UWST SCOUT: I ... hngh ... I made the wrong call... 
UWST SCOUT: There are two of them... Never knew Blightmorphs can have twins... 
UWST SCOUT: We won't survive a direct confrontation... There's no escape for us... 
UWST SCOUT: Fortunately, they dragged me into their lair... 
UWST SCOUT: I broke three ribs ... and I can't use my left hand and right leg anymore... 
UWST SCOUT: I don't know if anyone will hear this message... If you're listening, treat this as my final words... 
UWST SCOUT: I am planning ... to use the device I've applied for... I'm taking down the misbegotten twins... 
UWST SCOUT: Once they're taken out ... the three eggheads should be able to make it. 
UWST SCOUT: My sudden disappearance might have scared them ... and I didn't have the chance to explain and apologize... 
UWST SCOUT: If you're listening to my final words ... I hope you're a friend of the UWST and bring it back to Base... 
UWST SCOUT: Tell my parents and Captain that... 
UWST SCOUT: I do not fear death. Be proud of what I did here today...

content.cn: 男人的声音：“喂？（一阵嘈杂）”
content.en: MALE VOICE: "Hello? (Noise)"

content.cn: “对，我接，我去给你接着谈这个单子。你直接说怎么办吧。……埃里克松商贸？……我什么时候沦落到跟这种人坐一桌吃饭了？"
content.en: "Okay. Got it. I'll negotiate this order for you. Just give me the details ... Erikssohn Trading House...? What...? Can't believe these small-timers are my competition."

content.cn: "不是不是，哎，哥，我真没有挑三拣四。他们跟一家啥公司搭上了？终末地？原来你们……咱们公司第一轮就被淘汰了啊。"
content.en: "Oh, no. Don't misunderstand, partner. I'm not being picky. Wait. What you mean? They're partnering with someone else? Endfield? So you ... I mean, they dropped us in round one?"

content.cn: "得看终末地跟埃里克松谈到什么程度了。他们要签合同了？……行，我准备准备就过去那边。"
content.en: "Depends on how far the Endfield-Erikssohn negotiations went... They're signing a contract already...? Sure. I'll get my things together and head right over."

content.cn: "门德斯那些人呢？他们派过来的是汉斯？他才不是什么业务员——他就是个打手！"
content.en: "What about Mendez? They're sending Hans? No, Hans is no negotiator — the guy is a merc!"

content.cn: "我、我当然不会暴露他们的啊，别怀疑我的专业程度。不就是吓吓那小子吗？"
content.en: "Me? Expose them? Partner, I'm a true professional. We just need to scare the youngling a little."

content.cn: "开拓区那么多地痞流氓，没人会怀疑到他们头上的。"
content.en: "The frontier is filled with breakers and scum. No one would suspect anything else."

content.cn: "嗯，谈下来了，你就帮我去跟上头说点好话……就是，这么多年老员工的情面……是吧？嗯。"
content.en: "Alright. It's settled. Just push a few kind words to the boss for me... I've worked for many years, right...? Hmm?"

content.cn: "……佣金不是说好的二八分？怎么变成你八我二了？！"
content.en: "...I thought we're splitting the commission 20-80. I was the one getting the 80, not you!"

content.cn: "什么写在纸上了，你给我那张契约根本不是这么写的！副本就在我副驾驶箱里呢，你别挂电话，你等着，我找给你看——"
content.en: "Printed and signed? That's not what your contract said! I got a copy of it right in my glove box. Suck-a-blight! Stay on the line! I'll show you —"

content.cn: "我啊，我回不去啊，我在外面跑业务呢。"

content.cn: 我下个周期就要调去其他部门了，他们说可能是联盟工团安全局。我才刚把这一带的巡天架构搭起来……
content.en: I'll be assigned to another department for the next cycle. Probably end up at the UWST Security Bureau. But I only just managed to set up the celestial monitoring framework here...

content.cn: 给我的继任者：无论你是驻站信使、哨兵还是普通工人，我都建议你按照我的这个范例来记录观测结果。我们这些在开拓区的巡天人，主要任务终究还是记录特殊天象事件，尤其是看有没有锚点飞过来。那些不关键的读数记录可以适当忽略——在这边，你每个周期要走十二个分站点，体力消耗很大，脑子需要用来放绝对必要的事。
content.en: TO THE ONE TAKING OVER MY POST: I advise you to follow my format and template for making the celestial observation logs. It doesn't matter if you're a resident messenger, scout, or crew mate. The primary responsibility of a celestial observer in the frontiers is to record special celestial phenomena, especially Ankhors flying overhead. You can ignore most non-essential data readings. This region covers 12 observation posts (OP) and you'll have to visit all of them every cycle. It's physically demanding so you gotta conserve your brain juice for the most essential matters.

content.cn: 你有两台莱茵天线，其中一台留作备用。光学镜每个分站点都有——我们设备不算缺，但也不算富裕。如果出了状况，就跟附近工团或者终末地的基地商量，应该都能解决。
content.en: You have 2 units of Rhine Antenna. Keep 1 of those as your backup. We got optical lenses at every OP. All the OPs are stocked, but not abundantly so. Contact a nearby UWST or Endfield site if you got a situation. Someone should be able to help.

content.cn: 尽量不要招惹这一带的天使。附近可能有锚点没清理干净，经常有天使晃到这边来，保持距离。
content.en: DO NOT aggravate the local Aggeloi. The cleanup crew may have missed an Ankhor or two. Expect Aggeloid presence and KEEP YOUR DISTANCE.

content.cn: 但他们不是也说了吗，两根锚点不会扎到同一个地方，所以说不定你的工作会很轻松呢。
content.en: But everyone says that Ankhors never strike the same place twice. Since the Ankhors have already hit this area, your work might be easy.

content.cn: 好好干。
content.en: Keep up the good work. Stay on target.
