title.cn: 天空观测记录（四号谷地）

content.cn: 我的伤口在愈合……它应该不会再影响到我施展源石技艺来隐匿行踪了。
content.en: My wound is healing... I think I can cast my Originium Arts properly again and hide my tracks.

content.cn: 如果你能找到这张纸条，这代表着你是我的熟人，知道我平时喜欢在哪里恶作剧。
content.en: If you find this note, this means you know me pretty well. In fact, you know where I like to play my pranks.

content.cn: 请想办法联络安全局，或通知上级，去枢纽区基地，看看能不能通知到终末地。
content.en: Help me call the Security Bureau or my superiors. Or go to the Hub Base and see if you can get in touch with Endfield.

content.cn: 裂地者很危险！裂地者很危险！裂地者很危险！
content.en: The Landbreakers are dangerous! The Landbreakers are dangerous! The Landbreakers are dangerous!

content.cn: 他们的首领很可能掌握了什么超域技术！
content.en: I think their leader has mastered some Ætherside Arts!

content.cn: 如果你是裂地者。
content.en: If you're a Landbreaker...

content.cn: 我祝你下一秒就死在你们那种臭烟里！
content.en: I HOPE YOU CHOKE AND DIE IN YOUR SMELLY SMOG!

title.en: Notes From a Crack in a Tire

content.cn: 不妙，我看到裂地者提前运走咱们的工友了……
content.en: Bad news. The Landbreakers have started to transfer our crew mates ahead of schedule...

content.cn: 一定是要拿他们当苦力……
content.en: They're definitely going to use them as slaves...

content.cn: 我要想办法把他们救出来。
content.en: I gotta find a way to break them out.

content.cn: 能找到这里，你一定是我的熟人，知道我喜欢在哪里恶作剧。
content.en: You must know me really well if you can find this place. You know exactly where I play my pranks.

content.cn: 所以不用担心我，你了解我的源石技艺，对吧。
content.en: No need to worry about me. You know my Originium Arts, right?

content.cn: 如果你是裂地者……
content.en: If you're a Landbreaker...

content.cn: 你们这群垃圾，我可以明摆着告诉你，我混在了你们的车队里，从现在开始，你们看到的每一个自己人，都有可能是我！
content.en: YOU BUNCH OF TRASH! I'll tell you where I am. I've sneaked into your caravan. Every pipeface you see might be me!

content.cn: 我建议你们所有人立刻自杀，不要犹豫！
content.en: JUST KILL YOURSELVES ALREADY! DO IT! NOW! DO NOT HESITATE!

title.en: Note: Stuffed in a Rock Crevice

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 虽然看不见白天和黑夜，但我觉得住进洞里应该有好多天了。肚子又有点疼，但我不会告诉哥哥的，不能给他们添麻烦。不乖的孩子会被管脸怪抓走的。
content.en: I cant see the day or night but I think I lived in the cave for many days. My tummy hurts but I wont tell Karja cos I dun wanna give him no trouble. The pipey face baddy grabs naughty kids.

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 哥哥偷看了这本日记，然后不理我，不知道跑到哪儿了。哼，我要把它藏到谁都发现不了的地方。
content.en: Karja spy-d on my diary and dun talk to me no more. I dont know where he went. Im gonna hide my diary at a super secret place so no one can find them.

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 今天忍不住疼，掉了眼泪，唉，被叔叔阿姨们发现了，这下瞒不住了。
content.en: Im hurting so bad so i cried. Just a little, tho. But other grown-ups noticed and i think they will tell karja.

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 哥哥带来了“终未地”的哥哥姐姐，真神奇，打了他们的针，就不那么疼了。好厉害呀！等我好了，就给他们画幅画！
content.en: Karja brought people called the Endfielders. They have artzy meds that took the pain away from my tummy! Once i get better i'll draw something nice for them!

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 我们又搬回家了，而且多了不少新奇的东西。我要画一幅画挂在墙上，上面有爸爸、妈妈、哥哥和我。希望今晚能梦到爸爸妈妈，让我画得像他们一点。
content.en: We moved again and there are a lot of new things. i wanna pin a drawing on the wall with daddy and mommy and karja and me. I hope i can dream of daddy and mommy again so i can draw them very very very nicely.

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 来了一位叫<s>  胡  </s>弧光的姐姐，她也好神奇！教我采了好多不同颜色的小花，还有一些小石子，磨成粉，能做成五颜六色的颜料。好开心！我能把河岸边斑斑点点的阳光和影子画出来了！
content.en: A grown-up lady called <s>  arklite  </s> Arclight arrived at camp. She is very artzy and amazing. She taught me to gather flowrs of different colors and special stones, and then we grinded them together to make really colorful powders. Im so happy! I can finally draw the sunlight and shadows reflecting off the creek!

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 颜料用完了，但我记得那些花长在哪儿。不用麻烦哥哥和孤光姐姐，我自己就能找到，然后画画给他们看！
content.en: I ran out of the colors but i remember where the flowers grows. So im not going to bother karja or Miss Arclight cos I can find them on my own and then draw very nice pictures of them!

content.cn: 它们！弱小！
content.en: DEYS WEAK!

content.cn: 雾火会烧穿它们的喉咙！
content.en: HAZEFYRE SHALL SKORCH DEYR THROTTS!

content.cn: 这么大的门，也挡不住我们！
content.en: DEYR JAI-ENT GATES WILL NOT STOP US!

content.cn: 头领！聪明！
content.en: BAWWS IS SO SMART!

content.cn: 头领，赐福！未来，荣光！
content.en: BAWS BLESSES! OUR FUU-CHUR IS GLOOORRRY!

content.cn: 拒绝的人，弱小的人，都死了！
content.en: ALL DEE-NAI-ERS AND WEAK TRASH ARE DED!

content.cn: 它们不配被赐福！
content.en: THEY DO NOT DESURV DA BLESSINS!

content.cn: 不要当拒绝的人！
content.en: DO NOT BE A DEE-NAI-ER!

content.cn: 第58届全联盟工团工人代表大会召开在即，四号谷地的代表们即将启程前往“城市母亲”。
content.en: The 58th Worker Representatives' Congress of the UWST is about to start. The representatives of Valley IV will be heading to Mat' Gorodov, the "mother of cities".

content.cn: 我理解各位工友的激动与喜悦，
content.en: Crew, I understand your excitement and happiness.

content.cn: 但请不要再试图将物资塞给代表们，避免干扰他们的行程，
content.en: Nevertheless, PLEASE DO NOT try to shove supplies to the representatives as this would affect their itinerary.

content.cn: 代表们的行程及所需的物资已经统一安排。
content.en: Every representative's traveling plans and supplies have been arranged.

content.cn: 请各位工友尊重代表们的休息时间，晚上十点后烦请不要再找代表们反馈意见。
content.en: And please respect the break time of our representatives. PLEASE DO NOT visit the representatives to convey your feedback or suggestions.

content.cn: 谢谢！
content.en: Thank you!

content.cn: 他们还是没有发现我，谢天谢地，源石技艺能让我在这片复杂的色彩中“隐身”。
content.en: Thank Talos they didn't find me. My Originium Arts helped me to "hide" in this complex array of colors.

content.cn: 不管是谁看到这条消息，我希望你能把情况上报给安全局，也可以想办法去枢纽区基地通知终末地。
content.en: To the one who find this note, I hope you can report the situation to the Security Bureau and find a way to inform the Endfielders at the Hub Base.

content.cn: 裂地者的头领很危险。她的力量很诡异，我从没见过那种源石技艺。
content.en: The one leading the Landbreakers is extremely dangerous. She wields a strange power. I have never seen Originium Arts of her sort.

content.cn: 他们应该是从地下管道里先钻进来了一批，这群人直接打开了要塞大门，那个女人，打谁都只用一下……
content.en: A band of them probably used the underground tunnels to infiltrate the place and then opened the fortress gates. That woman ... she destroys everyone with a single move...

content.cn: 我被那个喷火的大块头打飞，几乎嵌进了墙角。万幸，他们似乎把我当成了死人……
content.en: A huge flamethower brute knocked me off my legs. Almost smashed me into the wall, he did. Fortunately, the rest of them left me for dead...

content.cn: 不用担心我，虽然受了点伤，但我还在用自己的方法“战斗”。
content.en: No need to worry about me. I may be wounded, but I am still "fighting" them in my way.

title.en: Note Stuffed in A Wall Crack

content.cn:
我的伤越来越重，怕是快不行了。一边是裂地者，一边是摆脱不掉的迷雾。
我给罗莎发了求助信号，但是她没有来。
content.en:
My wounds are getting worse. I don't think I'll make it. There are Landbreakers and an inescapable haze. 
I've sent Rosa a distress call but she never came.

content.cn: 我理解她，在这片荒野上，没有谁值得自己以身犯险。
content.en: I finally understood what she meant. The wilderness is unforgiving. Nobody is worth dying for.

content.cn: 如果你见到罗莎，请把我的遗书交给她，我永远爱她。
content.en: If you ever see Rosa, please give her my will. I've always loved her.

content.cn:
有个不长眼的小混蛋躲在上面已经一天了，找个时间把他赶走。
不要让我浪费时间在这种屁事上，你们动作快一点，要做的事情还有很多
content.en:
Sum bluddy sneek has been hiding up dere for a day. Get the worm out of dere. 
Dun make me waste time on blasturd blightry like this. We got things to do.

content.cn: 哥，我觉得你应该来四号谷地工作。
content.en: Brother, I think you should come work at Valley IV.

content.cn: 虽然你总是觉得这个地方有点偏僻，但是偏僻有偏僻的好处：首先这个足够偏僻的地方，无论是天使还是裂地者都看不上，足够安全；其次，这个地方“活力十足”，就拿我工作的采石场来说吧，我们这里有品酒会、健身竞赛、徒手攀岩大赛、美丽矿石品鉴大会……活动多得很，我们自娱自乐的水平，高。
content.en: You keep thinking the place is out in the middle of nowhere, but that's exactly where it shines. Valley IV is safe. Neither the Aggeloi nor Landbreakers are interested in this stretch of frontier turf. There's also plenty of fun to be had at this place. I work at the Quarry and we got tons of events that include wine-tasting parties, body building competitions, barehanded rock climbing races, and mineral beauty pageants. And the best part is we're always coming up with more.

content.cn: 我最近在和一位老人家学习徒手攀岩，这位是四号谷地开辟之初的建设者，听说甚至当年和英雄阿伯莉关系很好……但别看老人家年岁已高，这攀岩水平，用炎国话来讲，我毫不夸张——他能做到“如履平地”。
content.en: I'm learning barehanded rock climbing from this really old veteran. Used to be part of the first crew to start building UW sites in Valley IV, and a close friend of the legendary hero Aburrey... Despite being so old, the veteran made climbing look like that Yan idiom: "Coasting along even ground." And I'm not exaggerating.

content.cn: 老人家待人和善，对谁都笑眯眯的，教了我不少本事。
content.en: The veteran is really kind and smiles at everyone. Taught me plenty of tricks too.

content.cn: 总之你快点来，咱们兄弟二人共创辉煌指日可待。
content.en: Anyway, just get your sorry arse here. Together, our brotherhood shall achieve great glory.

content.cn: 天哪，简直是天崩地裂！难道四号谷地遇袭了？赶快做好撤离准备。
content.en: BY TALOS! The sky is literally raining down on us! Is Valley IV getting attacked? We better get started on the evac.

content.cn: 万幸因为采石场即将关停，手边东西都收拾得差不多了，万幸。
content.en: Fortunately for us we cleaned up most of our stuff here since the Quarry is getting shutdown soon. We got really lucky.

content.cn: 兄弟姐妹们，曾为阿伯莉采石场，为四号谷地流过血与汗的人们。
content.en: Fellow crew mates! Everyone who once shed blood and sweat for the Aburrey Quarry and Valley IV!

content.cn: 我想采石场关停是存在隐情的，上面以石料硬度密度不达标为理由要关停采石场，这我可以理解，但这件事为什么这么突然？从正式通知到准备撤离甚至没几天……
content.en: They're not telling us everything about the shutdown. I can understand why we have to close the Quarry because the rocks aren't hard or dense enough. But why is this so sudden? And the official evac notice was announced within days...

content.cn: 如果你们和我一样，也想知道其中的“所以然”，请联系<@nar.mark>■■■■■■■■■■■■</>。
content.en: If you share my thoughts and wanna know "why" this is happening, call <@nar.mark>■■■■■■■■■■■■</>.

content.cn: 唉，该走就走吧。
content.en: Ugh. If we gotta go, we gotta go.

content.cn: 调岗又不是要让咱们在荒地上饿死，不就是要关了采石场，换个地方工作嘛，多大点事。
content.en: A reassignment isn't a wildlands exile where we might starve to death. They're just shutting down the Quarry and moving us to another place to work. How serious can this get?

content.cn: 咱这采石场，大伙儿凭良心讲，这几年产量怎么样，自己心里没数？
content.en: Speaking of the Quarry, just look at the yield and figures. Be honest with yourself. We aren't the role models of productivity.

content.cn: 换到自动化农场也好，换到肉联厂也罢，都一样能出力嘛。
content.en: A new job at the auto-farms or meat-packing plant would be great. At least we can still be useful.

content.cn: 万一大伙儿直接被打包送到一处新采石场呢？这都是说不定的事。
content.en: Maybe they'll ship the entire crew to a brand new quarry. It might just happen.

content.cn: 多大的人了，不是怂了吧？觉得换了个地方就变成废物了？
content.en: You're grown-ups, so act like one. Changing places isn't going to make you a piece of deadweight.

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>年<@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日至<@nar.mark>■■</>年<@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■■■</>, <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</> to <@nar.mark>■■■■</>, <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 供能高地其他超域试验进行次数：4次。
content.en: Power Plateau Æther Test Runs: 4.

content.cn: 阿伯莉之石读数异常次数：4次。
content.en: Anomalous readings from the Stone of Aburrey: 4.

content.cn: 判断结果：完全吻合，阿伯莉之石具有超域相关的某种属性，虽运作原理未解明，但我们还是尽快关闭采石场吧。
content.en: CONCLUSION: A perfect match. The Stone of Aburrey has a mysterious link to the Æther. I don't know how this works, but I believe we should shut down the Quarry as quickly as we can.

title.cn: 与供能高地相关的记录

content.cn: 谁能想到一次再普通不过的实验室扩建能造成这样的影响，我们一开始只是想扩充一个样品保存间……
content.en: It was just an ordinary lab expansion. Nobody knew the results could be so serious. We just wanted a bigger sample storage room...

content.cn: 也不知道最早挖到那东西的工人们怎么样了，身体有没有受到影响。
content.en: I don't know what happened to the crew mates who unearthed that thing. Hope they're doing well.

content.cn: 大家为了纪念阿伯莉奶奶，才给它取名为阿伯莉之石，但把一个完全未知的物体叫“阿伯莉”也太草率了……
content.en: People call it the Stone of Aburrey in honor of Granny Aburrey. But you can't simply call that unknown entity as "Aburrey". That's so insensitive...

content.cn: 它真的不会猛地爆炸，杀死四号谷地所有人吗？
content.en: Will it trigger a violent explosion? Will it kill everyone in Valley IV?

content.cn: 不过，这也可能是我的悲观主义作祟。
content.en: But this might be another episode of my pessimism.

content.cn: 只是挖到阿伯莉之石，挖掘工作就被叫停了，谁知道下面还有什么……万一是让人类技术大踏步飞跃的前文明资料库呢？
content.en: They stopped the digging when we unearthed the Stone of Aburrey. Who knows what's down there...? Maybe a Precursor data vault capable of propelling our science and tech to greater heights!

content.cn: 唉，虽然但是、虽然但是，有点对不起佩妮奶奶，我给她的石料分析报告是修改过的。
content.en: Ugh. Well, anyway, kinda feel bad about this, especially to Granny Penny. They fudged the numbers in the stone quality analysis report I submitted to her.

content.cn: 各位超域试验场的工友，你们好。
content.en: Greetings, fellow crew mates of the Æther Test Site.

content.cn: 阿伯莉采石场现需超域试验次数记录，请允许我单位研究人员进行权限<@nar.mark>■■</>以下内容的调阅。
content.en: The Aburrey Quarry currently requires records of the Æther testing runs. Please grant our scientists authority level <@nar.mark>■■</> to access the following contents.

content.cn: 谢谢。
content.en: Thanks.

content.cn: 多谢你，老哥，我还有事情要查，就不等你回来了。
content.en: Thanks, bro. I won't wait around 'cos I got some investigations to do.

content.cn: 箱子里存着的，以前采出的石料留样我已经拿走了。
content.en: I've taken away the excavation rock samples from the box.

content.cn: 我会接着和其他人聊聊，你所说的“在接到撤离通知的前几天听到了奇怪的嗡鸣声”，对我帮助很大，感谢你。
content.en: I'll keep talking to the others. Your report of "weird humming noises just a few days before the evac notice" is really helpful. Thanks for telling me about that.

content.cn: 期待，采石场要是彻底关了，我会去哪呢？
content.en: Looking forward to this. But if they completely shut down the Quarry, where should I go?

content.cn: 福卡自动农场，还是去肉联厂？虽说我在这出生、学习、长大，虽说调去周边也没有离四号谷地太远……
content.en: Fokka Hydroponic Complex? How about the meat-packing plant? I was born and raised here. Got my share of re-assignments but none of them was really far from Valley IV...

content.cn: 但我至少迈出了一步！
content.en: But at least I took a step forward!

content.cn: 我还会迈出很多步，迈到荒地上去，迈到铁誓军前线去！
content.en: I shall continue my march! My march shall go deep into the wildlands and bring me right to the Oathkeepers' frontlines!

content.cn: 走遍塔卫二！
content.en: I shall march all across Talos-II!

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>年<@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■■■</>, <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 有至少十人提到了奇怪的嗡鸣声，难道是地震？可我没有任何感觉……没有这样的道理，我还需要调查。
content.en: At least 10 individuals reported the strange humming noise. Was it an earthquake? But I didn't feel anything... None of this makes sense. My investigation must continue.

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>年<@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■■■</>, <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 我需要更多的线索，已经贴好了我的联系方式。
content.en: I need more clues. I've posted my contact info.

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>年<@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■■■</>, <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 有几个工人提前离开了采石场，共性是他们都参加了那边地下实验室的扩建工作……那边的工作人员也都提前撤了……这很奇怪。
content.en: Several crew mates left the Quarry early. All of them worked on the expansion of the underground labs... Everyone who worked there got evacced early too... This is really odd.

content.cn: 我需要借，或者“借”一张实验室权限卡，设备部的维修权限卡也可以。
content.en: I need to get (or "borrow") a lab access card. A maintenance access card from the Facilities Division might work.

content.cn: 虽说我一个电工，对石料没有那么熟悉，但我在采石场这几年也学了不少。
content.en: I know I'm just an electrician and mineralogy is not my field of expertise, but I learned a fair share about rocks and stones at the Quarry.

content.cn: 采石场这石头也看不出有什么异常，这么着急关停做什么？
content.en: The stones from the Quarry look pretty normal. Why are they shutting this place down?

content.cn: 还有，实验室的定期电路检修还搞不搞了，你们谁帮我问问……
content.en: And what about the regular electrical checks and maintenance at the lab? Can someone ask around about this...?

content.cn: 我估计会被分到自动化农场的温控车间，没多远，但估计哥几个再想碰面就不像现在这么容易了，起码得一两个月才能有空见一次。
content.en: I probably get assigned to auto-farm temperature controls. Not far off but we can only get together every month or two when everyone's free.

content.cn: 但这也太突然了，前一天还干得好好的，第二天就说关停采石场？这是什么情况？
content.en: This came right out of the blue. Things were great yesterday and suddenly they made the decision to shut down the place. What's going on in the Quarry?

content.cn: 别说什么农场离这也就一两小时路程，一两分钟我都不走！
content.en: What do you mean it's just one or two hours of traveling to the farm? It can be right next to me and I still won't leave!

content.cn: 采石场是我家，“星体”都没赶走我，现在因为采石场石料不达标了，就要把它关停？要把我调岗？
content.en: The Quarry's my cozy crib. Even Astarron didn't get me to budge. And now we're shutting it down and getting me another assignment? Just because the rocks are crumbly?

content.cn: 我今天就在这儿不动了！哪怕调到试验场我也不去！
content.en: I'm staying and won't be going nowhere! Even an assignment to the Test Site won't get me moving. Not today!

content.cn: 有人看到我的权限卡没？
content.en: Anyone saw my access card?

content.cn: 我出去吃个饭它就不见了，应该是掉到了采石场的岩缝里。
content.en: I went out for a meal and it went missing... Maybe I dropped it into a crevice between the blocks of stone.

content.cn: 唉，要补一下了。
content.en: Ugh. Time to submit a missing card application.

content.cn: （第三期）
content.en: (Issue 3)

content.cn: 还在为失去源石大树而担忧吗？还在为日益减少的配给而烦恼吗？没关系，这就教会你几条简单的回收再利用小技巧：
content.en: Still worried about the loss of the Great Originium Oak? Vexed about the ever-dwindling rations? Have no fear! We got some easy tips for recycling and reusing the trash:

content.cn: 将用源石技艺冷冻出的冰块放入源石冷冻设备中，能有效减少源石设备能耗，并降低设施故障概率。
content.en: Place blocks of ice created using Originium Arts in Originium fridges to reduce energy use and make your Originium appliances last longer without repairs.

content.cn: 在煮饭时，炊具上层可以蒸羽兽蛋，省火省时，还节约资源。
content.en: When cooking rice, put fowlbeast eggs on the top layer of the cooker to steam them. This saves you fuel, time, and resources.

title.cn: 泛黄的《回收利用小技巧》

content.cn: 为了应对失去源石大树后四号谷地可能出现的物资缺口，据四号谷地《关于家用源石设备再利用建议实施细则》，本店提供以下服务：
content.en: To combat potential resource shortages in Valley IV following the loss of the Great Originium Oak, pursuant to the Recommended Rules for the Implementation of Recycling of Household Originium Appliances, this store will be offering the following services:

content.cn: 1. 对家用源石设备进行专业的清洗、修复和翻新；
content.en: 1. Cleaning, repairing, and renewing of household Originium appliances;

content.cn: 2. 对废弃家用源石设备进行估值，并用等价物资进行替换；
content.en: 2. Appraisal of discarded household Originium appliances, and exchanging of said appliances with supplies of equal value;

content.cn: 3. 代为用家用源石设备替换其他物资（替换后，会根据实际所得物资进行分成）。
content.en: 3. Trading of household Originium appliances for other supplies (the owner will receive a share of the supplies acquired from a successful trade).

content.cn: 我仍愿意听你说那些稍显幼稚的梦。
content.en: I'm still willing to listen to those rather childish dreams of yours.

content.cn: 我仍愿意和你一起唱歌给孩子们听。
content.en: I'm still willing to sing those songs to the children.

content.cn: 我仍愿意看你描绘那些幻想中的风景。
content.en: I'm still willing to see you draw those worlds of fantasy.

content.cn: 我仍愿意装作不知你那些小小的恶作剧。
content.en: I'm still willing to ignore those pranks you play on me.

content.cn: 我仍后悔没有和你一起走上那座山。
content.en: I still regret not scaling that mountain with you.

content.cn: <@nar.quote>这么多年过去，我终于能来见你了，阿伯莉。</>
content.en: <@nar.quote>So many years have passed, darling. I can finally see you again, Aburrey.</>

content.cn: ……诚然，我也不愿意关停采石场，采石场是我们在四号谷地计划建设起的第一处大型开发区域，但“石料资源枯竭”，以及“石料质量不合格”的问题，我相信采石场无法解决。
content.en: ...None of us wanted to shut down the Quarry. It's the very first large mining operation we planned and built in Valley IV. However, "depleted mineral veins" and "sub-standard mineral quality" are problems that the Quarry can't fix.

content.cn: 你知道我在说什么，老朋友。
content.en: You know what I'm talking about, old friend.

content.cn: 阿伯莉采石场……阿伯莉老师是我们的英雄，或许别人只在展览室里，在广播里听过她的故事，但你和我不一样。
content.en: The Aburrey Quarry is named after Master Aburrey... She's the legendary crew hero of the UW. You probably read about her story in museum exhibits or radio broadcasts, but I'm different.

content.cn: 在采石场建设收尾阶段，阿伯莉老师选择爬上山顶，牺牲自己炸塌山体，阻止天使集群冲进来，给所有人争取了时间……你认为她在保护什么？
content.en: When the Quarry was near completion, Master Aburrey scaled the peaks and blew herself up to create a rockslide. Her sacrifice blocked the Aggeloid host and bought everyone time. What do you think she was trying to protect?

content.cn: 她的心血是什么？是这些工业建筑，还是资源？你知道的，都不是，是四号谷地的人民，是她的朋友，她的工友，她教室里的孩子们。
content.en: Why did she push herself so hard? Is it because she cared about the factory buildings or the minerals beneath this place? You know she cared about none of that. She fought for the Valley folk, her friends, fellow crew mates, and children in her classroom.

content.cn: 现在，教室里的孩子们——也就是你和我，理应保护她的心血，理应让所有人远离危险……
content.en: Now it's up to the children who studied in her class to protect what she fought for. I'm talking about you and me. We must get everyone as far away from danger as possible.

content.cn: ……我偶尔也会将面前的山丘看作一道又一道壁垒，它似乎是一座监牢，一块又一块方方正正的砖石垒下来，把我围在中间。
content.en: ...I occasionally thought of the hills as barriers that kept things out, but they now resemble prison walls. The massive blocks of stone of this Quarry keep me trapped in this place.

content.cn: 而我就像是监狱角落处的源石虫，或者其他什么古怪的昆虫——
content.en: And I feel like an Originium Slug or a strange critter crawling about the corner of this great prison —

content.cn: 就这么一点一点、一点一点地啃着面前的砖，然后……好像也没什么然后。
content.en: I spend my day chipping and gnawing at the massive blocks of stone, and then... And then there is nothing much else to say, really.

content.cn: 先把牙齿磨光，再把骨骼磨碎，万千话语，就都在一个“磨”字上了。
content.en: I'll just chip and gnaw till all my teeth grind down to nothing. Then I'll keep chipping and gnawing till my bones grind down to dust. This is just a big ol' grinder.

content.cn: 这样看，这座采石场停工也挺好的。
content.en: Come to think of it, maybe it's a good thing that the Quarry is shutting down.

content.cn: 为什么这么快就要关采石场，这么快就让我们撤走？
content.en: Why are they shutting down the Quarry so soon? And why are they asking us to evac so quickly?

content.cn: 或许这不该我操心，但我仍需要真相。
content.en: Maybe I shouldn't worry about this, but I need the truth.

content.cn: 石料硬度密度不达标只是托词，我需要知道其中的“所以然”。
content.en: Deteriorating stone hardness and density are just excuses. I need to know "why".

content.cn: 一张有些泛黄的工团人员合照，正中间拿着奖章的女性似乎有些眼熟。
content.en: A slightly discolored group photo of UWST crew mates. The lady at the center with the medal in her hand looks quite familiar.

content.cn: 照片后面的字迹有些模糊了，依稀能看清的部分写着：
content.en: There is slightly smudged writing on the back of the photograph. You can barely make out these words:

content.cn: 第一届阿伯莉采石场优秀工人表彰大会纪念合照
content.en: Group photo for the First Aburrey Quarry Crew Mate Commendation

content.cn: （从左往右）伍德 斯威特 佩妮 莫尔斯 卡琳
content.en: FROM LEFT: Wood, Swaiter, Penny, Morse, Carlyn

content.cn: 注：除了佩妮，所有人的名字旁都被人手写了一个年份。
content.en: NOTE: Dates have been scribbled next to everyone's name except for Penny.

content.cn: 各位工友，请立刻避难。
content.en: Crew mates! EVAC at once.

content.cn: 我们已经在隧道旁和安全局工作人员会合。
content.en: We've already met up with Security Bureau personnel next to the tunnel.

content.cn: 找到供电的设备。
content.en: FIND TEH POWER MUHSHEEN.

content.cn: 砸了。
content.en: BREAK AND SMASH IT.

content.cn: 断掉里面的电。
content.en: CUT OFF THE POWER INSIDE.

title.cn: 画着涂鸦的裂地者纸条

content.cn: 感谢大家提供的源石样本！广域施术单元已经被压缩到工作台能放下的大小！太赞了！
content.en: Thank you, everyone, for your Originium samples! The large area Arts Unit is now small enough to fit on a lab bench! And that is AWESOME!

content.cn: 周末在检修平台测试，测试完还有派对，大家都要来哦！
content.en: We got a weekend test scheduled at the repair platform. There'll be a party after a test. Be there or be square!

content.cn: 我准备了吃的喝的！最后还有神秘嘉宾的演出哦。
content.en: Food and refreshments available! PLUS a special performance by a mystery VIP!

content.cn: <@nar.quote>我怀疑这个神秘嘉宾是那家伙的什么“小暴鸰”，大家多少还是带点防护设备过去……</>
content.en: <@nar.quote>I have a feeling this mystery VIP will be that "Tweety-Bomb". If you're attending, you better get suited up in decent PPE...</>

content.cn: 箱子里装着预防性抑制剂，记得一周打一针。
content.en: This crate contains preventive suppressants. Give yourself one shot every week.

content.cn: “开炉”时还是存在矿石病感染风险的，都小心点。
content.en: People still run the risk of contracting Oripathy when "kindling the furnace". Be careful.

content.cn: 收货人：伊冯
content.en: RECIPIENT: Yvonne

content.cn: 货物品名：定制1L大容量桶装免烤指甲油（粉）+防侵蚀底液+透明贴片（赠品）
content.en: GOODS: 1L tub of custom nail varnish (powder, no UV required) + Blight-proof foundation + Transparent film (FREE)

content.cn: 备注：角比较大。
content.en: NOTES: Got big horns.

content.cn: 虽然当前的源石培育效率距离我们心中的理想状态还差了很远，源石活性化水平也没有提高到让我们自己满意……
content.en: Originium cultivation efficiency is far below our ideal targets. Originium activity has also failed to reach satisfactory levels...

content.cn: 但这毕竟是数代人都在头疼的事，急是要急的，但也不急一时。
content.en: These issues have perplexed generations of scientists. I know we gotta rush things along, but things aren't that desperate yet.

content.cn: 该吃饭还是要吃饭的。
content.en: Life goes on. People gotta eat.

content.cn: 今晚食堂有烤肉宴会，都记得来。
content.en: That means: BBQ party at the canteen tonight. BE THERE.

content.cn: 园区大门即将关闭！园区大门即将关闭！园区大门即将关闭！
content.en: Park gate is closing! Park gate is closing! Park gate is closing!

content.cn: 所有人都去避难！
content.en: SEEK SAFETY! NOW!

content.cn: 别乱跑，等救援就行了！注意安全，小暴鸰已出动，小心别被它误伤！
content.en: Don't rush about. Wait patiently for rescue! The Tweety-Bombs have been launched. Be careful and don't become a collateral!

content.cn: 这一个月，最新的这一“炉”源石长势喜人。
content.en: The Originium of this "furnace" showed pretty impressive growth over the last 30 days.

content.cn: 当时刚把子簇种下去时，研究员兴冲冲和我说，如果这次的实验成功，那么按照这套种植法种下去的源石，可以十二天左右就收一次，虽然比之前的种植周期只短了两天，但这两天仅是一个开始。
content.en: When I planted the crystal seed, an excited scientist told me that the Originium can be harvested every 12 days with this cultivation method. IF the test results turn out great. This is just 2 days shorter than the original process, but I call it a good start.

content.cn: 虽然整体上我们并不缺少源石，但为了长期发展，我们仍需要更多更优秀的源石。
content.en: Though we're not really low on Originium, we need BETTER Originium in the long run.

content.cn: 研究员跟我说，她想设计出一个最高效率的源石自动化种植农场，早上种下晚上就能收。
content.en: The scientist also told me that she's coming up with a highly efficient and automated Originium farm. Plant the seeds in the morning and you'll be harvesting the golden crystals by night.

content.cn: 我说她这是在做梦，但隔天晚上我就梦到了比山还高的晶簇，比在视频里看到过的源石大树还高。
content.en: I told her that she's dreaming. But then I dreamed of mountain-sized crystal clusters in the following night. Clusters that are even BIGGER than the Great Originium Oak I saw in the videos.

content.cn: 好，那我就和她一起把梦变成现实吧。
content.en: Alright then. I guess I'll work with her and turn this dream into reality.

content.cn: 我来的时候你人不在，给你带了一份我自己调的美角油，放在桌上了！
content.en: You weren't around when I arrived. I placed a bottle of my special nail varnish blend on your table!

content.cn: 我看到了你终端上的游戏进度，卡关的话，可以试试从左边连续蹲起把人卡进墙体穿门走。
content.en: I saw your progress on the terminal. If you're stuck, try spamming the squat action at the left side. That should clip your character through the walls and escape.

content.cn: 噢！最重要的是材料我已经收到啦！这批合金的冲击强度太赞了！
content.en: Oh! Almost forgot the most important thing! I received the materials! The impact strength of this alloy is simply TERRIFIC!

content.cn: 下次你们部门有新材料试用一定要先通知我！一定要！
content.en: YOU! MUST! NOTIFY ME when your department comes up with brand new materials!

content.cn: 在泰拉，源石富集之处会产生“天灾”，会导致源石晶簇猛烈生长。我们暂且抛开前辈们在文献中另外写下的，天灾时天崩地裂的恐怖景象，单独讨论它导致“晶簇生长”的部分。
content.en: "Catastrophes" tend to occur in Originium-rich areas of Terra and trigger explosive growth in Originium clusters. Let's set aside the disastrous scenes wrought by the Catastrophes described in the literature that our ancestors wrote. Instead, we should solely focus on the "cluster growths" caused by the Catastrophes.

content.cn: 研究所外，培育井中人工促成的活性源石云，虽然大小远不及它在泰拉自然环境中应有的样子，但至少在后续的晶簇生长环节中，在速度这一项上，勉强满足了我们的预期。
content.en: Active Originium clouds artificially created in cultivation shafts outside the Research Center are far smaller than their natural-occurring Terran counterparts. However, they still managed to reach our expectations for growth rates for future crystal cluster cultivation phases.

content.cn: 工人们称呼每一次实验为“开炉”，我觉得还真挺形象的。
content.en: The crew mates call every test run as "kindling the furnace". A rather accurate description of the process, if you ask me.

content.cn: 算力确实是必须的，降温装置自然也是必须的。
content.en: We need higher algorithmic capacities, and cooling facilities as well, naturally.

content.cn: 我们确实也没办法真的把二十几万吨的源石举起来，卡在一道不稳定裂隙上吧？
content.en: And we really can't simply lift an Originium formation weighing over 200,000 metric tons and jam it right in the middle of an unstable rift.

content.cn: 在遏制超域破溃的研究上，我们还有很长的路要走。
content.en: Our efforts in containing the Æther rupture still have a long way to go.

content.cn: 不过，遥远的光明是存在的。
content.en: But there's already a flicker of light in the great distance.

content.cn: 请乐观点，我亲爱的工友们，如果我们的研究继续下去，那么在不久的将来，我们一定可以将侵蚀从塔卫二根除。
content.en: Be optimistic, my fellow crew mates. If our research project continues, we're looking at total elimination of the Blight from Talos-II. And it'll take place in the not-so-distant future.

content.cn: 伊冯也在借用我那边的运算设备，要不让终末地补贴点预算？（算了我开玩笑的）
content.en: Yvonne is also borrowing my algorithmic facilities. Maybe we can ask Endfield to chip in for the budget? (Just kidding. Don't go and ask them.)

content.cn: 先说结论，如今在四号谷地一切针对源石大树的培育行为，本质上都是一种针对源石的激活行为。当然，这种激活并非是指打碎晶体外壳，让活性源石粉尘“喷发”出来，而是让它恢复应有的活性水平——泰拉的水平。
content.en: Let's skip to conclusions. All attempts to cultivate the Great Originium Oak in Valley IV essentially focus on Originium activation. Of course, this activation does not refer to breaking the Origocrust to trigger "bursts" of active Originium dust. Instead, it's an attempt to restore its original levels of activity — And by this I mean Terra-levels of activity.

content.cn: 这就代表着，我们要试着回答那个问题：源石到底发生了什么。这么多年，我们一直没有办法得到一个答案，那不如，咱们索性绕开它。
content.en: This means we must attempt to answer that question: What actually happened to Originium? Despite spending years on this, we have yet to acquire a proper answer. Since this is the case, we might as well go around it.

content.cn: 重点在于我们不知道管理员会在什么时间苏醒……
content.en: A key issue is that we do not know when the Endministrator will awaken...

content.cn: 我的方案也有缺点，找到那么多高质量的源石，再把它们拼成一棵大树，连我自己都觉得是狂想。
content.en: My plan does have its issues. Finding formations of high quality Originium and assembling them into a great oak does sound like a crazy idea to me.

title.cn: 以嫁接法复活源石大树的可能性探讨
title.en: Investigating the Potential Use of Grafting to Revive the Great Originium Oak

content.cn: 我表弟在工人之家工作，他听终末地的人说，管理员要来四号谷地？
content.en: My cousin has a job at the Worker Dorms. He heard the Endfielders talking about the Endministrator's upcoming visit to Valley IV.

content.cn: 朋友们！管理员要来四号谷地！
content.en: FRIENDS! The Endmin is coming to Valley IV!

content.cn: 我怀疑所长他们肯定已经发出请管理员到这里的邀请函了！
content.en: I have a feeling that the dean already sent out an invitation to the Endmin to visit our site!

content.cn: 哈哈！那可是种下源石大树的人！跟这位聊两句，一定能让我获得有关源石种植实验的海量灵感！
content.en: Haha! We're talking about the legend who planted the Great Originium Oak! Talking to the hero will definitely give me a load of inspirations for Originium farming!

content.cn: 这么多厂家比下来，还是菈梵朵玛的涂装颜料最好，但是太贵了！太贵了！
content.en: After multiple rounds of comparisons, La Fantoma still makes the best coating. But they're SUPER EX! OVERPRICED!

content.cn: 备忘：问人事部预支一下薪水。实在不行再问安德烈借一点！
content.en: NOTE: Ask HR to pay my wages in advance. Failing that, borrow from Andre!

content.cn: 如果是给宝贝小车用的话，是不是可以报销啊？得研究研究这个事情。
content.en: Hmm. If I use it on my baby bot, maybe I can write it off as a research-related expenditure. This warrants some serious investigation.

content.cn: 枢纽区基地，枢纽区基地，枢纽区基地，收到请回答！
content.en: HUB BASE! HUBBAH BASE! HUBBAH HUBBAH! BASE! Please respond.

content.cn: 你们收不到我就不管了……反正我不撤离！裂地者都是小问题，我有办法对付他们。
content.en: No one's picking up... Welp. Whatever. I'm not evaccing! LB pipefaces? Ffff. I got a lab full of ideas to deal with them.

content.cn: 我申请接管源石实验园区的所有数据检测接口……
content.en: I'm applying for access to all data access and inspection ports of the Originium Science Park...

content.cn: 算了，反正我打了报告你们也收不到，就当申请过了！
content.en: Ah forget it. None of you will be receiving my report anyways. SILENCE IS APPROVAL! I'll take it at that!

content.cn: 这些宝贵的数据样本要是错过了，我这辈子都不会原谅自己。
content.en: Can't afford to miss out on these valuable samples and data! I won't forgive myself if I miss this opportunity.

content.cn: 如果你们能收到信息，还是派点人过来吧。这些吸了黑雾的裂地者确实有点瘆得慌。
content.en: Oh and by the way, if you got this message, send some muscle. These LB pipefaces have been smoking something seriously dark. And they're a little annoying.

content.cn: 倒不是我怕他们……只是觉得有必要研究一下。没错！就是这样！
content.en: And I'm definitely not scared of them... I just think that uh... Oh, there's something we should really investigate! Scientifically! THAT'S RIGHT!

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: “模拟侵蚀”的曲线是不是有了一点小变化？应该不是我的错觉吧！
content.en: The Blight simulation curve looks a little off. Am I seeing things?

content.cn: 昨天我怎么忘了拍照了！该死！该死！该死！
content.en: WHY DID I NOT TAKE A PHOTO YESTERDAY! WHYY! AAARGH! I HATE MYSELF!!!

content.cn: 再算一轮试试！这次我要不眠不休地看着它。
content.en: I'll run another test! And this time, I'll stay up all night and stare at it!

content.cn: 绝望吗？不如试试往其他方向逃吧……
content.en: Feeling hopeless? Try escaping the other way...

content.cn: 我确实没想到自己会收到最高级别的警告。
content.en: Truly, I never knew I would receive a warning from the highest levels of authority.

content.cn: 那封驳回申请的邮件所驳回的不仅是一个申请，它把我长久以来的努力也否定了，这才是最让我感到委屈的地方。我坚持认为自己的研究思路没有错误，培育出优秀源石的方法一定就藏在最初那场冲突的数据中。我们的源石培育思路，无论是压缩理论，还是活性化理论……这些资料我都看过，因此我当然知道，它们最终都会绕到同一个地方，同一个起点：第一次天使战争。
content.en: The rejection mail rejected more than just an application. It rejected years of my hard work. That's why it hurts. Yet, I believe my research thesis to be the correct one. The method for cultivating quality Originium lies within the data of that great conflict. I've studied every existing Originium cultivation approach, whether based on the compression theory or the activation theory... Because I know they all trace back to the same place, the same starting point: the First Aggeloi War.

content.cn: 好，我知道你们看到这里时一定又会讲什么“不要相信野史”。但这一次，我的想法真的和“野史”没有关系，毕竟咱们之中最喜欢研究历史的人——愿他万事顺利——已经去武陵深造了。
content.en: I know you might be spouting things like "stop believing in folklore" when you reach this point. But I assure you, my thesis has nothing to do with "folklore". Our member most devoted to the field of history — may fortune shine upon him in everything he does — has gone to Wuling to further his studies.

content.cn: 我们的研究是绕不开第一次天使战争的，管理员与四十位英雄一起终结了这场战争。作战技巧、源石技艺……最强的四十个人，他们在最初，在第一线见证了最激烈的冲突，所以我当然需要阅读当时那四十位英雄的作战记录。哪怕这次失败了，之后我还会继续申请的。
content.en: The First Aggeloi War is inescapable for our research. It was ended by the Endministrator and forty other heroes. The most powerful forty individuals ... in terms of combat techniques and the Originium Arts. They were there from the beginning, fighting on the frontlines and witnessing the war's most intense engagements. This is why I must peruse their combat records. You may have rejected my previous application, but I shall persist and submit more.

content.cn: 大不了我就去北边，去加入铁誓军，这样至少能接触到萨索堡主，他是四十位英雄之一，他一定有答案。
content.en: And if all else fails, I will go north and join the Order of Steel Oath. At least then I could meet Castellan Zasso. He was one of the forty. He will have the answers I need.

content.cn: 我老了，现在就跟这些花花草草为伴。
content.en: I'm old. These flowers and plants are my only companion.

content.cn: 但我也不算太老，至少还有跟天使们拼了的能耐。
content.en: And I'm not that old anyway. I still got what it takes to fight the rock buggers.

content.cn: 那三根锚点也不是我这辈子见过最大的，孩子们，不用害怕。
content.en: And I've seen bigger Ankhors than those three. There's nothing to fear, children.

content.cn: 无非就是再炸一次源石大树！
content.en: We'll just detonate the Great Originium Oak! ONE MORE TIME!

content.cn: 世代摇篮剩下的大树残骸，想办法再引爆一次的话，能把周围的裂地者和天使一并送上天！
content.en: We still have the Oak stump at the Cradle of the Ages. If we find a way to rig it for detonation, we'll send every pipeface and buggerloid around it to Talos!

content.cn: 问题是那些震荡波怎么办……
content.en: But how do we get past the shockwaves...?

content.cn: 有没有可能用源石技艺，直接把负责起爆的人和设备扔过去？
content.en: Can we try using the Originium Arts? We can throw the demolition crew and charges over.

content.cn: <@nar.quote>营地情况没有变得太恶劣，好像不用采取这么极端的计划了。</>
content.en: <@nar.quote>Situation at the camp is not that bad. This extreme option doesn't seem that necessary anymore.</>

content.cn: 哇！设备变多了，工位也多了，甚至还多了两台自动贩售机……
content.en: Wow! More machines! And more seats! We even got two more auto-vendors...

content.cn: 这还是我们那个转个身都会撞到同事的小监测站吗？
content.en: This doesn't feel like the super cramped monitoring station anymore. Used to be a place where you can just turn around bump into someone by accident.

content.cn: 来来来，让我们一起赞美一下封闭扩建计划，然后研究一下怎么庆祝重启。
content.en: Alright, crew! Time to offer praises most high to our Closed for Expansion project. Then we should get together and figure out how to celebrate the reopening.

content.cn: 庆祝会要不要去矿区营地办？正好让大家知道咱们这里不是废弃了，只是因为扩建封闭了一段时间现在才开而已……
content.en: Should we celebrate this at the Mining Camp? Gotta let everyone know that our site wasn't abandoned. We were just closed for expansion...

content.cn: 我已经推倒了所有梯子，只留了两天的食物和水。
content.en: I pushed all the ladders off and left myself 2 days' worth of food and water.

content.cn: 营地人手不够，天知道那震荡波什么时候停下，天知道震荡波停下来以后会不会有更多裂地者涌进来。
content.en: We don't have enough people in the camp. Nobody knows when the blighted shockwaves would stop. And nobody knows if more pipefaces would charge into this place if the shockwaves do stop.

content.cn: 我们需要更多情报。
content.en: We need more intel.

content.cn: 接下来我会翻山而行，侦察各处。
content.en: I shall use the mountain trails to observe the situation from various locations.

content.cn: 别小看人类的身体素质啊！天使！
content.en: Buggerloids! Never underestimate human endurance and strength!

content.cn: 裂地者算什么东西？
content.en: And the pipefaced Landbreakers? Fff.

content.cn: 鼎盛时怎么样？他们的大首领，那个叫什么雅各布的……我爷爷当年还见过他呢。
content.en: Height of their power? So what. They even got a big chief called Jakub something... My grandfather even met that guy.

content.cn: 无非就是以前从塞什卡偷了点东西，有了点小气候……最后不还是被推平了？
content.en: He's just some petty thief who stole something from Seš'qa, got his breaker grooves on... And finally gets crushed by the Banders.

content.cn: 雅各布都死了几十年了，这些在荒地里求活的残党也想毁了四号谷地？做梦！
content.en: Jakub has been pushing up daisies for decades, and somehow these dirt-groveling remnants want to destroy Valley IV? Dream on!

content.cn: 头疼……感觉画不出来……
content.en: My head's hurting... I don't think I can draw this...

content.cn: 虽然看着照片，只靠想象也能画出源石大树，但这种画总感觉缺了点什么……
content.en: I can reference the photo and add a dash of imagination to paint the Great Originium Oak... But I can't... It always feels that I'm missing something...

content.cn: 好像是缺了一点史诗感……
content.en: I think it's called "epicness"...

content.cn: 早知道就不和他们打赌，说三天之内一定画出让所有人满意的源石大树风景画了。
content.en: Should've not brag about this from the beginning. A crowd-pleasing panoramic painting of the Great Originium Oak in three days? What was I thinking?

content.cn: 算了，尽全力画就是了，输了无非就是去营地食堂刷盘子。
content.en: Ugh. Just do my best, I guess. I'll just end up scrubbing plates at the camp if I lose.

content.cn: 我做了一个梦，梦见血红的河流劈开大山。
content.en: I had a dream. A vision of a blood red river splitting open a mountain.

content.cn: 在血河里的是“星体”，它回来了，我看着它，心中只有绝望。
content.en: Astarron is immersed in this river. It has returned. I gazed upon it. Despair was the only thing I felt.

content.cn: 最后，我只能转身向河流下游狂奔，走到大树的残骸下，树上燃起了火，将我，将星体，一并烧尽。
content.en: I thus turned around and ran downstream, down to the ruins of the Oak. The great tree burned, and the fire consumed me, Astarron, and everything else.

content.cn: 我的梦是否在逐一应验？
content.en: Is my dream coming true?

content.cn: 我们该如何是好？
content.en: What should we do?

content.cn: 在这边吹风的时候，会让我想起在宏山那边种地的日子。
content.en: The wind here reminds me of my farming days back in Hongshan.

content.cn: 如果不是为了到这里跟孩子他妈结婚，我可能会在宏山种一辈子地吧。
content.en: I probably farm for my entire life if not for settling down the kid's mama.

content.cn: 种地真的很好。
content.en: I like farming.

content.cn: 看看这山谷里的源石簇，都是我种下的。
content.en: Look at all these Originium formations in the valley. I planted them all.

content.cn: 虽然整体活性不比野地里那些三个月收一茬，然后再等三个月的源石，但研究园那群小年轻搞的这些新品种，这些半个月一收的源石，长得可真够快。
content.en: Overall activity isn't as good as the wild clusters that can be harvested once every three months. However, the Science Park variety developed by the young eggheads grows fast and can be harvested once every two weeks.

content.cn: 只是有点不经用。
content.en: They're just not that useful.

content.cn: 真想看看我高祖父那辈人用过的源石，它应该没有书里写得那么吓人吧？
content.en: I really wanna see the Originium that my great-great-grandfather used. Were they really that scary?

content.cn: 我清点了这批集装箱……这批东西存放的时间是否有些太长了……
content.en: I inspected this batch of containers... And their contents ... have been around for quite a while ... quite a long while, actually...

content.cn: 我甚至在里面找到了第一次天使战争时期的支援罐头……
content.en: I even found tinned provisions for the troops fighting in the First Aggeloi War...

content.cn: 认真的吗，朋友们？
content.en: Seriously now, people.

content.cn: 接下来再翻的话，我总不能翻出什么究极兵器吧，比如翻出个天马的银枪？
content.en: I guess if I keep up with this container diving, I might find some kickass super weapon like a Pegasian Silverlance.

content.cn: 别让我再抓到你们骑着摩托飞跃这边的山崖！
content.en: Don't let me catch anyone trying to bike jump these cliffs! AGAIN!

content.cn: 年纪轻轻不惜命是吧？明天就把你们挂在吊机上吹吹风冷静冷静！
content.en: Young and daring, eh? I'll hang you out to dry from a crane arm. A healthy serving of valley wind will cool you down!

content.cn: 你家菜单能不能换换？
content.en: Can you change your menu?

content.cn: 二十多年了，超过二十样了吗？
content.en: It's been 20 years. Look at this pathetic selection.

content.cn: 异香石炖肉，肉炖异香石……
content.en: Aggagrit meat roast. Roasted meat with aggagrit. Meat on roasted aggagrit. Seriously now...

content.cn: 老东西，上次给你抓来的虬兽算是糟蹋在你手上了。
content.en: Can't believe you wasted that perfect Nidwyrm I caught. Old slacker fool.

content.cn: 都是老东西，咱们两个谁也别说谁，你只说菜式少，怎么不说你二十多年一直隔三差五地来，早就把菜吃遍了？
content.en: And you're the worst patron ever. Do you know why you complain about the menu? Because you keep coming back. Can't believe I have to serve Your Royal Atrocious Piehole for 20 years.

content.cn: 我要去塞梦珂了，有没有什么需要我带的？
content.en: I'm going to Simonch. Need me to take anything along?

content.cn: ……我还真答不上来……“为什么要去塞梦珂？”……感觉回答你：我就是想去，会有点敷衍。这个问题是不是应该用那种比较有诗意的，就是那种很文学的答案来回答？
content.en: ...I prolly don't have an answer to that... "Why Simonch?" ..."Oh, I just feel like going." That sounds pretty fake. Maybe I should come up with something poetic, an answer worthy of literature.

content.cn: 答不上来，只是感觉一辈子不去一次“母亲”那里的话，会有一种错过了什么的感觉……但去到塞梦珂呢？
content.en: I can't answer that. It just felt that I'd be missing out something if I didn't visit the Mother... But how should I regard the trip to Simonch?

content.cn: 这是圆满还是结束？
content.en: Should I call it a full cycle, or a conclusion of a journey?

content.cn: 不，我不太敢想，这会让我觉得我的生命已经可以结束了。
content.en: No. Just thinking about it is making me afraid. I might start feeling that my life is already done.

content.cn: 每次看到有人心生绝望——无论是对生活感到绝望，还是对人类感到绝望——我都会拉他们来这里。
content.en: Every time I see a soul brooding in despair — someone giving up on life or humanity itself — I would bring them here.

content.cn: 烤两块新鲜的肉，再递给他们两瓶饮料……生活其实没什么过不去的。
content.en: Two freshly roasted fillets and two bottles of drinks... Nothing about life is unsurmountable.

content.cn: 二十几年前，这里还是一片山。我们引爆源石大树，毁灭“星体”后，大地才被撕裂成了这样。
content.en: This was place covered in hills just over twenty years ago. We detonated the Great Originium Oak to destroy Astarron. This action of ours created the gash upon the land.

content.cn: 很多人聊到“星体”，会恐惧它，我不会。我能看到人类的力量。
content.en: People talk about the Astarron with fear. I don't. The incident revealed the power of humanity to me.

content.cn: 唉，但这么多年，讲给这么多人，只有这两天刚到这里的鲁珀小姑娘能听懂我在说什么，这小姑娘绝对未来可期。
content.en: Though I've spent years talking about this to countless individuals, only the Lupo girl who just arrived two days ago understood the gist. Now that one has a great future ahead of her.

content.cn: 侵蚀和锚点袭击赶在一起，情况很危急，我们得尽快把这些能拆开的东西拆开，拼成临时的病床。
content.en: The Blight rupture happened during the Ankhorfall. Things are really desperate. We must assemble makeshift beds and stretchers quickly. Take apart anything we need to make that happen.

content.cn: 不仅是矿区，如果这里受灾程度较低，我们可以直接前往其他区域支援。
content.en: The mines weren't the only place affected. If the disaster went soft on us, we could mobilize our crew to support other areas.

content.cn:
…………
在四号谷地的侵蚀灾害爆发后，大部分的物资都是由相关工作人员按登记册的信息送至人们的居所，但仍有不少民众会外出寻找食材。据消息人士透露，一位名叫罗曼的工团成员，在谷地通道烤起了源石虫，并将其赠予了缺乏食物的难民暂居处。记者闻讯后，前往现场品尝了这一看似粗糙的烤虫串。出乎意料的是，烤虫串口感尚可，虫肉入口即化。
…………
如今的四号谷地正如二十年前，在工人们的互帮互助下，四号谷地终将渡过难关。
content.en:
......
After the Blight eruption disaster in Valley IV, most supplies were delivered by the relevant staff to the doorsteps of the workers' registered addresses. However, many of the locals are still actively foraging for food from the outdoors. Reliable sources revealed that a UWST crew mate named Roman started making flame-roasted Originium slugs at the Valley Pass and offered them, free of charge, to a local temporary shelter that ran low on food. Having heard of this, our correspondent went straight to the site and tried one of the very rustic-looking slug kebab. It turned out to be quite palatable with a soft juicy texture that melts in one's mouth.
......
The Valley IV crew mates are working closely together and helping each other out. There is no question that the Valley will endure these trying times, just as it did twenty years ago.

content.cn: ……随着源石大树被炸毁，大批工团成员前往阿伯莉采石场工作，导致矿用钻机经常因为长时间工作而损坏。为此，应联盟工团请求，环塔商会为四号谷地提供了配有散热水箱的“沙地兽”牌源石矿用钻机……
content.en: ...Following the detonation of the Great Originium Oak, many UWST crew mates went to work at Aburrey Quarry. Many mining drills broke down due to overuse. To cater to requests from the UWST, the TGCC will be supplying the Sandbeast Originium Mining Drill that features a coolant-based heat radiator...

content.cn: 批注：新型矿用钻机的引入让采石场迎来了一段时间的产量高涨，但在这之后却频繁出现矿用钻机损坏的状况。经调查，系部分外来支援工人，为了省去领取冷却水的时间，将收集到的抑制粉尘用喷淋水直接倒入散热水箱中。同时，部分工人会往水箱里投放配料，并将在采石场活动的源石虫简单处理后，放入水箱中烹煮，由此导致矿用钻机的散热性能受损。阿伯莉采石场已禁止任何工人将食物带入采石作业区，且将冷却水储备从存料处移至了工人休息站。
content.en: NOTE: The introduction of the new mining drills led to a temporary spike in productivity. However, this is quickly followed by frequent breakdowns of the new drills. An investigation revealed that supporting crew mates from other regions decided to save time acquiring coolants by filling up the radiator with recycled sprinkling water from dust control. A number of crew mates also dumped seasoning and crudely deshelled Originium slugs (often found near the Quarry) into the radiator tank for cooking. Such actions led to reduced cooling performance of the mining drills. SPECIAL NOTE: The Aburrey Quarry has enacted a rule forbidding crew mates from bringing food into the Quarry Site. Also, the coolant reservoir has been moved from the Stockpile Area to the Staff Lounge.

title.cn: 《四号谷地工作指南：阿伯莉采石场篇》

content.cn: 几本笔记邮到玛尔斯波利斯，收我五百金票？
content.en: 500 T-Creds. Just for delivering a few notebooks to Morospolis?

content.cn: 这么贵，是你们管理员开着帝江号亲自送吗？
content.en: What blightery is this? Are these notebooks getting delivered by the Endmin with the mighty Dijiang?

content.cn: 研究园那边也都是裂地者，万幸的是，我看到了柯林斯兄妹，那边有他们主持，看起来没什么大问题。
content.en: There are Landbreakers at the Science Park too. Fortunately, I saw the Collinses as well. They probably got the sitch under control.

content.cn: 咱们缓过一口气后，要不要和那边会合？
content.en: Maybe we should meet up with them once we catch a breather.

content.cn: <@nar.quote>我这是回来以后上台阶时崴了脚！不是从山上掉下来摔断了腿！</>
content.en: <@nar.quote>I just sprained my ankle at the stairs after coming back! I DID NOT FALL OFF THE MOUNTAIN OR BREAK MY LEGS!</>

content.cn: <@nar.quote>………</>
<@nar.quote>你们都和洛茜小妹说了什么啊！什么叫踢飞五个裂地者后强忍着伤痛自己爬回来的！</>
content.en: <@nar.quote>By Talos! What did you tell Rossi? I DID NOT kick the bejeepers out of 5 LBs, then crawled back to base on my own!</>

content.cn: <@nar.quote>………</>
<@nar.quote>听你们的……我就是踢飞五个裂地者后强忍着伤痛自己爬回来的！</>
content.en: <@nar.quote>FINE...! That's what I did! Kicked the bejeepers out of 5 friggin' LBs, then crawled back to base with a bone sticking out of my leg!</>

content.cn: 爸，这周我就不回家了啊，研究园这几天挺忙的。
content.en: Dad, won't be home this week. Science Park is really busy with stuff lately.

content.cn: 我们正在验证一种新的激活方法，说不定只靠四号谷地，只靠咱们就能让源石大树活过来。
content.en: We're trying to validate a new mode of activation. Maybe Valley IV is all we need to revive the Great Originium Oak.

content.cn: 如果真有这好消息，您得替我分享给詹娜奶奶，老人家不容易。
content.en: If this works, you gotta tell Granny Jenner about it. Old lady really had it tough.

content.cn: 另外，让我妈别再往肉汤里加异香石粉了，真的，求求她老人家了。
content.en: One more thing. Tell Mom to stop adding aggagrit powder to the soup. PUH-LEASE! Make sure you tell her, Dad!

content.cn: 说我保守……呵……
content.en: They told me I'm a conservative... Hurhur...

content.cn: 我知道，我们身边某些人仍是有雄心壮志的。
content.en: I know. A few of us have retained their wild ambitions.

content.cn: 四号谷地的“树”倒了二十年，但他们心里还存着建设四号谷地的执念，想把四号谷地建设成数一数二的大型科研基地，想在四号谷地大展拳脚。
content.en: The Great Oak of Valley IV had fallen for 20 years. Still, they insisted on building up the Valley and convert it into one of the biggest scientific bases of the world. They want to achieve greatness in Valley IV.

content.cn: 这是梦想吗，还是政治的延续？
content.en: Is this a dream? Or a continuation of politics?

content.cn: 天然稳定裂隙，算是好东西，可对“母亲”来说，它并没有那么珍贵。超域实验搏不来四号谷地的发展前景，只会为这里招灾引祸。
content.en: The naturally stable rift seems like a great, valuable thing. But the great Mother disagrees. The potential of Æther testing will not secure the future of Valley IV. Instead, it will only invite disaster.

content.cn: 你怎么看呢，克劳，你会和我一起压住年轻人的狂想，还是为他们摇旗呐喊？
content.en: What do you think, Crowe? Stand with me and keep the hot-blooded youths in check? Or would you rather stand with them and fan the flames?

content.cn: 头领，赐福，未来，爆破，杀死，未来，光荣，受赐，永生
content.en: BAWS, BLESSING, FUTURE, EXPLAWSHUN, DEEMOLISH, KILL, FUTURE, GLORY, BLESSED, IMMOR-TA-LE-TEEEE

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 阿伯莉之石在采石场出土。
content.en: The Stone of Aburrey was dug up at the Quarry.

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 失败了。似乎是识别方法或者接口的问题，我们或许可以用变电的思路再尝试一下。
content.en: The test failed. Perhaps it was a verification or interfacing issue. Maybe we can try a different approach by tweaking the currents.

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 那东西具有超域属性，这会是我们窥探超域的机会吗？
content.en: That thing has Æther-related properties. It might be a way for us to glimpse at the Æther itself.

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 我们能在四号谷地进行的，安全、稳定的实验，只有观察超域内部，留下图像证据这一项。
content.en: The only safe and stable tests we can perform in Valley IV ... are Ætherside observations and attempts to acquire images that can prove our work.

content.cn: 最基础的角度，最基础的一步，但所有人都会卡在这里。
content.en: But this alone was a great bottleneck for everyone. We couldn't even figure out the most fundamental and basic approach to take.

content.cn: <@nar.mark>■■</>月<@nar.mark>■■</>日
content.en: <@nar.mark>■■</>/<@nar.mark>■■</>

content.cn: 我依旧自信，人类将一步一步，一点一点地从漫长伤痛中站起身来，我们不再向谁祈求，不再恐惧这颗星球本身。
content.en: I still have faith that humanity shall slowly pick itself up from the painful devastation. We shall no longer find ourselves wanting, and we shall no longer fear this world.

content.cn: 我们要站起来，好好地看看它。
content.en: We shall get back on our feet, and look at it straight in the eyes.

content.cn: ……那么本土生物呢？遗迹、坟冢、化石，它们都在哪里？
content.en: ...What about the indigenous lifeforms? Do we have any ruins, tombs, or fossils? Where are they?

content.cn: 在人类跨过那扇门前，我们期待着看到生命留下的痕迹……
content.en: When we stepped through that gate, we were hoping to see evidence of life...

content.cn: 现在我们获得的资料实在是太少了……我合理地怀疑有人在故意抹除什么……
content.en: But we have too little data... I have reasons to suspect that someone is trying to hide something...

content.cn: 超域爆发过于突然，我们被困在这里，物资有限，各位如果有什么荒野求生菜谱（例如虫壳饼干、异香石干炒虫壳粉、草药沙拉），希望可以传授给大家。
content.en: Given the sudden nature of this Æther rupture event, we are now trapped at this location with limited supplies. PLEASE SHARE any wilderness survival recipes you have (EXAMPLES: bugshell tack, Aggagrit-flavored bugmeal noodles, or herb salad).

content.cn: 灾难难测，但灾难绝不会战胜我们。
content.en: The disaster took us by surprise, but it will never keep us down.

content.cn: 有没有哪位工友看到了我的草稿？在墙角的……是我研究了很长时间的草稿。
content.en: Did any crew mate see my design draft? It should be somewhere at the corner of the wall... And I spent a really long time on it.

content.cn: 我在锅炉填料不忙的时候，进行了严谨的科学推算，那些记录丢了实在可惜。
content.en: I would perform stringent scientific calculations when I'm not too busy feeding the boilers. Losing the data would be a real shame.

content.cn: 四号谷地，这群懦弱的东西完全阻挡不住我们，为什么？
content.en: Valley IV? These pathetic weaklings will not stop us. Why?

content.cn: 因为我们是正确的，我们是受保护的。
content.en: Because we are in the right, and we have protection.

content.cn: 必须前进。
content.en: Must press forward.

content.cn: 必须压制。
content.en: Must crush the enemies.

content.cn: 我们是被选中的，拒绝雾火的人终将被淘汰。
content.en: We are the chosen ones. Those who deny the hazefyre shall be eliminated.

content.cn: 必须相信。
content.en: Must have faith.

content.cn: 必须称颂。
content.en: Must offer the adulations.

content.cn: 头领选择了我们，我们的荣光在雾火中！
content.en: The boss has chosen us. Glory lies in the hazefyre!

content.cn: ……可那群裂地者呢？他们相信什么？什么哺育了他们？
content.en: ...What about the Landbreakers? What do they believe in? How did they grow up to become these raiders?

content.cn: 我的母亲，她是沉默的，她沉默地咀嚼着源石将我们养大。她的血液在谷地各处流淌，滋养着我们，让我们能挖掘出矿石的血肉，铸造出钢铁的骨骼，再以勇气和对未来的渴求填充灵魂。然后我们就可以挥舞着拳头，砸在荒野上，在黑暗的大地上刻下我们的名字。
content.en: My Mother does not speak. Silently she consumes Originium to raise us. Her lifeblood courses throughout the Valley. She nourishes us so that we may excavate the flesh and blood of mineral ore, cast and forge bones of steel, and fill our souls with courage and a desire to build a better future. Our Mother taught us to swing our fists at the unforgiving frontiers and carve our names upon the lands of darkness.

content.cn: 那么裂地者们呢？
content.en: But what about the Landbreakers?

content.cn: 他们的母亲是谁，是碎裂的，遍布苦难的荒野吗？
content.en: Who is their Mother? Is she the shattered wildlands filled with nothing but suffering?

content.cn: 还是说，他们是我的兄弟姐妹，是母亲走失的孩子？
content.en: Or are the LBs our long-lost siblings who have strayed from our Mother?

title.cn: 源石发电站工人的日记

content.cn: 不要畏惧死。
content.en: Do not fear death.

content.cn: 死是暂时的，死并不痛苦。
content.en: Death is temporary and inflicts no pain.

content.cn: 头领选择了我们，头领托举着我们的命。
content.en: The boss has chosen us, and lifted our lives up high.

content.cn: 近几天有许多朋友询问我，为什么神色很差，为什么黑眼圈很重……于是我仔细想了想，好像没什么严肃的理由。可能是因为一个打碎的烧瓶吧——如果真的要询问理由，怪罪给我扔在垃圾桶里的烧瓶就行了。
content.en: During the last couple of days, many friends asked why I looked so terrible, and how I got these dark circles around my eyes... I thought about it and believe it was not a big deal. I guess it's that beaker I broke. If we really need the details, I'd blame the beaker I tossed in the trash.

content.cn: 我不想听烧瓶质问我，所以把它打碎了。
content.en: I couldn't stand the beaker. It kept asking me questions, so I smashed it.

content.cn: 它问我，这样的日子还要持续多久？
content.en: It kept asking me how long. How long would these days last?

content.cn: 看向那道裂隙，什么都看不到……
content.en: I looked at that rift, and saw ... nothing...

content.cn: 我们还要在这样的雾霭中挣扎多久？
content.en: How long must we languish in this terrible fog?

content.cn: 祖父对父亲说，只需要掘开岩层，挖出更多的矿石，我们有朝一日必定能够建设出一处乐园。
content.en: My gramps told my dad that once we breach the rock stratum, we'd excavate even more ores. The wealth would eventually help us build a paradise at this very place.

content.cn: 父亲对我说，只要做好研究，将人类应用源石的技术再推动一些，我们有朝一日必定能建设出一处乐园。
content.en: My dad told me to get the science done and make Originium technology better for our civilization. The knowledge we gain would eventually help us build a paradise at this very place.

content.cn: 可是父亲。
content.en: However, father...

content.cn: 天空是灰色的。
content.en: The skies. They are gray.

content.cn: <@nar.quote>天空是灰色的。</>
content.en: <@nar.quote>The sky is gray.</>

content.cn: ……看起来也没什么进展？
content.en: ...I don't think we made any progress.

content.cn: 我想也是，但……还是乐观点吧。利用递质进行超域观测实验绝对是个好方向。
content.en: I thought so too, but ... I guess we should think positive. Using transmitters for Ætherside observations is definitely the right way to go.

content.cn: 问题是咱们这种偏远地区的，小小的研究组，怎么把递质造出来呢……也没有技术资料……
content.en: But we're just a tiny research team operating out in the middle of nowhere. How do we build a transmitter? We don't even have the technical documents for that...

content.cn: 商会那里会有吗？还是说那些资料在第一次天使战争时就遗失了……
content.en: TGCC might have some. Don't tell me they lost the tech data during the First Aggeloi War...

content.cn: 阿伯莉之石、2号眼睛、活水
content.en: Stone of Aburrey. Eye 2. Living water.

content.cn: 保住封存室里的所有东西，用命保住！
content.en: Seal everything in the vault. Protect it with your lives!

content.cn: 唉，我认错，下次我及时更新权限卡，这次走错区域是我的问题。
content.en: Ugh. I'll admit my mistake. Sorry for walking into the wrong area. I'll update my access card promptly next time.

content.cn: 我也不拿自己刚调过来不久当理由了，试验场虽然地上地下好几层，但标记确实清楚，我不该不注意看指示牌。
content.en: I'm not going to excuse myself again by saying I was only recently assigned to this post. I know the Test Site has many floors above and below ground, and that every floor is clearly marked. I'll pay attention to the signs next time.

content.cn: 我能理解，有些区域毕竟不安全，胡乱闯进去说不定命就没了，我理解。
content.en: Yeah, I know. Some areas ain't safe. Barging in without protection might get me killed. Got it.

content.cn: 施工速度肯定是没问题，但吵不吵我可就没办法保证了。
content.en: Construction progress is definitely okay. But I can't give you any promises about the noise.

content.cn: 不远处工作的研究员们不会嫌吵吗？
content.en: We got scientists working pretty close to us. Are they complaining about the noise?

content.cn: 上面难得批准四号谷地扩建，放心，我们用全力。
content.en: It's not everyday when the bigshots greenlit an expansion project for Valley IV. Don't worry. We'll do our best.

content.cn: 不过，虽然这不该我问，但你们是不是拿着采石场挖出来的东西跟上面聊的？它真有这么高的价值？
content.en: And I know I shouldn't be asking, but you talked to the people upstairs, right? About the thing you excavated from the Quarry? Is it really that valuable?

content.cn: 采石场这几天用电量提高了不少，也不知道为什么，大伙儿加把劲。
content.en: Power consumption recently spiked at the Quarry. Got no idea why. Stay on target, crew.

content.cn: 但越是这时候，越得注意别被感染了。小心矿石病，预防性针剂记得要打，不然躺在宿舍里起不来可就惨了。
content.en: This is also the time when I must remind everyone to keep Oripathy at bay. Get those shots or you'll become so crystalline you can't even roll yourself out of bed.

content.cn: 对不起，没能守住，对不起。
content.en: This place has been breached. Apologies.

content.cn: 各位工友，近期我在休息区读物《勇士和他的四十位朋友》一书中发现了若干问题，故在此列出，与大家一起讨论。
content.en: Fellow crew mates, I recently found several issues regarding the rest area reading material titled The Warrior and the Forty Companions. I've listed them here for discussion.

content.cn: 首先，诚然本书可以被定义为娱乐读物，但我认为，娱乐读物也需严谨。
content.en: First, while the publication is designated as leisure reading, I believe this genre must still adhere to the standards of logic and factual accuracy.

content.cn: 这本书上至标题，下至故事内容，明显都在以当年管理员与四十位英雄终结第一次天使战争的历史为蓝本进行创作。那么，面对如此严肃的历史事件，写作更需严谨——但作者明显没有抱有足够端正的态度。
content.en: Everything about this book, from its title to its contents, is clearly a fictional retelling of the historic event where the Endministrator and the forty heroes ended the First Aggeloi War. Given the somber nature of that event, the content should demonstrate proper respect for the truth — Unfortunately, the author obviously approached the subject with impropriety.

content.cn: 故事中写道，“勇士与四十位朋友一同进入灾厄的国度”，这倒是没什么问题，毕竟这是以管理员带领众人进入极光壁这一事件为原型进行的创作。但故事中又写道，经历了种种事件后，四十位朋友中居然出现了背叛者，这里的问题可就不小了。我理解作者想要描写一段争吵、冲突、负重前行，最终重归于好的戏码，但这样写，真的足够尊重当年的牺牲者吗？
content.en: To quote the narrative: "Together, the Warrior and the forty companions entered the nation of calamity". No problems so far as this is based on the Endministrator leading the heroes into the Aurora. However, the story later describes a traitor emerging amidst the forty after a series of events. This is travesty. I can understand how the author intended to dramatic tension with internal strife before the heroes learn to face various challenges as one and rebuild their friendships. But a traitor? Did the author truly respect those sacrificed their lives so many years ago?

content.cn: 以及，我们明显能看出这位作者对英雄们身份的一些臆测。众所周知，英雄们的身份是没有被全部公布的，民间的确对他们的身份多有猜测，但这位作者行文时的言之凿凿，未免有些让人不解了。
content.en: Furthermore, the author also made conspicuous yet unfounded guesses on the heroes' identities. Not all of the heroes have been officially revealed. That is common knowledge. Ordinary folks might speculate, but this author presents these conjectures with a tone of absolute certainty that is unsubstantiated and troubling.

content.cn: 这书纸质极烂，还有错字，一定是非法出版物，我怀疑是沙盗氏族的裂地者写来污蔑英雄的。
content.en: The quality of the paper is also abysmal and the text riddled with typographical errors. There is no question that the book is an illegal publication. I suspect the Sandreavers. Those Landbreakers wrote this to vilify our heroes.

title.en: Corrections for the Rest Area Reading Materials

content.cn: 再次重申一遍——
content.en: I REPEAT.

content.cn: 禁止！在这里！偷偷饲养源石虫！
content.en: NO RAISING ORIGINIUM SLUGS HERE!

content.cn: ……我倒是有听他们说到什么“能量”和“实验”。
content.en: ...I heard them talk about some sort of "energy" and "tests".

content.cn: 试验场不会在做超域能量应用的实验吧？
content.en: Are they running experiments for applied Æther energy tech at the Test Site?

content.cn: 虽然我不太懂具体的技术细节，但我可是拥有科幻想象能力的。
content.en: I don't really know the technical deets, but I got plenty of scientific ideas and fantasies.

content.cn: 你说有朝一日，他们能不能搞出一种新能源，然后咱们靠着它，飞到宇宙里，飞到很远很远的地方。
content.en: Maybe a day will come when they come up with a new source of power. We can utilize this new energy to fly deep into space and reach faraway worlds.

content.cn: 飞到哪儿呢……塔罗斯太近……飞到泰拉吧……看看我们从哪里来。
content.en: Where should we go...? Big Gassy Talos is way too close... How about Terra...? I wanna take a look at where our ancestors came from.

content.cn: 我将一份异常侵蚀样本寄回了基地，它取自无人区N03区域点位。
content.en: I've sent an anomalous Blight sample back to Base. It was acquired from a location in Area N03 of the Barrens.

content.cn: 它和目前为止我们接触过的所有侵蚀都不太一样，一定具有极高的研究价值。
content.en: This sample offers great research value as it is unlike all other Blight materials we have encountered so far.

content.cn: 我还附了照片，保证资料详细。
content.en: I attached a photograph and tried to ensure that the information is sufficiently detailed.

content.cn: 发送人：侵蚀研究小组
content.en: SENDER: Blight Research Team

content.cn: 当然有极高的研究价值，这在侵蚀现象研究领域简直是绝无仅有的，你是工团的最大功臣！
content.en: This is a keystone finding of immense scientific value! The very first sample of its kind, the grail of Blight research! You have made a monumental contribution to the UWST!

content.cn: 你以为我会这么说？
content.en: I guess that's what you wanted me to say.

content.cn: 我当年就不该让你毕业，说过多少次，在无人区行动，你不仅要有专业知识，还需要多去学生存知识和刑侦技巧！
content.en: I should have flunked your graduation from the start. I've said this many times and I'll say it again. Learn some survival skills and investigative techniques! Being book smart isn't going to help you much in the frontiers.

content.cn:
<@nar.mark>等你回来</>我会亲自培训一下你，到时候我不会因为你是我妹妹就手下留情，也不建议你把我当成姐姐期待我会心软。

<@nar.key>总之</>，你寄回来的样本是某种侵蚀生物移动时污染的土壤。

<@nar.quote>你的照片</>上很明显有巨大生物移动时留下的痕迹，至少比驮兽更大，而且从样本异常程度判断，发生在这个巨大生物身体上的侵蚀现象极度严重。
你一定要小心，你现在很可能在面对一只巨大，癫狂且满身侵蚀的野兽。
你一定要小心。
***年**月**日
content.en:
I'll give you some personal training <@nar.mark>once you return</>. Your sis won't go soft on you just because you're the darling princess of the family. I'll be strict and merciless. 

<@nar.key>Just in case you're curious</>, your sample is just contaminated soil made by some Blightmorph. 

<@nar.quote>Your photograph</> obviously shows tracks left by an organism that is at least bigger than a burdenbeast. Given the anomalous readings of the sample, the Blight on this creature would be extremely severe. 

You are in danger. You might be facing a large, frenzied, and thoroughly Blight-affected creature. 
Be EXTRA CAREFUL out there. 
■■■■, ■■/■■

content.cn: 综合当前已掌握的所有资料，包括残留物资状况、裂地者透露的信息、信号接收器捕捉到的短暂异常信号，以及现场日志内容，推测三名失踪工人具备较强的生存意志与组织能力。未发现遗体、信号中断前设备完好、裂地者未与其交战等证据，进一步印证了他们极可能是主动切断了定位信号，以避免拖累队伍或暴露位置。综合判断，三人仍有较大生还可能，建议立刻展开针对性搜救。
content.en: Based on all available intelligence: remaining supplies, intel from the Landbreakers, anomalous signals briefly captured by receivers, and on-site logs, it is highly probable that the three missing workers possess strong survival instincts and organizational skills. The absence of remains, intact devices prior to signal loss, and lack of engagement with Landbreakers suggest they likely severed their own tracking signals to avoid endangering the team or revealing their position. All evidence indicates a significant probability of survival. Immediate targeted search and rescue operations are recommended.

title.cn: 基建前站失踪人员搜救报告
title.en: Search and Rescue Report on Missing Personnel at Infra-Station

content.cn: ……作为对照的是天使，它们的行为模式和野生动物完全不同。如前所述，像裂兽一类的野生动物如果不处于交配期、育崽期或者饥饿状态，一般不会接近人类。而天使永远会试图攻击进入其警戒范围的人类。
content.en: ...The Aggeloi is on the other side of the spectrum. Their behavioral patterns are extremely different from those of wild animals. As mentioned earlier, creatures like manglerbeasts would not approach humans unless they are hungry or otherwise made extremely aggressive during mating season or in defense of their cubs. Aggeloi, however, will always actively seek to attack humans that enter their detection perimeter.

content.cn: 换言之，如果人类选择避开这个警戒范围，天使便很可能不会理会他们。不同天使个体的警戒范围有着一定差异，在现场一般很难通过实际测量距离来判断。不过，通过观察对象天使的反应，往往可以得到足够的线索……
content.en: Following this logic, the Aggeloi should leave people alone if they avoid this perimeter. However, different Aggeloi have different detection perimeters and it is impossible to get a precise measurement in field conditions. Nevertheless, we could gather enough data by observing Aggelos specimens...

content.cn: （在这一段文字下方，有两条手写批注）
content.en: (There are lines of handwritten notes below this chunk of text.)

content.cn: 我们有一张商会发来的常见天使个体警戒范围统计图，记得之后把数据改大点重印一张，让学员用那个图。别让他们再去野外打着实验的幌子逗天使玩了！真会出人命的！
content.en: We received a chart of detection perimeter sizes of common Aggeloi from the TGCC. I should remember making the numbers bigger and printing them out for the students. I don't want them poking the Aggeloi for fun under the guise of scientific research. PEOPLE MIGHT GET KILLED!

content.cn: 另外要跟学员讲清楚，虽然萨科塔也经常称呼自己的种族为“天使”，但那是从泰拉带过来的用语习惯，而且在拉特兰语里是另外一个词。
content.en: The Sankta call themselves Angels but that's a Terran linguistic tradition and the Lateran language uses another word for it. Make sure the students are aware of these facts.

content.cn: <@nar.enter></>
content.en: <@nar.enter></>

content.cn: ……用以判断天使失去威胁性与否的最可靠依据是其光环是否仍存在。只要光环仍在，身体破损的天使个体仍有可能吸收更多环境物质，恢复原本的伤人能力……
content.en: ...To determine if an Aggelos is no longer a threat, the best indicator would be the presence of its halo. A badly damaged Aggelos with an intact halo can still absorb materials from the environment and restore its abilities to inflict harm...

content.cn: ……优先考虑寻找并销毁锚点，随后以专用武器快速从天使个体上剥离其构成物质……
content.en: ...The top priority is to locate and destroy the Ankhor, then use specialized weapons to dismantle the physical structure of the Aggeloi...

content.cn: ……在缺乏武器时，工程工具也可达到同样效果……
content.en: ...In the absence of weapons, construction tools should achieve similar effects...

content.cn: （在这一段文字下方，又有几条手写批注）
content.en: (There are lines of handwritten notes below this chunk of text.)

content.cn: 下次开会时，再讨论一下这段以后怎么教给学员吧。不能继续让他们觉得为了几罐调味品溜出基地找天使打是一件多大不了的事情……
content.en: The next meeting should discuss how to properly teach this section to the students. We can't let them think they can just slip out of base to fight Aggeloi for jars of seasoning...

content.cn: 以及我突然想到，那几个萨科塔不是自称“猎天使天使”吗？也许我终究不用太担心称呼不当的问题……
content.en: I suddenly remembered something about the Sankta who call themselves the Aggeloslaying Angels. Perhaps I shouldn't be too sensitive about the appropriateness of the names...

content.cn: 【发件人】联盟工团

content.cn: 四号谷地所有联盟工团站点：
content.en: To all UWST sites in Valley IV:

content.cn: 注意！我们正遭到敌人袭击！
content.en: WARNING! We are under attack!

content.cn: 敌人包括碾骨氏族的大群裂地者武装分子以及大量天使。
content.en: The enemy comprises a large number of armed Landbreakers from the Bonekrusher Clan and a large host of Aggeloi.

content.cn: 锚点正有规律地出现在工团各站点上空，这不是巧合，敌人在一定程度上掌握了操控天使的技术。
content.en: Ankhors are showing up over various UWST sites in a discernible pattern. This is no coincidence. We believe our enemy has a tech that allows them to control the Aggeloi.

content.cn: 各站点必须立刻执行安全预案！
content.en: All sites shall initiate our Security Contingency Plan at once!

content.cn: 做好准备，我们面对的不止一种敌人！
content.en: All crew mates are to ready themselves. We are fighting more than one enemy!

content.cn: <@nar.enter></>
content.en: <@nar.enter></>

content.cn: *以上信息于四号谷地袭击事件发生七分钟后以文本形式发送到了工团各主要终端的收件箱中，当时显示的发送人为“联盟工团”，信息全文后于工团设置的ЭКОП（音“艾科普”，乌萨斯语“应急广播”的简写）应答器处回收。遗憾的是，并非所有相关人员都及时看到了这条信息。
content.en: *These texts have been sent to the inbox of all major UWST terminals within 7 minutes after the Incursion of Valley IV by a sender titled "UWST". The entire section is received by the ЭКОП (EKOP, Ursine abbreviation of the Emergency Crisis Operations Broadcast) transponder of the UWST. Unfortunately, not every UWST crew mate managed to read this message.

content.cn: *另外值得注意的是，我们不能确定，该信息的发出与鲍里斯·波德诺夫的牺牲，这两件事在时间上的先后顺序。
content.en: *NOTE: We are unsure if the sending of this message occurred before or after the death of Agent Boris Petronov.

content.cn: （一张工团制式请假单，背面有着某人的笔迹，像是顺手写下来的）
content.en: (A UWST leave application. Someone used the backside of the form to jot down a few notes.)

content.cn: 我看见了。
content.en: I saw it.

content.cn: 人和天使走在一起，互不关心，各干各的。
content.en: People walking with the Aggeloi. Organics and rockies doing their own thing without getting in each other's way.

content.cn: 如果他们不是在屠杀我的工友们，我恐怕会为此大为兴奋。
content.en: I would have been super excited about this discovery. But said organics and rockies are killing my fellow crew mates!

content.cn: 对天使行为的研究和探索不应该被引到这样一条路上去。
content.en: No research or exploration of Aggelos behavior should ever be applied to such atrocities.

content.cn: 基地重建恐怕很缺人手吧，但我不能对此坐视不管，这个氏族的名字叫“碾骨”，我需要跟上他们。
content.en: They probably need all the help they can get to rebuild the base, but I can't simply ignore this finding. They call themselves the Bonekrusher Clan. I must keep up with them.

content.cn: 对于天使，他们懂得比我多，这有点令人嫉妒，但更重要的是，他们把这知识用错了地方。
content.en: Their knowledge of the Aggeloi may be enviable, but it is overshadowed by their disgusting abuse of this knowledge.

content.cn: 对不起，主任，我要把攒到现在的休假都用掉了。
content.en: I'm sorry, director. I am gonna use up all my leave days.

content.cn: （请假单的正面有署名，一个叫“亚历山大·阿巴申”的工人。工团方面表示会协助调查这名工人的去向）
content.en: (The leave application is signed by a crew mate named Aleksandr Abashin. The UWST informs us that they will help investigate the whereabouts of Mr. Abashin.)

content.cn: 管理员，您的付出换来的成果可圈可点，上传至帝江号的情报已全部归档。
content.en: Endmin, you have made significant contributions. All the intel files uploaded to Dijiang have been safely archived.

content.cn: 就结论而言，我们可以认为：
content.en: We can draw the following conclusions:

content.cn: 不可能发生的事情发生了。
content.en: What we deemed impossible has actually happened.

content.cn: 首先，以您获得的资料为起点，我们对四号谷地历年有关天使的情报档案进行了确认，可以确定的是，在过去数十年中，形成于四号谷地的天使不存在异常状况。随机降落的锚点，见人就追的天使，一定程度上类似于那个“系统”的通感表现（尽管经常微弱到令人难以察觉），这都和我们一百五十年来一贯认知内的“天使”这种现象别无二致。而因为它是一种现象，并非一种生命，它不会进化，不会改变（尽管存在个体的突变），四号谷地至今为止的天使活动也就显得十分正常。
content.en: Let's start with the files you recovered. We verified them against Aggelos-related clue dossiers of Valley IV gathered over the years. We can be certain that no anomalous states existed amongst the Aggeloi created in Valley IV for several decades. To some degree, the random Ankhorfalls and super aggressive Aggeloi can be treated as a manifestation of that particular "system" (although the signals were weak and barely detectable). In fact, the incident is congruent with our understanding of the "Aggeloid" phenomenon that stood true for 150 years. And since the Aggeloi is a phenomenon and not an evolving or changing lifeform (though individual mutations and variants have been observed), Aggelos activities of Valley IV reported so far rest within our normal expectations.

content.cn: 然而，在四号谷地袭击事件中——您亲身经历了这次袭击事件的一部分以及它的余波——我们和其他盟友一道，确凿无疑地观察到了天使和人类共同攻击同一个目标的行为，或者干脆点说，就是他们在“并肩作战”。这理论上应当是不可能发生的，天使之间推测用以沟通的微弱信号早被认定是不可破解的，哪怕是通过那个“系统”的模拟，当年我们也未曾实现过和天使的沟通，乃至将其无害化的尝试也遭遇了失败。
content.en: However, you have personally experienced the Incursion of Valley IV itself as well as its repercussions. We, together with our allies, have all made unambiguous observations of Aggeloi and humans attacking a single target as a united force. Or to put simply, humanity has "fought alongside" the Aggeloi. This is theoretically improbable as we have long treated the weak Aggeloid signals (that we believe are used by the Aggeloi for communicating with each other) to be completely undecipherable, even when we applied the algorithmic engines of that particular "system" all those years ago. Our attempts to commune with the Aggeloi or to render them harmless have also failed.

content.cn: 当然，管理员，无论聂菲斯与她的裂地者，以及天使们，怀有什么目的，我们都必须阻止他们采取进一步的行动。情报办公室相信，您已经为此做好了准备。
content.en: Endministrator, no matter what Nefarith, her Landbreakers, or even the Aggeloi have in mind, we must do everything we can to stop their next move. Everyone at the Intel Office believes you are well prepared for this.

content.cn: 管理员，我们收到了您关于矿脉源区的相关文献并对其进行了整理分析。目前我们可以确认，工人们提到的是约二十年前曾发生在四号谷地的巨型天使袭击事件。
content.en: Endmin, we have received, organized, and analyzed the documents you gathered from the Origin Lodespring. We can currently confirm that the crew mates were referring to the giant Aggelos that attacked Valley IV 20 years ago.

content.cn: 曾袭击四号谷地的天使，我们称之为“星体”，其具体数据已因战争遗失，但可以确认的是，它的高度至少超过了一百米。而之所以称之为“星体”，则是因为这只天使会像泰拉那些古老岩画中所描绘的简陋太阳一样漂浮在半空，它足有成百上千个“枝干”，这些“枝干”就像是大漩涡一样扭曲着，拼凑成一个圆。在它行进时，大地会被不祥妖艳的暗红所笼罩，万物如在死域。由于视频等资料的遗失，我们很难想象工团在二十年前直面这样恐怖之物时究竟有多么绝望，但他们最终还是胜利了。
content.en: Astarron is the name we gave this Aggelos that attacked Valley IV. Its specifications and data were lost during the war. But now we can confirm that this entity was at least 100 meters in height. It was called the Astarron as it resembled crude rock paintings of the sun made during ancient times in Terra. Astarron featured over a thousand "spokes" that twist and rotate like a great circular vortex. When Astarron advanced, it covered the land with an ominous shade of dark red generated by the Æther flowing in its immense form, a deathly zone for all living beings within. Due to the loss of video and other surveillance data, we could hardly imagine how the UWST felt when they faced Astarron 20 years ago. Nevertheless, the crew emerged victorious from this battle.

content.cn: 源石大树，这柱特殊的巨型源石晶簇似乎在谷地居民们的战斗中承担了武器的作用，可他们是怎么做到的？单纯把源石大树当作炸弹使用？但这几乎会把四号谷地也夷平……虽然我知道这不是我该问的事情，但我们的数据库中关于源石大树的部分，除了基本资料外，没有其他相关内容，大部分资料似乎只有您清楚……可您的记忆……
content.en: The special macro-formation of Originium clusters known as the Great Originium Oak was used as a weapon when the Valleyfolk fought against Astarron. But how did they do it? Did they simply use the Oak as a bomb? The explosive yield of that amount of Originium would have completely devastated the whole of Valley IV... I know this should not be something I'm supposed to ask, but our database only contain the most basic of data about the Great Originium Oak. You probably know more about this Originium formation ... but your memories...

content.cn: 最后也是最重要的是，管理员，我想您仍需小心，工人们有关天使的猜测并非空穴来风，矿脉源区或许埋藏着未知险恶，您极有可能会直面来自过去的亡魂。
content.en: Lastly and most importantly, be cautious, Endmin. Rumors and stories whispered by the crew mates about the Aggelos may not be completely unfounded. Many dangers and hostile entities may be buried under the Origin Lodespring. You might run into something that should have died in the past.

content.cn: 管理员，谢谢您搜集到的这些信息。长久以来，我们对碾骨氏族所知甚少，仅有的资料都来自雾里看花的外部观察和流言，充满了想象和一知半解。这些来自他们内部的第一手资料有助于我们深入了解裂地者的社会风貌，从而更准确地理解他们的行为，判断他们的目的和逻辑。
content.en: Endmin, thank you for the data you collected. For years, our knowledge of the Bonekrushers had been extremely limited. Old data about this clan were half-truths and fantasies based upon rumors and scout reports. First-hand information from actual Bonekrushers will help us learn more about Landbreaker communities to better elucidate their behaviors and determine their goals and modus operandi.

content.cn: 结合这些珍贵的情报，我们可以大致复原碾骨氏族的崛起过程：某一个冬天，开拓区北部经历了几十年来最严重的萧条和饥荒，加上侵蚀的肆虐，裂地者各氏族之间发生了激烈的火并。原本走在下坡路上的碾骨突然崛起，滚雪球般击败、吞并了众多裂地者氏族。
content.en: We have used these valuable pieces of intel to postulate the background and process that propelled the Bonekrusher Clan to power. During last winter, the north of the frontiers suffered the worst economic crisis and famine for several decades. The suffering was further compounded by Blight events and forced many Landbreaker clans to fight each other. The declining Bonekrushers suddenly came to power, swallowing up weaker clans as they snowballed into a massive army.

content.cn: 碾骨崛起的关键，在于一种被称作“雾火”的火焰。它似乎与侵蚀有关，除了致幻性和神经毒性之外，还能在一定时间内大大强化摄入者的身体机能。围绕“雾火”，碾骨氏族建立起了比其他裂地者氏族更加强大、坚实的组织。而带来“雾火”的人……是他们的头领，聂菲斯。
content.en: A strange form of flame known as "hazefyre" is crucial behind sudden rise of the Bonekrushers. Hazefyre seems related to the Blight. In addition to its hallucinogenic properties and neural toxicity, those who inhale it can receive a temporary spike in physiological performance. The Bonekrushers were able to create a stronger and more permanent Landbreaker clan that revolves around "hazefyre". And their chief, Nefarith, happens to be the one who introduced it to them.

content.cn: 聂菲斯似乎是忽然出现在我们的视野中的，关于她的出身、经历、性格、理念……通通都是个谜。但有一点我们能够确定：她对所遇见的任何一个阵营都深怀敌意。她似乎是在故意激起裂地者的仇恨和狂热，向文明环带的居民发起进攻，靠胜利、劫掠和奴役来获得手下的拥戴。
content.en: Nefarith seems to have appeared out of the blue. We know nothing about her background, place of birth, life, personality, or beliefs. However, we are certain of this one thing: She deeply resents every faction she encounters. This individual has deliberately indoctrinated the Landbreakers with extreme fanaticism and hatred to encourage attacks on the Civilization Band. With victorious raids, plundered riches, and captured slaves, she further secured the loyalty of her followers.

content.cn: 传统的战略认为，从外部对付裂地者的方法有两种：一是通过强力打击，消灭他们的核心成员，使他们瓦解、溃散；二是采取怀柔的手段，通过交易或者馈赠来收买他们，消弭敌意。然而我们没有办法杀死所有的裂地者，也没有办法靠一丁点施舍就换来持久的善意。归根结底，只要严酷的战争和巨大的生存压力依然存在，就没有办法阻止裂地者的产生，而这将促成一个又一个“碾骨氏族”的崛起。
