content.en: There are 2 conventional strategies for an external force to strike at the LB: (1) unleash powerful attacks to neutralize key LB leadership and induce disintegration of the clan and; (2) diplomacy, trade, and bribery to reduce their hostilities. However, we neither have the means to take out the entire LB leadership nor enough resources to secure a lasting truce. As long as brutal warfare and other factors massively affecting survivability still exist, the number of LBs will only continue to grow and fuel the emergence of yet another clan like the Bonekrushers.

content.cn: 或许在未来，文明环带才能给出裂地者问题的真正答案。
content.en: Perhaps the Civilization Band may give us a true solution for the Landbreaker Problem in the future.

title.cn: 有关碾骨氏族的调查报告

content.cn: 您好，管理员，我已经收到了您送回的材料，马上就开始为您分析。
content.en: Greetings, Endmin. I've received the materials you sent. I'll begin my analysis at once.

content.cn: 您所获得的材料中，提到最多的内容是天然稳定裂隙与超域试验场，这是正常的。在刚刚拿到材料时，我们本来试图确认您是否在复杂的环境中发现了工团的什么秘密实验材料，但现在看下来并非如此。您获得的材料姑且还算正常。
content.en: The naturally stable rift and the Æther Test Site are the two most mentioned phrases in the materials you recovered. This is rather expected. When we first received the said materials, we initially tried to verify if you had chanced upon classified UWST research documents given the complicated situation you were in. But our suspicions were misplaced. The materials you recovered are quite standard.

content.cn: 四号谷地的供能高地拥有一条天然稳定裂隙，这件事在四号谷地建立之初还引发过一定讨论（讨论热度并没有超过彼时人们对热门电影剧情的批判），此处裂隙并非是人类发现的第一个天然稳定裂隙，超域试验场也并非是第一个有关裂隙的试验场所（虽然工团将它修建得远比从外面看起来大）……在超域试验场建立之初，这里的确吸引了一些目光，但不知道是不是工团内部存在科研思路的抉择问题，他们最后将超域试验场的研究主题定到了“观测超域内部”这一方向上。
content.en: A naturally stable rift is located at the Power Plateau of Valley IV. Its presence sparked quite a discussion during the early days of development in Valley IV (the intensity of this discussion, however, did not exceed those pertaining to popular movies screened at the same time). The Valley IV rift is not the first naturally stable rift discovered by humanity, nor is the Æther Test Site the first facility built for the study of rifts (though the UWST constructed it in a way that it appears smaller than it looks from the outside)... When the Æther Test Site was first built, the facility became quite the center of attention. However, the UWST finally chose "Ætherside observations" as the primary focus of research for the Æther Test Site, and I am uncertain if this can be attributed to internal issues of the UWST when it comes to their choices of their scientific research.

content.cn: 我想您很清楚，想在这方面有所收获，那绝对是遥遥无期的，这么多年，也没人能观测到超域内部的景象……无论是在宏山科学院还是在环塔商会，任何超域内部观测项目都不会受到太大的重视，通常也批不到什么经费。
content.en: I believe you are very well aware that the endeavor might very well be a futile chase. No one has successfully observed the Ætherside itself after all these years... And no one in the HAS nor TGCC would regard projects that attempt to make Ætherside observations seriously, much less set aside funding for them.

content.cn: 当然了，虽然现状如此，但这不代表工团没有在超域试验场进行什么高风险实验。若您在之后的行动中发现了什么新线索，我们将第一时间为您继续分析。
content.en: Of course, given the current circumstances, this does not make UWST innocent of conducting high risk experiments in the Æther Test Site. Should you discover more clues in your subsequent operations, we shall continue this analysis at the first notice.

title.cn: 有关超域试验场的调查报告

content.cn: 人还是要出门转转的。
content.en: People should still get out and about.

content.cn: 在本部读书时，我对武陵这种重要科学发展区的想象，还是那种钢筋水泥，技术感很强的“研究所丛林”。
content.en: Back when I was studying at the main campus, I pictured Wuling, such a crucial scientific developmental district, as a concrete jungle of Research Centers. All steel, glass, and cutting-edge tech.

content.cn: 没想到自然景色也这么好。
content.en: I never expected the natural scenery to be this beautiful too.

content.cn: 来过武陵的同学都说，来武陵必来迷踪林。问他们原因，全都神神秘秘说不出个所以然……
content.en: Classmates who've been to Wuling all say you can't miss the Stragglers Grove when you visit. But when you ask them why, they get all mysterious and can't really explain it...

content.cn: 各大科学发展区，每个都有其“主题”，我听说武陵的强项是以息壤为代表的材料学技术，莫非这竹林别有洞天？
content.en: Every major developmental district has its own specialty. I heard Wuling's strength is materials technology, with Xiranite as the flagship. Could this grove hold something ... different?

content.cn: 好！待我一探究竟！
content.en: Alright! Time for me to dig deeper!

content.cn: 《淬剑书》将“淬剑荡”这一名字的起源解释为：曾有某位天师，在景玉谷中取水淬剑，削峰试刃，剑成之后，景玉谷的水位甚至下降了五尺，因此，其后人将这片浅水湖称为“淬剑荡”。
content.en: "The Sword Quenching Book" explains the origin of the name "Sword Quenching Marsh" like this: a certain Tianshi once drew water from Jingyu Valley to temper a sword, testing its edge by slicing a peak. After the sword was forged, the water level in Jingyu Valley had dropped by five feet. Because of this, later generations named this shallow lake Sword Quenching Marsh.

content.cn: 众所周知，《淬剑书》不过几百字，通篇突出一个晦涩难懂，前一秒还在写天师铸剑，后一秒却转到写天地奇景，写巨兽游天，再后则转到写炎国景致，写十二楼五城……我只在一种东西里见过这样的写法——加密文本。
content.en: As everyone knows, "The Sword Quenching Book" is only a few hundred words long, and the whole thing is notoriously obscure. One moment it's writing about a Tianshi forging a sword, the next it shifts to describing wondrous landscapes, Feranmuts roaming the skies, then moves on to Yan's scenery, Twelve Pagodas and Five Cities... I've only ever seen this kind of writing in one thing: encrypted texts.

content.cn: 《淬剑书》是否内藏着某种隐秘的暗示？若真是如此，真相是什么？是百余年前有人在此制造了巨型武器，还是修建了某种特殊的水利设施？还是说，就只是真有高手在此施放了什么源石技艺？
content.en: Does "The Sword Quenching Book" contain some kind of hidden meaning? If that's really the case, what's the truth? Did someone create a giant weapon here over a hundred years ago, or build some special kind of water conservancy facility? Or is it just that some expert really used Originium Arts here?

title.cn: 有关《淬剑书》的若干分析

content.cn: 水比他处要深，这摘菱屿水下必有错综复杂的暗流，不然荷叶是不会动的。
content.en: The water here is deeper than elsewhere. There must be complex underwater currents around Zhailing Islet, or the lotus leaves wouldn't be moving.

content.cn: 暗流、暗流……好极了。
content.en: Underwater currents, undercurrents ... perfect.

content.cn: 氧气，食物充足，移动方便，此地易生巨物！
content.en: Plenty of oxygen, ample food, easy movement. This place is perfect for giants to thrive!

content.cn: 我要把它钓上来！
content.en: I'm gonna reel it in!

content.cn: 这些花，颜色像雾火。
content.en: These flowers, their color looks like hazefyre.

content.cn: 雾火终将在此扩散！
content.en: The hazefyre will spread here eventually!

content.cn: 相信头领！
content.en: Trust the boss!

content.cn: 赐福！光荣！
content.en: A blessing! Glory!

title.cn: 疑似裂地者留下的纸条
title.en: Note Believed Left by a Landbreaker

content.cn: 十年，三十场大型挖掘……老师，我还是没挖出什么东西。
content.en: Ten years, thirty major excavations... Master, I still haven't found anything.

content.cn: 我确实想过放弃。我问过众生长地的游人，试图了解他们最初的师者曾在冰冷绝境中到底窥见了什么，也去问过修会的年轻人，都没有得到答案。
content.en: I did think about giving up. I asked Songseekers at the Hannabit Circuit, trying to understand what their earliest masters glimpsed in that frozen desolation. I even asked the young ones at the Cabal, but found no answers.

content.cn: 多么令人绝望。
content.en: How utterly despairing.

content.cn: 在那时，我觉得科学、科研、塔卫二的历史、前文明的技术——这些，这一切都是混沌的，看不到希望的“无尽”。
content.en: Back then, I felt that science, research, the history of Talos-II, Precursor technology... All of it, everything, was just a chaotic, hopeless "endlessness".

content.cn: 但后来我的想法变了。
content.en: But my perspective later changed.

content.cn: 塔卫二上的人们如何看待我们，如何看待宏山科学院？很多人认为我们永远走在技术前沿，这没错，但更多人不会把我们当成高高在上的，身在浮云中的研究者。
content.en: How do the people of Talos-II see us? How do they view HAS? Many believe we're always at the cutting edge of technology, and that's true. But most don't see us as lofty researchers floating above the clouds.

content.cn: 荒地上小小的开拓聚落，在用我们宏科院的装置净化了一眼泉后，他们的笑容让我知道，宏山科学院的技术，我们的研究，更大的意义在于帮助人们更好地活着。
content.en: At a small pioneer settlement out in the wildlands, after they used an HAS device to purify a spring, their smiles made me realize: the greater purpose of HAS's technology and our research, is to help people live better lives.

content.cn: 这您应该比我清楚，毕竟在您最活跃的时代，宏科院实现了承担文明环带绝大部分食物供给的目标。
content.en: You would know this better than I do. After all, during your most active era, HAS achieved the goal of supplying the vast majority of the Civilization Band's food.

content.cn: 老师，我会快乐地行走在研究之路上，直到走到我的生命尽头。
content.en: Master, I will walk this path of research joyfully until the very end of my life.

content.cn: 因此，我恳请您也垂下目光，看向地面。
content.en: Therefore, I humbly ask you to lower your gaze as well, and look toward the ground.

content.cn: 另，老师您这次可以不要只回我一个“善”字并且让我支付信件邮费吗？
content.en: Also, Master, this time could you please not just reply with a single "Approved" and make me pay the postage?

content.cn: 上次来武陵时，就听说过“聚宝窟”的名头，好像清波寨寨民们会来这里捞宝贝。
content.en: I heard about the "Treasure Grotto" last time I was in Wuling. They say Qingbo Stockade residents come here to scavenge for treasures.

content.cn: 当然了，说是宝贝，不过也就是被水流冲到这里的各种物资罢了。
content.en: Of course, calling them "treasures" is a bit generous. It's really just all sorts of supplies washed here by the currents.

content.cn: 不知道多少年前就沉到水里的天使残骸，又或者是什么大河深处的特殊矿石之类的东西。
content.en: Could be Aggeloi wreckage that sank who knows how many years ago, or maybe some special ore from the depths of the great river.

content.cn: 我倒是也找了一圈，没找到什么好东西。
content.en: I looked around too, didn't find anything worthwhile.

content.cn: 唯一有趣的是几块石头，不过水流是怎么把土层深处的东西带出来的？莫非是“水花子”长手了，会用铲子？
content.en: The only somewhat interesting find was a few rocks. But how did the currents bring up stuff from deep underground? Unless those splatters grew hands and learned to use shovels?

content.cn: 仔细想想……
content.en: Come to think of it...

content.cn: 你应该来我们这边……
content.en: You should come over to our side...

content.cn: 有些仇，消不了……
content.en: Some grudges just won't fade...

content.cn: 前天：七尾
content.en: Day before yesterday: 7

content.cn: 昨天：五尾
content.en: Yesterday: 5

content.cn: 这几天一共就搞到了不到二十尾鳞，这还是我上上下下快把景玉谷走了个遍的结果，差点都走到武陵人种田那一小片地方了。
content.en: These past few days, I've only managed to catch less than twenty fins. That's after scrambling all over Jingyu Valley, almost wandered right into the small patch where the Wuling folks farm.

content.cn: 大家这些日子除了吃笋，就是吃虫笋，要不就是吃水花子身上各式各样的水……我再努努力，不能让大家到啃土吃树叶那一步。
content.en: Lately, everyone's been eating nothing but bamboo shoots, nymphsprouts, or various bits of splatters. I need to try harder. Can't let it get to the point where we're chewing on dirt and leaves.

content.cn: 水里的鳞，这些小东西很聪明，它们最会避灾……难道是景玉谷最近要……
content.en: The fins in the water, those little things are clever. They're experts at avoiding disaster. Hm. Does that mean something's about to happen in Jingyu Valley...?

content.cn: 坏了，水车我真搞不定。
content.en: Crap, I don't know what to do with this waterwheel.

content.cn: 家里那些书都和族谱放在一起了啊，就算没有百多十年，那也得有七八十年了。
content.en: All those books at home were stored together with the family records. Even if it hasn't been over a hundred years, it must've been seventy or eighty at least.

content.cn: 寨子里这么多年，都是各家传各家的本事，越传越少……
content.en: All these years in the Stockade, each family has passed down their own skills, and they've dwindled more and more...

content.cn: 我们家一代代传下来，就剩点修电路的本事，这水车故障我看和电路关系不大。
content.en: All that's been passed down in our family is some skill with electrical circuits. This waterwheel issue doesn't seem too related to that.

content.cn: 谁还能记得水车怎么修？河佬还是谁？谁的爷爷还是表叔有这门手艺来着？
content.en: Who even remembers how to fix a waterwheel? He Lao, or someone else? Whose grandpa or uncle had that skill anyway?

content.cn: 焦急的友人：你去哪儿了？
content.en: Worried Friend: Where did you go?

content.cn: 写生者：别担心，我在生态实验站，跟那群种菜养小动物的学生们在一起。
content.en: Sketcher: Don't worry, I'm at the Ecological Research Station with those students who grow vegetables and raise animals.

content.cn: 焦急的友人：……你可小心点，别让那群沧贼抓走了。
content.en: Worried Friend: ...Careful out there. Don't let those Cangzei pirates sneak upon you.

content.cn: 写生者：上次来武陵被你严防死守，没去成清波寨，这次你可拦不住我了。
content.en: Sketcher: Last time you babysat me the whole trip in Wuling, I didn't even get to see Qingbo Stockade. Well, you're not stopping me this time.

content.cn: 写生者：我要画的“武陵八景”里可是包括了清波寨大水车的，不仅是清波寨，“禁区”我也得想办法溜进去。
content.en: Sketcher: My "Eight Scenes of Wuling" series has to include the great waterwheel of Qingbo Stockade. And it's not just the Stockade, I'll find a way to sneak into the "Exclusion Zone" too.

content.cn: 焦急的友人：嗯，明白明白，不要命嘛……
content.en: Worried Friend: Yeah, got it, got it. Just throw your life away, why don't you...

content.cn: 焦急的友人：这样吧，以后我要是有机会学到天师府雷法，您来给我当靶子，比您哪天死在外面有价值多了。
content.en: Worried Friend: How about this ... if I ever get a chance to learn Thunder Arts from the Tianshi Bureau, you can be my practice dummy. That'd be way more useful than you getting yourself killed out there one day.

content.cn: 时间过得真快，我到武陵城已经快五年了。
content.en: Time flies. I've been in Wuling City for almost five years now.

content.cn: 五年前我还在清波寨，除了挖笋，就是抓鳞，偶尔去抢一抢武陵城的物资……现在能认认真真学习农业，也算是幸运。
content.en: Five years ago I was still in Qingbo Stockade, just digging bamboo shoots and catching fins, occasionally raiding supplies from Wuling City... Now I can seriously focus on studying agriculture. I guess that's pretty lucky.

content.cn: 当然，在清波寨的日子和在武陵城的日子究竟哪种更好，我至今也不好得出结论。
content.en: Of course, I still can't really say whether life was better back in Qingbo Stockade or here in Wuling City.

content.cn: 他们还是放不下，虽然表面上已经是正常过日子的样子了，但我能看出来，他们心里还是有一团火。
content.en: They still can't let it go. On the surface, they live normal lives now, but I can tell there's still a fire burning inside them.

content.cn: 虽然有点懦弱，但我只盼着寨子里的老朋友们别来糟蹋我们的田。当然也盼着阮一、汤汤他们的压力能再轻一点。
content.en: It might sound cowardly, but I just hope my old friends from the Stockade don't come ruin our fields. And of course, I hope Ruan Yi, Tangtang, and the others get a little less pressure on their shoulders.

content.cn: 刚才是哪里……
content.en: Where was I just now...

content.cn: 这里又是哪里……
content.en: And where am I now...

content.cn: 这林子怎么走出去啊！
content.en: How do I get out?!

content.cn: ……怪不得问到为什么来武陵一定要来一趟迷踪林时，那帮混蛋只是笑！
content.en: No wonder those jerks just laughed when I asked why visiting Wuling meant you had to see the Stragglers Grove!

content.cn: 行路难啊！
content.en: A tough road indeed!

content.cn: 换了几趟车，先到商会的卡车站，为省钱没选择“飞”，换驮兽专线才到了这里……
content.en: I took several transfers: first to the TGCC truck station, skipped the "flight" to save money, then switched to a burdenbeast line just to get here...

content.cn: 难道刚到武陵，我就要葬身竹林吗……
content.en: Am I really going to die in this grove right after arriving in Wuling?

content.cn: 不过人生在世，最重要的是从挫折里吸取经验。
content.en: But the most important life lesson is to learn from your setbacks.

content.cn: 我怀疑迷踪林也是让初到武陵的学生们修炼心性的地方……毕竟与那道惊人的甚大裂隙近在咫尺，面对突发情况时没有良好的心态像什么话。
content.en: I suspect the Stragglers Grove is also a place for students new to Wuling to train their mental fortitude. After all, with that Very Large Rift so close by, it'd be irresponsible to lack composure in an emergency.

content.cn: 好，继续前进！
content.en: Alright. Time to keep going!

content.cn: 我的驮兽昨天拉了一整天，只能送回武陵城治病……得排查一下它是不是放风时偷偷吃了什么。难道是又去污水灌溉试验田那边糟蹋东西了？
content.en: My burdenbeast was sick all day yesterday, had to send it back to Wuling City for treatment... Gotta check if it sneaked a bite of something while it was out grazing. Don't tell me it wandered over to that sewage irrigation test field again and got into trouble?

content.cn: 培养抗病力更强的驮兽不代表培养更有活力的驮兽啊！
content.en: Breeding burdenbeast for disease resistance doesn't mean breeding more energetic ones!

content.cn: 上次是偷偷舔小吴背上的毛，上上次是把灯泡哥的日记叼到田里大嚼特嚼……
content.en: Last time it was secretly licking Woolsey's back. The time before that, it snatched Mr. Lightbulb's diary and chewed it up in the field...

content.cn: 它要不是我的论文，我恨不得把它直接炖了……
content.en: If it weren't my thesis project, I'd seriously consider stewing it...

content.cn: 虽然景玉谷这边不算偏，但也有遇到天使袭击的风险。
content.en: Even though Jingyu Valley isn't exactly remote, there's still a risk of Aggelos attacks here.

content.cn: 去老潘那里吃饭，他说在外面游历时遇到的天使变多了，不知道武陵这边会怎么样。
content.en: Went to eat at Pan's place. He said he's been running into more Aggeloi during his travels lately. Wonder if things will get worse here in Wuling too.

content.cn: 唉……世道是不是又要变了……
content.en: Ugh ... feels like the world's about to change again, doesn't it?

content.cn: 你们这些小孩子没碰过几次武器，都小心点，遇到危险该跑就跑。实在不行，就跑到清波寨求救，他们不会眼睁睁看着你们被天使撕了。
content.en: You kids have barely held a weapon. Be careful. If you run into danger, just run. If it gets bad, head to Qingbo Stockade for help. They won't just stand by and watch you get torn apart by Aggeloi.

content.cn: 这一次抢到的东西如下：
content.en: This time, here's what we managed to get:

content.cn: 虫笋、梨罐头——60；
content.en: Nymphsprouts, canned pear x60

content.cn: 火锅底料——40；
content.en: Hotpot base x40

content.cn: 民用应龙匕首——10。
content.en: Civilian-grade Yinglung Dagger x10

content.cn: 抢了很多，而且这次没人被抓。
content.en: We grabbed a lot this time, and nobody got caught.

content.cn: 上一次被抓的两个，有一个留在了武陵，另外那个回来了，说法还是那一套。
content.en: Out of the two who got caught last time, one stayed in Wuling. The other came back, still spinning the same old story.

content.cn: 武陵人说能教他一门手艺，劝他“正经过日子”“别在外面混”。
content.en: The Wuling folks said they could teach him a proper trade, told him to "live an honest life" and "stop messing around out there."

content.cn: 如果我被抓了，我会怎么办？
content.en: If I got caught, what would I do?

content.cn: 大吃特吃，然后留在武陵？听说那有一条街，里面吃的玩的都有，很好。
content.en: Eat my fill and just stay in Wuling? Heard there's a whole street there full of food and fun stuff. Sounds great.

content.cn: 回来？
content.en: Go home?

content.cn: 还是回来吧，从太爷爷那一辈的人开始，我们就在寨子里，家在这儿，我不想乱跑。
content.en: Yeah ... perhaps go home. Our family's been in this Stockade since my great-grandfather's time. Home is here. I don't want to wander.

content.cn: 这水花子多大，两丈，三丈？
content.en: How big is this splatter? Twenty feet? Thirty?

content.cn: 动静天崩地裂，小不了。
content.en: The commotion's shaking heaven and earth. It's definitely not small.

content.cn: 黑面煞很能打。
content.en: Darkmask is a real fighter.

content.cn: 问题在于是哪一种水花子，怎么进来的？
content.en: The question is, what kind of splatter is it, and how did it get in?

content.cn: 水脉是否安全？
content.en: Is the water vein still secure?

content.cn: 祖泉是不是出了什么问题？
content.en: Is there something wrong with the Ancestral Spring?

content.cn: 总控台！
content.en: Control Panel...

content.cn: 做什么的来着……
content.en: What's it for again...?

content.cn: 天师桩？不是天师桩，功能跟天师桩不一样……
content.en: Tianshi Pillar? Nah, couldn't be. They have different functions...

content.cn: 是叫定什么的来着？
content.en: What's it called again? Some kind of "emitter" or something?

content.cn: 定的是什么，水？不是水……
content.en: Emit what, water? No, definitely not water...

content.cn: 早知道上课前不熬夜了，但这东西肯定是巡林时用不到的设备。
content.en: Shouldn't have stayed up all night before class, but this is definitely equipment we won't need while patrolling the grove.

content.cn: 目前看起来，它处在未启动状态，似乎不太正常，之后上报一下吧。
content.en: From the looks of it, it doesn't seem to be activated. That's not right. I'll report it later.

content.cn: 再微小的设备损坏也必须最认真对待——新人培训第一题，也是十年前北部禁区那场事故后诞生的铁则。
content.en: Even the slightest equipment damage must be treated with the utmost attention. First lesson in rookie training: an iron rule born from the North Wuling Exclusion Zone accident a decade ago.

title.cn: 新人巡林员的备忘录（一）

content.cn: 蟠兽们的巢在这里，它们喜欢这些柱子的味道、温度，还有手感，会在上面磨爪子。
content.en: The pantailbeasts nest here. They love the scent, temperature, and texture of these pillars, and often sharpen their claws on them.

content.cn: 下次来可以给它们带点梨。
content.en: I can bring them some pears next time.

content.cn: 听说环境监测站一直需要这些小动物的照片，之后可以去看看。
content.en: I heard the Environment Monitoring Center is always looking for photos of these little creatures. I should check it out later.

title.cn: 新人巡林员的备忘录（二）

content.cn: 已上报损坏情况。
content.en: Damage report filed.

content.cn: 但这是怎么回事？这根天师桩不像是内部息壤耗尽后，压不住侵蚀才坏的……它更像是被外力破坏的……
content.en: But something's off. This Tianshi Pillar doesn't look like it failed from internal Xiranite depletion losing hold against the Blight. It seems more like it was damaged by external force.

content.cn: 还有些别的线索，女性的脚印……抓痕……像是指甲刮出来的……什么东西戳击了地面。
content.en: There are other clues too: female footprints, scratch marks ... like nails scraping, something stabbing the ground.

content.cn: 我要查查看，有可能别的地方也有这样的痕迹。说不定我能及时阻止一场堪比禁区爆炸的巨大灾难。
content.en: I need to investigate. Maybe there are similar traces elsewhere. Maybe I can stop a disaster as big as the Exclusion Zone explosion in time.

title.cn: 新人巡林员的备忘录（三）

content.cn: 驮鼻山，相传是因外观有几分像驮兽的鼻子而得名。
content.en: Burdosnout Hill is said to have gotten its name because its shape somewhat resembles a burdenbeast's nose.

content.cn: 相比之下，它不如摘菱屿有活力，有生命感，也不如幽谷花开时的艳丽。只是这种简单的，清净之美，确实很能抓住我。
content.en: Compared to the Zhailing Islet, it lacks that vibrant, living energy, and it doesn't have the dazzling beauty of the Gloomvale in full bloom. But this simple, quiet kind of beauty really captivates me.

content.cn: 等画完武陵八景，要不我就从新蓝卡坞搬到这里住吧……
content.en: After I finish painting the Eight Scenes of Wuling, maybe I should move here from New Wrankwood...

content.cn: 但估计武陵城很难扩建到这边，离清波寨太近了。天灾人祸之下，十年前他们和寨民的冲突……死了的人……谁是谁非，也说不明白……
content.en: But I doubt Wuling City will expand out this far, it's too close to Qingbo Stockade. With all the calamities and conflicts, that clash with the Stockaders ten years ago ... the lives lost ... who's to say who was right or wrong?

content.cn: 也想搬到宏山城，去画那里的环形山和质量加速器，都是奇景呀……
content.en: I've also thought about moving to the Hongshan to paint the Hongshan Crater and mass drivers there. Such incredible sights...

content.cn: 算了，未来的事未来再想。
content.en: Ah, forget it. I'll worry about the future when it gets here.

content.cn: ……先是竹林，再是竹筏。
content.en: ...First the bamboo grove, now the bamboo raft.

content.cn: 虽然成功走出了迷踪林，但我没想到还有竹筏这一关，显然，我搭错竹筏了。
content.en: I made it out of the Stragglers Grove, but I never expected the raft to be the next hurdle. Clearly, I got on the wrong one.

content.cn: 这是哪儿啊？
content.en: Where is this even...?

content.cn: 到了武陵城外这片地方，相比坐车绕远，还是竹筏更方便一点。
content.en: Getting to this area outside Wuling City, taking a raft is actually more convenient than riding a long detour by vehicle.

content.cn: 而且，乘竹筏随便转转，观赏一番风景也是好的。
content.en: Plus, just riding a raft around and taking in the scenery ... it's nice too.

content.cn: 听说武陵为了维护竹筏线路的安全，每年都会付出相当多的精力……天使应该一直是一种隐患。从地图看，这几条竹筏不仅让附近交通更为便利，似乎还满足了一定的防卫、巡逻需求。
content.en: I heard Wuling spends a lot of effort every year maintaining the safety of the raft routes. Aggeloi must always be a lurking threat. Looking at the map, these raft lines aren't just to make local travel more convenient. They seem to serve defensive and patrol purposes too.

content.cn: 我怀疑必要时，各个交通站点能构成一道道防线……很高明的规划水平……
content.en: I suspect that if needed, each transport hub could form layers of defense. Quite sophisticated planning...

title.en: Memo: One Who Took the Wrong Raft

content.cn: 古树台一切正常。
content.en: Elderroot Dais: All systems normal.

content.cn: 按照天师们的说法，这棵树至少有一千年的历史，甚至更长。
content.en: According to the Tianshi, this tree is at least a thousand years old, maybe even older.

content.cn: 也就是说，它在泰拉人到塔卫二前很久就存在了……
content.en: Which means it existed long before Terrans arrived on Talos-II...

content.cn: 在武陵还不叫武陵时，它就在这里，应该还见过百十年前清波寨的建立。
content.en: It was here even before this place was called Wuling, and it likely witnessed the founding of Qingbo Stockade over a century ago.

content.cn: 估计等我死了，它依旧会存在。
content.en: I bet it'll still be here long after I'm gone.

content.cn: 它要是会说话就好了，就能把我们的故事讲给后人听。
content.en: If only it could talk. Then it could tell our stories to those who come after us.

title.cn: 新人巡林员的备忘录（四）

content.cn: 巡检人：<@nar.mark>某人某</>
content.en: Inspector: <@nar.mark>XXX</>

content.cn: 1号桩：整体正常。
content.en: Pillar 1: Normal.

content.cn: 2号桩：整体正常。
content.en: Pillar 2: Normal.

content.cn: 7号桩：有异响，表面有损。
content.en: Pillar 7: Unusual noise, surface damage.

content.cn: 12号桩：息壤不足。
content.en: Pillar 12: Insufficient Xiranite.

content.cn: 日总结：7号桩异状应该是野兽衔来的石子导致的，12号是感应单元出了点小问题，二者皆已修复。
content.en: Daily Summary: The anomaly at Pillar 7 was likely caused by pebbles carried by beasts, while Pillar 12 had a minor issue with its sensor. Both have been repaired.

content.cn: 备注：我确实吓了一跳，还以为息壤供应出了什么问题。
content.en: Note: I must admit I was a bit alarmed at first, as I thought there might be a problem with the Xiranite supply.

title.en: Memo: Tianshi Pillar Array Daily Inspection

content.cn: 治疗起来没什么困难。
content.en: Treatment isn't difficult.

content.cn: 但其中一位病人有明显精神亢奋的迹象，另一人则精神萎靡。
content.en: But one patient exhibits marked mental agitation, while another is lethargic.

content.cn: 这确实奇怪，有毒有害物质损害人体还会挑人的吗？
content.en: This is truly odd. Do toxic substances pick who they attack?

content.cn: 我已经向巡卫进行了反馈。
content.en: I've reported everything to the watchguards.

content.cn: 暮鼓晨钟。
content.en: Its steady rhythm fosters discipline.

content.cn: 三到钟除了预警侵蚀，应该也有勉励学子的作用。
content.en: The Bell of Three Presences' purpose extends beyond warning of Blight; it probably serves to strengthen the scholars' resolve too.

content.cn: 也想听听钟鸣之声。
content.en: I also want to hear the bell ring.

content.cn: 算了，钟声响起即为灾厄到来。
content.en: Never mind. The bell ringing means disaster is coming.

content.cn: 武陵不易。
content.en: Wuling's path is not an easy one.

content.cn: 有无更多古董？
content.en: I wonder if there are more antiques here?

content.cn: 当我做梦，想看到真龙真迹。
content.en: In my dreams, I long to behold the True Lung.

content.cn: 若你爱我，便请亲手为我猎来晶城锭吧。
content.en: If you truly love me, go and fetch me a Chrysopolis Ingot.

content.cn: 我也会为你猎来肖像石。
content.en: I will also bring you an Effigy Stone.

content.cn: 我会将这些承载着人类历史中苦难与希望之物，切削成我们的婚戒。
content.en: I will fashion these objects, steeped in humanity's pain and hope, into our wedding rings.

content.cn: 它们将成为我们未来携手前进的见证，直到我们的两人的生命，都融入到那漫长的道路，漫长的牺牲中去。
content.en: They will stand as a testament to our journey together, until both our lives are woven into that long road, that endless sacrifice.

content.cn: 现在我最犹豫的是选择哪里，而不是什么项目。
content.en: Right now, it's the location I'm unsure about, not the project itself.

content.cn: 虽然留在武陵很好，应龙也是极度值得争取的目标，但我还是想试试向终末地投个简历。
content.en: Although staying in Wuling would be nice, and Yinglung is certainly a highly desirable place, I still want to try sending my resume to Endfield.

content.cn: 帝江号在天上啊！在天上！就此一个！别无分号！
content.en: C'mon! There's only one Dijiang, and who wouldn't want to hop aboard?

content.cn: 暂时抛开终末地工业对人类发展的贡献都行，就当是为了浪漫主义！浪漫主义！
content.en: And even if you set aside Endfield Industries' contributions to human progress, there's still this: Romanticism! Sheer Romanticism!

content.cn: 南瓜种植是很好的验证项目。
content.en: Pumpkin farming is an excellent test project.

content.cn: 我们离复原那些失去的技术就差一点点了，但差的也就仅仅是那一点点。
content.en: We're just a step away from restoring the technologies we lost, but it's always that last step that feels the hardest.

content.cn: 我会开始怀疑，世界上真的有那些农业技术吗？宏山科学院真的有从大炎，从大荒城带来尖端、实用的农业技术吗？
content.en: Sometimes I even wonder if those techniques truly existed. Did HAS really bring back practical, advanced techniques from Yan or Dahuang...?

content.cn: 就比如说作物速成……
content.en: Techniques like accelerated crop growth...

content.cn: 没关系，你们不用劝我，我知道肯定有这种技术。开拓一个未知的星球，要先喂饱所有的人。
content.en: Anyway, I believe they're real. They have to be. One can't build a future on a new world without feeding its people first.

content.cn: 我探求真理的心依旧坚定。
content.en: My conviction to seek the truth hasn't wavered.

content.cn: 你们知道的，我的祖父曾经是裂地者，人在饥饿和恐惧下的感受，我小时候每天都会听他讲。
content.en: My grandfather was a Landbreaker, and I grew up hearing his stories of hunger and fear.

content.cn: 我想让所有人都吃饱饭，就这么简单。
content.en: That's why my wish is simple: I want everyone to have enough to eat.

content.cn: 冷却和平衡……
content.en: Cooling and balancing...

content.cn: 这是让人苦恼的事情，制造息壤的技术核心在于把两种事物揉在一起。
content.en: The key to producing Xiranite is blending two elements together, and that's harder than it sounds.

content.cn: 难。
content.en: It's a tough nut to crack.

content.cn: 真正的问题是转化率的问题。
content.en: And the real challenge is conversion efficiency.

content.cn: 城周边能看到的所有源石几乎全被汇集到了武陵，但只能产出这么一点点息壤……
content.en: Almost all the Originium from around the city has been funneled into Wuling, but the yield is just a trickle of Xiranite.

content.cn: 工团和商会一直在想办法帮忙，但运输困难也是客观问题……
content.en: The UWST and TGCC are doing the best they can, but transport alone is a constant headache...

content.cn: 源石活性也是问题，众所周知，高深度地区源石活性会下降……工团的源石种植效率也跟着上不去……
content.en: On top of that, everyone knows Originium loses activity at deeper levels, which only makes the UWST's Originium cultivation efforts less effective...

content.cn: 比蒸馏速成陈酿还费劲。
content.en: Honestly, it's harder than trying to distill Instant Vintage.

content.cn: 下班去喝点。
content.en: I should go grab a drink after work...

content.cn: 不行，这些样本仅仅做到了表面的融合，完全没有办法使用。
content.en: Ugh, these samples only achieve surface-level fusion. They're completely unusable.

content.cn: 这样粗糙的融合甚至不需要设备，给我两个瓶子随便摇一摇就能实现。
content.en: Honestly, this kind of fusion doesn't even require proper devices. I could do it with two bottles and a shake.

content.cn: 这种息壤绝对没办法投入使用。
content.en: There's no way this Xiranite could be deployed.

content.cn: 产量问题确实亟待解决，但如果投放这种息壤，武陵怕是第二天就会融化在甚大裂隙里。
content.en: Xiranite production is indeed an urgent matter that must be addressed soon, but if we used this batch, Wuling would probably melt into the Very Large Rift by the next day.

content.cn: 息壤堰、武陵城……坐在“火山”上的感觉不好受，但战胜“火山”，正是我们存在的意义。
content.en: The Xiranite Dam, Wuling City... Sitting atop this "Volcano" is uncomfortable, but overcoming it is exactly why we exist.

content.cn: 显然，我们需要一种更简易高效的方式来生产息壤。
content.en: Clearly, we need a simpler and more efficient way to produce Xiranite.

content.cn: 但这几乎不可能实现……
content.en: But that's almost impossible...

content.cn: 难道我们要将多条生产线塞进一个生产装置中？这并不现实……
content.en: Are we really supposed to cram multiple production lines into a single device? That doesn't sound realistic...

content.cn: 显然塞进一个生产线也没办法实现技术迭代，除非那个生产装置是一个高度压缩的代理人。
content.en: Even fitting in just one production line wouldn't allow for technological iteration... Unless that production device were a highly compressed proxy.

content.cn: 庄老师殚精竭虑，除去息壤研究，武陵的一草一木她都要劳心。
content.en: Tianshi Zhuang has poured her heart and soul into everything, not just Xiranite research, but every plant and tree in Wuling.

content.cn: 她现在根本就是拿命熬着。
content.en: She's truly pushing herself to the limit.

content.cn: 能试的方向，感觉差不多都试过了。
content.en: We've explored nearly every possible approach.

content.cn: 武陵还很年轻，我们也都还年轻，这一关一定能过去。
content.en: Wuling is still young, and so are we. We'll overcome this challenge for sure.

content.cn: “三到钟”其意——眼到、手到、心到，代表着观察、实践以及认真的态度。
content.en: The "Bell of Three Presences" represents the eyes, the hands, and the heart — symbolizing careful observation, diligent practice, and sincere dedication.

content.cn: 真是漂亮，是炎国古董？二百年前在百灶吗？
content.en: Absolutely marvelous. Is this a Yan antique? Could it be from Baizao, two centuries ago?

content.cn: 还有什么古董在武陵，想都看看。
content.en: What other antiques are there in Wuling? I'd love to see them all.

content.cn: 如果有什么古兵器就好了。
content.en: It would be great if there were some ancient weapons around.

content.cn: 我！看到！庄老师！和一个！没见过的人！同游武陵！
content.en: BELIEVE IT OR NOT, I JUST SAW TIANSHI ZHUANG EXPLORING WULING WITH A STRANGER!

content.cn: 不不不，相信我，这件事绝对没有那么简单，虽然表面上一切如常，但一个人是否真正意义上的放松了自己，我是能够看出来的。
content.en: Trust me, this isn't as simple as it looks. Everything might seem normal on the surface, but I can tell when someone has truly let their guard down.

content.cn: 平常看到庄老师，她就像是被冻在了冰里，寒冷的紧张的氛围会让一个人的身体和灵魂僵硬得像钢铁一样。
content.en: Most of the time, Tianshi Zhuang seems encased in ice — the chill and tension around her making her feel remote and unreachable.

content.cn: 但这次我看到的庄老师，冻住她的“寒冰”或许稍稍化开了一些。
content.en: But when I saw her this time, it was as if that ice had finally started to thaw, even if only a little.

content.cn: 二十多年了，我想我也该承认了。
content.en: It's been over twenty years, and I think it's time I admitted it.

content.cn: 我就是没有学习的能力。
content.en: Studying just isn't something I can do.

content.cn: 几年前进了学院读书，现在成绩也是全面倒数。
content.en: I came to academy a few years ago, but my grades have stayed near the bottom ever since.

content.cn: 到了现在，我已经不知道自己究竟是不服气还是有梦想了。
content.en: At this point, I can't tell if I'm just being stubborn or if I still believe in some goal out there.

content.cn: 要不还是有梦想吧。
content.en: Maybe it's better to think I still have a goal.

content.cn: 我想了解超域，甚至有朝一日，我想打破禁令，亲自走进超域里。
content.en: I want to explore the Ætherside. Maybe one day I will break the ban and enter it myself.

content.cn: 然后我就在人类尚未踏足之处迷失着，徘徊着，直到无数年后，我离开那个密境，出现在人们面前。
content.en: I imagine losing myself there, drifting through lands no human has ever touched, only to return from that secret domain countless years later.

content.cn: 很有诗意。
content.en: Sounds almost poetic and dreamy.

content.cn: 唉，成绩真的代表一切吗？
content.en: Sigh, are grades really everything?

content.cn: <@nar.quote>进超域人就死了，你小子不要做梦。</>
content.en: <@nar.quote>Anyone who goes into the Ætherside dies. Don't be ridiculous, kid.</>

content.cn: 给应龙用的这一批装备，也可以考虑开始民用化了。
content.en: This gear batch designed for Yinglung might finally be ready for civilian adaptation.

content.cn: 之前的50式整体成本还是没有降下来。
content.en: But costs on making the Type 50 gear remain stubborn.

content.cn: 但这一批装备民用化方案依旧不好处理，就像小李那几件重型装备……
content.en: Converting this batch for civilian use is a headache ... just like Li's heavy gear...

content.cn: 铁誓军的使用数据传回来了，遥控式自行火炮在北边对付天使时表现还算优秀。
content.en: The Order of Steel Oath's field reports came in: the remote, self-propelled cannons did well against Aggeloi up north.

content.cn: 但它不见得能处理水下的东西。
content.en: Yet they may be ineffective underwater.

content.cn: 武陵水下的锚点仍是忧患，这些年大家已经习惯了水里会冒出天使，可习惯不代表正确。
content.en: Wuling's underwater Ankhors are still a worry. People have grown used to Aggeloi rising from the water, but "used to" isn't the same as safe.

content.cn: 我们需要研究处理水下锚点的新装备。
content.en: We must develop new gear to deal with threats posed by those Ankhors from below.

content.cn: 赤霄……赤霄……
content.en: Chi Xiao... Chi Xiao...

content.cn: 唉，小陈在终末地上班，她妈妈也不在武陵。
content.en: Gosh, Chen's working for Endfield, and her mother's not in Wuling.

content.cn: 制式赤霄型武器，有赤霄剑法威力的武器……有难度。
content.en: Making standard Chi Xiao-type weapons (ones that pack Chi Xiao Swordmancy's punch) is really difficult.

content.cn: 罢了，改日还是想想怎么让雷法更好融进武器装备吧。
content.en: Oh well, I'll worry about that later and focus on how to get Thunder Arts to fit into our weapons and gear.

content.cn: 或许能问问小庄？
content.en: Perhaps I can get some ideas from Zhuang?

content.cn: 那天晚上，我绝对看到了一个人影。
content.en: I definitely saw a figure the other night.

content.cn: 穿斗篷的人，应该是个小姑娘，她在浅水区旁边画画。
content.en: Maybe it was a girl. She wore a cape and was drawing by the lake.

content.cn: 揉一揉眼的时间她就不见了。
content.en: When I blinked, she was gone.

content.cn: 画画这件事是不是已经摧毁了我的精神……
content.en: Has art already broken my mind...

content.cn: 莫非我看到的是艺术的具象？
content.en: Or was I actually witnessing art itself come to life?

content.cn: 界石……
content.en: Marker Stone...

content.cn: 听说武陵也有界石外观的装饰品。
content.en: I heard Wuling sells scale model memorabilia of the Wuling Marker Stone.

content.cn: 武陵人称之为“如意方圆”，代表着来去自由的好运气。
content.en: Residents there call it Mark and Fulfill. Apparently, they believe that placing a marker stone at home helps invite winds of good fortune that "come and go as they wished".

content.cn: 得去买一个。
content.en: I've got to get one too.

content.cn: 如意方圆如意方圆，圆我之梦，让我回泰拉收古董。
content.en: May it fulfill my dream and let me go back to Terra to collect antiques.

content.cn: “武以止戈”“陵水经地”“厌难折冲”，雕像下刻着这样的字。
content.en: Engraved at the base of the statuettes were the phrases: "Wu as the pacifying force of martial might" and "Ling as the riparian ridge that denies the very Blight".

content.cn: 这些雕像看起来有些年头了，从受损状态来看，差不多有二十年？
content.en: These statuettes look pretty old. Judging by the damage, let's say around twenty years?

content.cn: 听说武陵的名字是取自“武以止戈，安民合众，陵水经地，厌难折冲”十六个字。
content.en: I've heard that the name Wuling comes from these phrases.

content.cn: 那么按道理说，这里应该有四座雕像。
content.en: I thought there was supposed to be four statuettes here.

content.cn: “安民合众”的雕像去哪里了？
content.en: Now there are just three here. Where's the fourth one?

content.cn: 莫非在清波寨？还是毁在当年的事故中？
content.en: Could it be in Qingbo Stockade, or was it destroyed in that accident?

content.cn: 金沙南瓜
content.en: Golden Sand Pumpkin

content.cn: 南瓜饼
content.en: Pumpkin Pancake

content.cn: 兽肉炖南瓜
content.en: Meat and Pumpkin Stew

content.cn: <@nar.quote>别问我，我也不知道今年他们为什么这么喜欢种南瓜。</>
content.en: <@nar.quote>I have no idea why they're so obsessed with pumpkins this year.</>

content.cn: 我很担心放弃息壤控流节点只是一个开始。
content.en: I'm really worried that giving up on the Xiranite flow control node is just the beginning.

content.cn: 息壤产量不足，下一个被放弃的会是什么设施？
content.en: With Xiranite production so slow, I wonder what facility will be cut next?

content.cn: 城内的水循环装置，还是学院的钟……
content.en: The city's water system? Or the academy's bell...

content.cn: 武陵在悬崖边上，怎么才能把它拉回来……
content.en: Wuling is sitting on the edge of a cliff... How can we pull it back...?

content.cn: 看来不只是古董这么简单。
content.en: Seems there's more to it than just being an antique.

content.cn: 巧妙的设计。
content.en: Ingenious design indeed.

content.cn: 位置很好，很契合武陵格局。
content.en: Excellent placement; it really suits Wuling's urban layout.

content.cn: 还是更高深的某种“格局”？
content.en: Or could there be a deeper, more sophisticated logic behind this placement?

content.cn: 我不是宏山人，看不明白。
content.en: I'm not a Hongshan native, so I can't figure this out...

content.cn: 作为侵蚀预警装置，能看出环环相扣。
content.en: As a Blight early-warning system, you can see how each part is interlinked.

content.cn: 此钟响后彼钟鸣，简单高效。
content.en: As this bell tolls, the others follow. Simple and efficient.

content.cn: 本人遗失包裹一个，内有糖果、钢笔、金票、图纸等物。
content.en: I've lost a package containing candy, a fountain pen, T-Creds, design drawing, and so on.

content.cn: 若有拾到者，不必还回。
content.en: If you happen to find it, there's no need to return it.

content.cn: 请由衷赞叹本人之设计天赋，感谢。
content.en: Just take a moment to admire my genius design. Thanks.

content.cn: 我儿亲启。
content.en: Dear son,

content.cn: 家中一切都好，你母亲、妹妹都好，可专心工作，不必挂念。
content.en: All is well at home. Your mother and sister are well, so just focus on your work.

content.cn: 虽是老生常谈，我仍需念叨。
content.en: It may be the same old advice, but I still have to say it.

content.cn: 武陵成立之历史，我有所耳闻。甚大裂隙终是隐患，“如履薄冰”不外如是。各城各地科研项目极多，以你之才，可换地发展。
content.en: I have read the history of Wuling's founding. The Very Large Rift remains a hidden danger. There are countless research projects across the cities. With your talent, you can always contribute elsewhere.

content.cn: 另，家中南瓜过量，务必不要再寄。
content.en: Also, we have an overabundance of pumpkins at home, so please do not send any more.

title.en: A Letter Home for the Researcher

content.cn: 所以你觉得我因为你以前是寨民就看不起你？
content.en: Did you really think I'd look down on you just because you were a Stockader?!

content.cn: 你觉得我要离你而去，去哪儿？去学院门口绑走几个天师结婚吗？
content.en: And what, you think I'd leave you? Where would I even go? Snatch a few Tianshi at the Academy gates and marry them?

content.cn: 日子是一天天过出来的，生活是一步步走出来的。
content.en: Life isn't about running away! It's about making each day count!

content.cn: 你是我们这组人里最会种地的，你给我自信起来啊！
content.en: You're the best farmer among us, so grow some confidence!

content.cn: 终于找到了，我想画出的武陵八景，其中最完美的一幅画就在于此。
content.en: Finally! The Eight Scenes of Wuling I've been searching for! This view is perfect, worthy of being painted and called a true masterpiece.

content.cn: 稍稍向远处看看就能体会到，最值得画出来的景色，就在这里。
content.en: I don't even have to explain why this is perfect. Just a glance into the distance is enough to feel it.

content.cn: 行走在田间地头的人们，他们辛劳工作时的汗水，与收获后的笑容。
content.en: People toiling in the fields, sweat glistening as they work, and their smiles shining after the harvest.

content.cn: 这是我所没有的。
content.en: I've never had any of these precious moments.

content.cn: 或许这就是“家园”。
content.en: Perhaps this is what they call "home".

content.cn: 真可惜，我似乎已经忘掉了“家”是什么。
content.en: I think I may have already forgotten what "home" really is.

content.cn: 我通常会在心情烦闷时来此处。
content.en: I come here whenever my mind feels heavy.

content.cn: 只需要稍稍抬眼，就能看到侵蚀在水面上展开。
content.en: Just a lift of my eyes is enough to see the Blight spreading over the water.

content.cn: 在这里看过去，群山被毁灭裹缚，长河被毁灭裹缚，无情的冰冷的死亡，就以一种足够美丽的方式，在我眼前不远处展开，以一种理所应当的态度。
content.en: From here, I can see the mountains lying shackled in ruin, the rivers chained in destruction. Merciless, icy death unfolds not far from me — strangely beautiful, as if it were meant to be this way.

content.cn: 侵蚀是理所应当的毁灭，我们的心中应燃起怎样的火，才能驱散它的寒冷？
content.en: Blight brings inevitable destruction. What fire must we kindle in our hearts to drive away its cold?

content.cn: 迷踪林外侧天师桩瞬间失去信号，疑似人为破坏。
content.en: The Tianshi Pillar on the outer side of the Stragglers Grove has suddenly lost signal, likely due to deliberate interference.

content.cn: 确认到巡林员设备信号消失。
content.en: Ranger devices have also gone offline.

content.cn: 申请派出巡卫检查事故环境。
content.en: Requesting dispatch of watchguards to investigate the site.

content.cn: 已紧急联络巡林员。
content.en: Rangers have been contacted urgently.

content.cn: 最高警戒及诸站点同步机制已准备启动。
content.en: Top-level alert is ready to be enacted. All outposts are synced and standing by.

title.cn: 数据分析员的同步文件

content.cn: 设备组运行状况：正常。
content.en: Device Status: Normal

content.cn: 设备温度：正常。
content.en: Device Temperature: Normal

content.cn: 息壤存量：正常。
content.en: Xiranite Reserves: Normal

content.cn: 网络连接状况：正常。
content.en: Network Connection: Normal

content.cn: 数据峰值：过高。
content.en: Data Peak: Excessively High

content.cn: 数据打印模块：正常。
content.en: Data Print Module: Normal

content.cn: 日总结：硬件正常，软件疑似存在问题。
content.en: Daily Report: Hardware functioning normally. Potential software issue detected.

content.cn: 备注：按照早上刚刚收到的甚大裂隙深度监测数据，甚大裂隙没有发生异常，但今天咱们这里的显示数据确实不大对，动态侵蚀概率怎么高了这么多？从打印出的图来看，简直像是有一个会动的裂隙在武陵外围来回走动，真的很奇怪，感觉需要启动预警了。
content.en: Note: Based on the latest Depth monitoring data of the Very Large Rift received this morning, no abnormalities were found. However, today's local readings seem unusual, as the Active Blight probability has spiked significantly. The printed charts almost suggest a moving rift circling around Wuling's perimeter. This is very odd indeed ... perhaps it's time to activate the early warning system.

content.cn: 多买龙泡泡。
content.en: Purchase as many Chubby Lung as possible.

content.cn: 问一问选剑局有没有民用车辆武装套件。
content.en: Check with the Bureau of Swordmancers to see if they have weapon kits for civilian vehicles.

content.cn: 搞一批武陵特有的天使的照片。
content.en: Get photos of Wuling-specific Aggeloi.

content.cn: 武陵最大的缺口其实是源石，谁都知道他们造息壤把城周边的源石晶簇都切干净了……
content.en: Wuling's biggest shortfall is Originium. Everybody knows that Xiranite production has exhausted the Originium clusters around the city...

content.cn: 我什么时候才能参与这种大宗交易……
content.en: When will I ever get to participate in those big bulk trades...?

content.cn: 要不回去先从成立公司开始吧。
content.en: Maybe I should start by setting up a company after I get back.

content.cn: 我当然知道彪兽危险，但锻炼自身的根本方法就是和足够强大的敌人交手。
content.en: Of course I know how dangerous the rakerbeasts are, but that's the whole point. You don't get stronger fighting weaklings.

content.cn: 先和彪兽过过招，然后是球刺兽群，最后是天鼓……
content.en: I'll warm up with rakerbeasts, then take on quillbeasts, and then maybe skydrummers...

content.cn: 区区野兽，以何胜我？
content.en: They're just beasts. I'm not gonna let them take me down!

content.cn: 不用担心我，它还能把我拖回洞里嚼了？
content.en: I'm no weakling! I won't let one haul me off and chew me up!

content.cn: 我的朋友们都说我悲观。
content.en: My friends have been calling me a pessimist.

content.cn: 可悲观并非我的天性，我也曾见证科考站从无到有，见证我们在一处险地，尝试着一点点地遏制裂隙。
content.en: But that's not how I was born. I've seen the Science Station built from scratch, seen us struggle in a perilous place to tackle the rift.

content.cn: 那时的我无比自信。
content.en: I was pretty confident back then.

content.cn: 那么，我是因何而变得绝望呢？
content.en: So, what turned me hopeless?

content.cn: 我想大概是因为十年前的雨夜吧。
content.en: Probably that rainy night ten years ago.

content.cn: 我想我也是凶手之一。
content.en: I might even have been one of the ones to blame.

content.cn: 自此，我对人类，对全人类的前景，感到绝望。
content.en: Since then, I've lost faith in humanity and its future.

content.cn: 好一位夜先生。
content.en: What a Night Walker!

content.cn: 好一位靖天校尉！
content.en: What a Captain of Pacified Skies!

content.cn: 我请教了武学真意，他并未言明，只是指向了面前的水景。
content.en: I sought to learn the true meaning of martial arts from him, but he gave no answer, only gestured toward the waters ahead.

content.cn: 好，好，好。
content.en: I'm enlightened...

content.cn: 我已领悟。
content.en: I totally get it now.

content.cn: 水中自有生死，剑中亦有生死。
content.en: Life and death flow within the water, as they do within the sword.

content.cn: 我将纳百川。
content.en: I shall take all rivers into my flow.

content.cn: 请各位游商、运输者提高警惕。
content.en: Attention all merchants and transporters.

content.cn: 现收到通知，有裂地者团伙正向武陵移动，请各位暂时不要离开武陵，或保证自己拥有足量武器及足够敏捷的移动能力。
content.en: Reports indicate a Landbreaker group is heading toward Wuling. Do not leave the city for the time being; if you must, ensure you are properly armed and agile enough to protect yourself.

content.cn: 武陵巡卫提醒您：金票无限，生命有限。愿您旅程顺利。
content.en: Advise from Wuling Watchguards: T-Creds are endless, life is not. Stay safe on your journey.

content.cn: 昨天离开的游人所留下的肥料配方。
content.en: Fertilizer formula left behind by the Songseeker who departed yesterday.

content.cn: 驮兽粪：三份
content.en: Burdo-Muck: 3 portions

content.cn: 锦草的根：一份
content.en: Jincao Root: 1 portion

content.cn: 彪兽的粪：一份
content.en: Rakerbeast Muck: 1 portion

content.cn: 长耳兽的粪：十份
content.en: Long-ear Muck: 10 portions

content.cn: 沤二十天。
content.en: Ferment for 20 days.

content.cn: 按她的说法，这是荒地上最好的肥料，万粪之粪，众肥之肥。
content.en: According to her, this is the best fertilizer for the wildlands. It blends all kinds of manure into the richest compost of them all.

content.cn: 起先我也怀疑，众生长地的人在荒地上种地吗？
content.en: I was skeptical at first. Do people from the Hannabit Circuit really farm on the wildlands?

content.cn: 不过她说她的师者是专攻种地的……
content.en: But she said her Aldertone specialized in farming...

content.cn: 科学院的定制合成肥肯定更有效啦，但看到什么土法子都想试试，也算是宏山人的天性了……
content.en: I'm sure the Academy's custom synthetic fertilizers are probably more effective, but trying every old-school method you see is just part of the Hongshan spirit...

content.cn: 这里食品之类的基础物资存储量比较大，巡视时需注意，有可能是清波寨民的重点劫掠目标。
content.en: This area stores a large quantity of basic supplies like food. Stay alert during patrols, as it could be a prime target for Qingbo Stockaders.

content.cn: 看看情况，如果来袭者确实不容易，可以稍稍抬手放过。
content.en: Use your judgement: if the raiders are having a tough time, it's fine to let them off.

content.cn: 汤汤，又是汤汤……
content.en: Tangtang... Ugh, it's her again.

content.cn: 这小姑奶奶下次能不能轻点炸墙？
content.en: Can that kid please not blow holes in the walls next time?

content.cn: 如果不是看着她和我家女儿差不多大，我就冲出去替弭弗抓了她。
content.en: If she weren't about my daughter's age, I would've gone out and roughed her up for Mi Fu.

content.cn: 这么说我倒是有个想法。
content.en: Hmm, I got an idea.

content.cn: 要不就把这小姑奶奶抓进来上学吧？小小年纪，当是有为青年，不识字像什么话！
content.en: I should drag her into school! She's young and capable, being illiterate is ridiculous!

content.cn: 老师说，高手多死于沙场，因此引起了我的好奇，自第二次天使战争结束后，塔卫二已经久未发生大型战事，因此也就许久没有诸如“劈碎天使群”的传说出现了。
content.en: I was told that many masters meet their end on the battlefield, which sparked my curiosity. Since the end of the Second Aggeloi War, Talos-II has seen little large-scale battles, and tales of feats like "cleaving through hordes of Aggeloi" have long faded.

content.cn: 那么，如今天下都有怎样的高手，尤其是年轻一代，本领如何惊人？
content.en: What, then, are the skills of today's masters, especially the younger generation?

content.cn: 我将访之。
content.en: I decided to find out myself.

content.cn: 初至武陵，见惊才绝艳者如庄方宜，雷法高绝。可惜其任职管代天师，身负重责。她作为一名管理者、研究者的作用明显大于作为战场先锋的。
content.en: When I first arrived in Wuling, I met remarkable talents like Zhuang Fangyi, whose mastery of Lei Fa (Thunder Arts) is simply extraordinary. Unfortunately, she serves as the Viceroy Tianshi, carrying heavy administrative responsibilities. Her strengths lie much more in management and research than in leading the charge on the battlefield.

content.cn: 旅居数日后，见到了那位靖天校尉，他拒绝了我“观其剑势”的请求。不能见开天辟地之威，可惜。
content.en: After traveling for several days, I met the Captain of Pacified Skies, who declined my request to observe his swordsmanship. How I wish I could witness his earth-shattering power...

content.cn: 再居数日，没有打听到陈迟迟前辈的下落。
content.en: In the following days, I failed to track down Chen Chichi.

content.cn: 跟随物资运输队再赴北地时，刚好铁誓军有外出任务，未能见到其中青年才俊。听我的铁誓军朋友讲，近几年倒是有不少好苗子，身受重伤仍能奔袭百里者有之，着重甲持巨炮如无物者亦有之。
content.en: Then, while following the supply convoy to the North, I missed the chance to see the promising young members of the Oathkeepers, as they were away on a mission. According to my Oathkeeper friends, several have emerged in recent years: some can march a hundred miles despite serious injuries, while others handle heavy armor and massive cannons as if they were light as feathers.

content.cn: 也远远瞥见了萨索先生，就是那位杰拉德·“受祝颂的杰拉德”·萨索，当然，他并非年轻一代，其传说早已在塔卫二大地上流传许久。
content.en: From afar, I also glimpsed Gerald "The Sanctified" Zasso. He may not be of the younger generation, but his legendary deeds have long been renowned throughout Talos-II.

title.en: Excerpts from Catalog of Warriors Under the Heavens

content.cn: 方兴衢扩建的难点在于武陵整体的扩建规划，归根结底，也就是息壤的供应范围究竟能有多广，再向下追索，那就到了息壤产能的问题上。
content.en: The real challenge in expanding Fangxing Avenue lies in Wuling's overall expansion plan. It all comes down to how far the supply of Xiranite can extend. And tracing it further, to the capacity of Xiranite production.

content.cn: 庄天师让咱们放手施为，咱们自然不能辜负她的心意。
content.en: With Tianshi Zhuang's trust behind us, we cannot afford to falter.

content.cn: 当年事故之后，武陵如果没有吊上一口气，那估计就成了死城了。
content.en: After the accident, Wuling was hanging on by a single breath. The city could easily have fallen silent.

content.cn: 这口气是什么，至少在我看，就是方兴衢，一点生机，一口活气。
content.en: For me, that breath was Fangxing Avenue, the very embodiment of vitality and a road to renewal.

content.cn: 庄天师是很聪明的，她抓住了重点，也抓住了终点。当年寄回环形山的招商计划为什么能抓住商会的企业，甚至数舟这种老品牌，只在一座商场吗？
content.en: Tianshi Zhuang saw this clearly. She focused on the essentials, and on the future. The plan she sent back to Hongshan Crater didn't succeed because of a single mall, or commerce alone. It convinced TGCC and legacy brands like Shuzhou for one simple reason.

content.cn: 不，本质是人，是商路，是生机。
content.en: It embodied people, routes, and the very promise of life.

content.cn: 敢在甚大裂隙上边繁衍生息的，只有咱们。
content.en: We are the only ones daring enough to live and thrive on the Very Large Rift.

content.cn: 从甚大裂隙上如履薄冰的科考站，到贯通南北的锦绣之城……庄天师的眼光真是“毒辣”。
content.en: From the Science Station that once on it like thin ice, to today's flourishing city that links north and south... I must say, Tianshi Zhuang's vision is truly unmatched.

content.cn: 我到现在也跟不上队伍的速度。
content.en: I still can't keep up with the team.

content.cn: 但我就想啊，跑者的精神，它的那个最本质的东西，是什么呢？
content.en: But I keep asking myself: what really defines a runner's spirit?

content.cn: 欸，是坚持，明白吧，坚持。
content.en: It's perseverance.

content.cn: 这个东西就和生命这个概念一样，跑起来，别停。
content.en: Running is like life itself: keep going, and don't stop.

content.cn: 先做到别停就行。
content.en: I must keep going and keep running.

content.cn: 又是一年。
content.en: Another year has passed.

content.cn: 我当然知道你已经死在了禁区，于此告别后，你已死在勘探禁区的行动中。
content.en: I know well enough that you perished in the exclusion zone. After we parted, you took on the mission, went into that place, and never came back.

content.cn: 不归林，不归林……
content.en: Bugui Grove... Bugui Grove...

content.cn: 我们的死别已经成为了一段故事，一个地名。
content.en: Our farewell has turned into a story, a place.

content.cn: 等到哪一天我也死了，我们就能一起活在这段故事中了。
content.en: When my time comes, I'll join you, and together we'll live on inside that story.

content.cn: 口味：5分  绝对的满分，今天算是真正见识到了什么叫香飘百里，什么叫辣而不燥。一口肉夹进嘴里以后，只在书上才读到过的“尚蜀”，就好像直接冲到我眼前了。
content.en: Flavor: 5/5. Absolutely perfect. Today I finally understood what it means for a scent to travel for miles and a spice to hit just right without being overwhelming. The moment I bit into the meat, the legendary Shangshu I'd only read about in books sprang to life before my eyes.

content.cn: 环境：4分  店还是略小了一点。唯一的缺点。
content.en: Ambience: 4/5. A little cramped, otherwise great.

content.cn: 服务：5分  服务员热情但是不会给人压力，健谈但是很有边界感。
content.en: Service: 5/5. Friendly and approachable, the staff are chatty but give you plenty of space.

content.cn: 其他店找不到的是什么？是这里的老板。
content.en: What sets this place apart from all the other restaurants? It's the owner.

content.cn: 我和他只聊了三五句，这位先生一定去过塔卫二上很多地方。
content.en: I only exchanged a few words with him, but I could tell he had traveled extensively across Talos-II.

content.cn: 点单时看到玛尔斯波利斯风味腌野菜，还以为只是餐馆噱头，但在它被端上桌的那一瞬间我就知道，厨师已经掌握了我故乡菜式的神髓。
content.en: When I saw "Morospolis-style Picked Greens" on the menu, I really thought it was just a gimmick at first. But the moment it was served, I knew the chef had truly mastered the soul of my hometown's cuisine.

content.cn: 果然，潘先生是去过玛尔斯波利斯的，他和我聊到了那里宏伟的建筑，聊到了人与人之间的热情洋溢……我想家了。
content.en: As it turned out, Mr. Pan had indeed been to Morospolis. We spoke about the grand architecture and the warmth of people there... I felt homesick.

content.cn: 美食家们说“舌品百样菜，眼观千种人”，大概就是指潘先生这样的高手吧。
content.en: Food critics often say, "Taste a hundred dishes with your tongue, see a thousand people with your eyes." I think they were speaking of someone exactly like Mr. Pan.

content.cn: 提问者：你知道的，我确实是历史爱好者，因此才对你们宏山的很多东西感兴趣，也会因此产生疑问，就拿“天师府学院”这个名字来说吧，按照我搜集的炎国资料，它为什么不直接叫“天师府”呢？
content.en: Q: You know, I'm really into history, and many things about Hongshan pique my interest. I've got some questions in mind. Take the name "Tianshi Bureau Academy" as an example, based on what I've found about Yan, why didn't they just call it "Tianshi Bureau"?

content.cn: 讲解者：宏科院当年是尊炎制，凭“天师府附属”的名号成立的，然后才有的如今五个科学发展区，再然后才在各区新办学府。那自然不能再开出“宏山天师府”来——一个下级单位怎么能反过头去再建立上级单位呢？这才有天师想到加上“学院”两字，另办新支，视为宏科院的院管单位。
content.en: A: Back then, Hongshan Academy of Sciences (HAS) was founded under the Yan system as the "Affiliated Hongshan Academy of Sciences of Tianshi Bureau of Great Yan". Later, it expanded into five Scientific Developmental Districts, with new schools established in each. Naturally, they couldn't just call it "Hongshan Tianshi Bureau", since a subordinate unit couldn't just set up its own superior. That's why the Tianshi added "Academy" to the name, creating the "Tianshi Bureau Academy" — a new branch that remained under HAS's management.

content.cn: 提问者：还有这样的说法……
content.en: Q: I see...

content.cn: 讲解者：一切都是为了规矩嘛。“武陵天师府”也是靠给区务办公室加牌子的方法暂行的，“管代”也是“代为管理”……当初总审天师跟朝廷打的那套申请报告现在还在本部档案局堆着呢，等将来星门通了就往泰拉报送。
content.en: A: It's all about following the rules. The "Wuling Tianshi Bureau Academy" was set up temporarily with nothing more than a plaque on the District Office. "Guandai" literally means "acting in management." Back then, the Chief Reviewer Tianshi submitted all those reports to the imperial court, and they're still in the archives. Once the Cosmic Gate opens, they'll be sent to Terra.

content.cn: 提问者：这么复杂！也就是说，有“武陵天师府”，但没有“宏山天师府”？
content.en: Q: Wow, that's complicated! So there's a "Wuling Tianshi Bureau Academy" but no "Hongshan Tianshi Bureau"?

content.cn: 讲解者：对，但是有“本部天师府”。
content.en: A: Right. But there is "Headquarters Tianshi Bureau".

content.cn: 提问者：这……就没人用错过？
content.en: Q: My head... Hasn't anyone ever used it incorrectly?

content.cn: 讲解者：有的是！但不能用错的人不用错就行了……你慢慢参去吧。
content.en: A: Plenty of people have! But as long as the rules are followed by those who matter, it's fine... No worries, just take your time.

content.cn: 提问者：这么看，你们天师府学院实力最强的专业是材料学，其次居然是农学，但我好像没听说过这边有什么农学成就吧？
content.en: Q: If I remember right, Materials Science is the strongest field at the Tianshi Bureau Academy, right? And Agronomy comes next? That's kinda surprising. I don't think I've ever heard of any big agricultural breakthroughs from there.

content.cn: 讲解者：你说，我们宏山哪里的农学专业实力差？
content.en: A: Tell me, since when has any of Hongshan's agronomy programs been weak?

content.cn: 提问者：……倒也确实。
content.en: Q: You have a point...

content.cn: 提问者：那你们的雷法在哪儿学，源石技艺那边？
content.en: Q: So where do you learn your Thunder Arts? Is it a type of Originium Arts?

content.cn: 讲解者：武陵可没有单独开雷法专业，这种东西想学的话从小就能学，入门容易精深难……至于系统性的研究，这倒的确会被归在源石技艺专业里面。
content.en: A: Wuling doesn't have a dedicated Thunder Arts program. People who want to learn it usually start from a young age. It's actually pretty easy to pick up, but hard to master. As for formal study, yeah, it's categorized under Originium Arts.

title.cn: 历史爱好者的聊天记录

content.cn: 除了本部，其他三个科学发展区的孩子，已经有提前来武陵备考的了。
content.en: Aside from those from the HAS HQ, students from three other scientific developmental districts have already arrived in Wuling ahead of time to prepare for the exams.

content.cn: 住宿要保障好，我看很多孩子都是为了材料学来的，可以找几天，组织参观一下各类息壤设施，进行一下讲解。
content.en: Make sure their accommodations are well arranged. I've noticed many of them came for Materials Science, so let's organize a few tours of the Xiranite facilities and give them some proper introductions.

content.cn: 务必，务必嘱咐别让他们近距离看侵蚀潮。出租竹筏设备要管理好。
content.en: And make sure to remind everyone to stay well away from the Blight Tide. Also, keep tight control over the bamboo raft rentals.

content.cn: 我是学术垃圾，我住哪里？
content.en: I suck at learning, I'm trash. So where do I crash?

content.cn: 不是送垃圾回家吗，我家呢？
content.en: They say, "Take trash home," but ... what even is my home?

content.cn: 本人偶得众生长地肥料配方一份，以之为基础，现已调配出迭代产品，愿将配方赠予众人：
content.en: I've come across a unique fertilizer formula from the Hannabit Circuit. Based on it, I've developed an improved version, and I'm happy to share it with everyone:

content.cn: 驮兽粪便辅以液化息壤，沤三日，可得维持地力之良品！实属万粪之粪，众肥之肥也！
content.en: To make a fertilizer that keeps the soil fertile, mix Burdo-Muck with Liquid Xiranite and let it ferment for three days. The result is a rich, top-quality compost unlike any other!

content.cn: 息壤难得，良粪亦难得，有欲收购上佳之驮兽粪便者，可电联：<@nar.mark>████████████</>。
content.en: Xiranite is hard to come by, and good muck's even harder. If you're looking to purchase high-quality Burdo-Muck, please contact me at: <@nar.mark>████████████</>

content.cn: 凭此宣传单可在大宗驮粪交易环节享受折扣，仅限一次。
content.en: Present this flyer during bulk muck trades to receive a one-time discount.

content.cn: 你们不要幸灾乐祸！
content.en: Quit gloating!

content.cn: 我只不过是论文选题被否了而已！又不是毕不了业！
content.en: They only rejected my thesis proposal! I'm still going to graduate!

content.cn: 如果让我暂时抛开教授对我的教导，只是单纯评价被否掉的选题，我认为它真的具有研究价值。
content.en: If I can be allowed to temporarily set aside the professor's lessons and solely focus on the rejected thesis, I still believe that it is a subject we should look into.

content.cn: 你们想想，近一百五十年前第一次天使战争，管理员带着四十位英雄豪杰进入极光壁，极光壁里发生了什么，你们难道不好奇？
content.en: Think about the First Aggeloi War that took place nearly 150 years ago, the battle where the Endministrator and forty heroes went into the Aurora. What happened in there? Aren't you curious about that?

content.cn: 别说我是阴谋论者，极光壁里的事情没有任何公开资料，甚至四十位英雄的名单，截止到今天，都只公布了几位……那么剩下的人呢？牺牲在极光壁内了？
content.en: So stop calling me a conspiracy theorist. No official records have been released about the events behind the Aurora. And of the forty heroes who joined the Endmin, only a handful of names have been revealed to date... What about the rest? Did all of them die in the Aurora?

content.cn: 不可能只有这些幸存者，可三大阵营为什么不选择公开所有人的身份，是为了保护他们，还是为了保守什么秘密而选择尽量降低信息流出的可能？
content.en: That can't be true, but why would the Big Three choose to keep their identities a secret? For protection? Or to keep something secret and reduce the possibility for accidental leak of information?

content.cn: 一定发生了什么事情。
content.en: Something definitely happened.

content.cn: 有什么被掩埋在了历史中，你们难道不好奇？
content.en: Something's hidden within our history. Aren't you curious about this?

content.cn: 唉……截止到昨天我都是好奇的，我在四号谷地生活时就常和工友们讨论，他们非说我是野史爱好者……没品位！没品位呀！
content.en: Ugh... I was curious up until yesterday. I often brought up the topic with my fellow crew mates when I lived in Valley IV. They called me a conspiracy theorist and folklore lover... Unlettered fools! The lot of them!

content.cn: 好吧，其实到今天我依旧是好奇的，但……教授说得没错。
content.en: Fine. I confess I am still rather curious about things, but ... the professor might be right.

content.cn: 无论英雄们隐瞒了什么，伟大的他们付出了伟大的牺牲。那些被隐藏起来的东西，倘若要揭开，则必然会伴随着巨大的痛苦，同时，这也是对奉献者们的蔑视。我不能这样做。
content.en: No matter what the heroes chose to hide, they were great individuals who made great sacrifices. Revealing the secrets might bring about terrible suffering, and make a mockery of those who had given so much. It is something that I cannot do.

content.cn: 我还是换换论文选题吧，或许可以写写裂地者的兴衰。
content.en: Maybe I should switch to another thesis topic. Perhaps I can write about the rise and fall of the Landbreakers.

title.cn: 历史研究者的留言记录

content.cn: 天师：这么说，老师风采依旧？
content.en: Tianshi: So that means our mentor is still doing well?

content.cn: 信使：杀几日天使，醉几日，再杀几日天使，至少生活规律。
content.en: Messenger: A few days of Aggeloi hunting, followed by a few days of drunkenness, then followed by a few more days of Aggeloi hunting. That seems to be the routine.

content.cn: 天师：如此我们就放心了，那武器呢？我们送到北边的重剑，老师如何评价，可上手用了？
content.en: Tianshi: We're glad to hear that. What about the weapon? The greatsword we mailed north? Did our mentor say anything about that? Did she use it?

content.cn: 信使：她上手掂了掂分量，只说太轻，还嫌功率不高……师哥，你还能不知道吗，她老人家退敌何时靠过外物，你们设计重剑时的假想敌，她空手也就撕了。
content.en: Messenger: She felt the weapon for a bit, complained that it was too light, and wasn't impressed by the limited output... Come now, gorgeous, you should know the old lady hardly used weapons in combat. Whatever that greatsword was designed to kill, she ripped it apart with her bare hands.

content.cn: 天师：呃，我从不质疑她老人家的实力，只盼着她能在外面多夸夸选剑局的东西……咱们的武器销量能翻一番。
content.en: Tianshi: O...kay. I never doubted the old lady's prowess. I just hope she could say something nice about HS.Swords products while traveling... It would really boost our sales, you know.

content.cn: 信使：俗了师哥，俗了。
content.en: Messenger: That is such a mid idea, darling. Very mid.

content.cn: 天师：玩笑罢了，选剑局向来拿本事说话。
content.en: Tianshi: It's just a joke. In HS.Swords and the Bureau of Swordmancers, skill has always been the true measure of worth.

content.cn: 城外“淬剑荡”，这名字有着独特的来由。传说当年有天师在彼处以湖淬剑，削峰试刃，其所作所为甚至让湖水水位下降了五尺。
content.en: The name "Sword Quenching Marsh" is steeped in legend. They say that ages ago, a Tianshi forged their sword here, cooling it in the lake and testing it by slicing through a peak, until the water level dropped by five feet.

content.cn: 我并不在意铸剑淬剑的部分。
content.en: I care little for the forging or tempering of sword.

content.cn: 我只在意武陵是否潜藏着什么真正高深的剑法。
content.en: What I truly wish to know is if Wuling harbors any genuine, profound swordsmanship.

content.cn: 不知此生是否有机会见见赤霄。
content.en: I wonder if, in this lifetime, I'll ever have the chance to witness Chi Xiao.

content.cn: 并非小辈胡闹，而是真正的大师手段。
content.en: I don't mean the clumsy tricks of youngsters, but the true mastery of a grandmaster.

content.cn: 但我着实不知她在何处。
content.en: Yet I truly have no idea where she might be.

content.cn: 我亲爱的兄弟姐妹们，岳研是一个年轻的品牌，是一个尚不到20岁的年轻人。
content.en: My dear friends, Eureka is still a young brand — like someone barely twenty.

content.cn: 我们仍需努力。
content.en: We must keep striving.

content.cn: 兄弟姐妹们，请你们低头看看，在你们胸前的是什么，是岳研的身份名牌吗？不，并不是，绝不是。在你们胸前的，是勋章的铁胚。只要我们多卖出一杯茶饮，让我们的用户年龄再拓宽一岁，熠熠生辉的勋章就会出现在你们的胸前。
content.en: Look down. What you're wearing isn't just a random Eureka name tag. It's an iron core waiting to be forged into a shining medal. Every cup of tea we sell, every new customer age group we reach, brings that medal one step closer to brilliance.

content.cn: 再抬头看看，兄弟姐妹们，再抬头看看吧，看看天上的塔罗斯，试着想想，我们的竞争对手是谁？是数舟那种老牌品牌吗？并不是，忘了它，将眼光放长远些吧。
content.en: Now, lift your heads and look up at Talos. Who are we really competing with? Brands like Shuzhou? No way. Forget them. Think bigger.

content.cn: 如果人类有朝一日会登上塔罗斯，我们就保证宇航员补充的第一口水分属于岳研吧。
content.en: If humanity ever sets foot on Talos, we'll make sure the very first sip astronauts take carries the name of Eureka.

content.cn: 昨天我在景玉谷巡视，看到了一些武器留下的痕迹。
content.en: While I was patrolling Jingyu Valley yesterday, I spotted some marks left by weapons.

content.cn: 大弩、巨斧……这些痕迹属于裂地者。
content.en: Giant crossbows and axes... They definitely belong to the Landbreakers.

content.cn: 裂地者和清波寨不是同一种胡闹，他们真的靠近了武陵，我们应该提起重视。
content.en: They're not the same kind of trouble as Qingbo Stockade, and since they've actually come close to Wuling, we need to take it seriously.

content.cn: 或许这样不合规矩，但是否有可能破例让“应龙”出动一次？
content.en: It might bend the rules, but could we make an exception and deploy Yinglung this once?

content.cn: 我们应该集中火力，用最高效率处理掉外患。
content.en: We should concentrate our forces and eliminate the threat as efficiently as possible.

content.cn: 很是怪异。
content.en: How strange.

content.cn: 几个行商行至景玉谷边界，说是喉咙忽然感受到了“灼烧感”，还看到了烟气。
content.en: Several merchants traveling near the edge of Jingyu Valley reported a sudden burning sensation in their throats and observed smoke.

content.cn: 检查下来，呼吸道确实是受损了。
content.en: Upon inspection, their respiratory tracts were indeed damaged.

content.cn: 同时，视觉神经也受到了轻微的影响……
content.en: And their optic nerves were slightly affected...

content.cn: 那里出现了新形成模式的天使？
content.en: Could there be new Aggeloi construct patterns?

content.cn: 管理员！我们收到了资料！
content.en: Endministrator! We received the data!

content.cn: 下次我要想办法换一个能闻到味道的终端，唉，但是感觉只闻到味道也不够，有没有能够直接传送商业街食物的小型终端……好吧，我要停止会被组长骂的寒暄，开始给您认真分析资料了。有关您所好奇的，武陵商业街的发展，我们确认到了以下情报。
content.en: I'll try to find a replacement terminal capable of communing smells as well. Perhaps the smells won't be enough. I wonder if there's a handyterm capable of physically delivering snacks from the shopping avenue... Okay. I must conclude the usual greetings and start data analysis if I wish to avoid the wrath of my team leader. We have verified the following intel regarding the history of the Wuling shopping avenue that you are interested in.

content.cn: 首先，我们可以肯定的是，武陵的方兴衢是一个奇迹，不可复制的奇迹。
content.en: First, we are certain that Fangxing Avenue of Wuling is a wonder that cannot be replicated elsewhere.

content.cn: 我想您应该已经产生了对甚大裂隙的基础认知——近百公里的大型裂隙群就在武陵地下，也就是说，这座城几乎就是建在一座“活火山”上——准确地说是“火山口”里。那么为什么这座城里，能够发展出一条繁华的商业街，为什么会如此安居乐业呢？……我们查阅了历年有关武陵的报告，确认了一件事——庄方宜，这位管代天师拥有着极高的管理水平。从建城开始，她的思路中就存在着发展民生、教育、招商等等事项，这种完善的思维真是让人叹为观止。当然，我并没有否定武陵民众奉献的意思……在我们已确认到的资料中，庄天师每一次都能在最准确的方向上，列出最翔实的发展规划，无论是新增几个竹筏站点，又或者是为方兴衢新增一个龙泡泡款式……我猜武陵的每一个人——这么说有点夸张，但——一定都信任她，不然武陵必然不可能发展到今天的样子。您看到了游商的备忘，看到了普通居民的评价，也看到了经营者的笔记……无论内与外，所有人都相信这条街能蒸蒸日上。在险地之中亦有奇景，我想这就是方兴衢给许多人的第一印象。
content.en: I believe you already have the basic understanding of the Very Large Rift (VLR). The huge formation of multiple rifts measures nearly one hundred kilometers in length and exists right below Wuling. In other words, the city is literally built on an "active volcano" — To be more accurate, the entire place is built right over a "volcanic crater". So, why would such a precarious city develop such a bustling shopping avenue? Why is everyone settling in with a peace of mind...? We checked past records about Wuling and arrive at these verified findings — The Viceroy Tianshi Zhuang Fangyi has exceptional administrative skills. Ever since the founding of Wuling, she wholly focused on providing living amenities, education, and business opportunities. Her comprehensive ideas and approach are most admirable. Of course, I am not downplaying the contributions of the Wulingers... According to verifiable data we have, Tianshi Zhuang always came up with the most applicable development plans for special focuses that require them most. These efforts include the adding new bamboo raft stops, or introducing new Chubby Lung designs for Fangxing Avenue... I believe every Wulinger (though this claim appears exaggerated, it is not) has placed their trust in her for the city to reach its present day level of development. You yourself read the memos of the traveling merchant or the proprietor... Everyone inside and outside the city believes that the shopping avenue is heading up. A commercial wonder in a precipitous place. I believe this is the impression that people get when they first visit Fangxing Avenue.

content.cn: 您自可静静体会，这座城也有您留下的痕迹，我想大家也会以您为荣的。
content.en: Experience this place at your own leisure. You have left quite a mark on Wuling, and I am sure everyone is honored to be in your presence.

title.cn: 有关武陵商业街的调查报告

content.cn: 管理员，我们已经收到了您上传的资料。
content.en: Endministrator, we received the data you have uploaded.

content.cn: 武陵的竹子可是赫赫有名的！
content.en: The bamboo of Wuling is incredibly famous!

content.cn: 嗯？好像没在说竹子……抱歉……这就为您解答武陵交通规划的问题。
content.en: Ah! The topic is about something else... Apologies... I'll now answer your inquiries about transportation in Wuling.

content.cn: 单从您发回的资料来看，毫无疑问，无论是迷踪林资料中出现的“迷路”字样，还是留信者展示出的，明显被竹林伤害到了的精神状态……这些说法是有点夸张的。
content.en: From the data you sent us, writings that mention becoming "lost" or other overt signs of psychological trauma exhibited by travelers in the Stragglers Grove are ... undoubtedly exaggerated.

content.cn: 按照资料库中的记载，我们可以从武陵的交通设计方针中提炼出两个特点——自然与有序。“自然”，顾名思义，道路也好，竹筏站点也罢，甚至您资料中，那位巡林员提到的蟠兽巢穴也算在内……我想您能够发现，景玉谷内部极少出现生硬地人造建筑，但它依旧通行无阻。
content.en: According to existing data in the database, we can identify two key features in the design of transportation in Wuling — nature and order. "Nature" literally refers to lack of abrupt, artificial structures in Jingyu Valley, and that includes roads, bamboo raft stops, and even the pantailbeast lair mentioned by the forest ranger indicated by the data you found. However, Jingyu Valley remains a rather accessible place.

content.cn: 至于“有序”，这恐怕用言语很难表述，实际上，我建议您亲身体会，例如乘坐竹筏环游一番景玉谷，又或者试试咱们终末地的滑索？届时您会发现，武陵人在最小程度破坏自然环境的情况下，将景玉谷整个串联了起来，这需要极高深的规划水平。
content.en: "Order", on the other hand, might be a little hard to describe. I encourage you to explore and experience the area in person. Taking a raft ride through Jingyu Valley might be a start. How about using our Endfield ziplines? You will discover that the Wulingers have established a decent transport network throughout Jingyu Valley with minimal disruption to the natural landscape. Such an achievement requires incredible skills in area planning.

content.cn: 或许是炎国源远流长的风水知识，在塔卫二这颗异星上开放出了崭新花朵？如果有机会，您可以试着寻找一下有没有更多的资料。
content.en: Perhaps the well-established Yanese tradition of fengshui produced new blossoms in the distant world of Talos-II? Try looking for additional information, if the opportunity presents itself.

content.cn: 在那遥远的开拓地带，有一群名叫“裂地者”的暴徒，他们无恶不作，他们残暴凶狠。
content.en: Merciless, cruel, and vicious raiders known as the Landbreakers roam in the frontierlands miles away from civilization.

content.cn: 生活在此地的每个孩童都曾听过这样一句话——“再不听话就把你送给裂地者！”
content.en: Every nomad and frontiersmate grew up with these words: "You best listen or we'll give you to the LBs!"

content.cn: 约翰家的小恰克也不例外。
content.en: Little Chuck from the Jones family was no exception.

content.cn: 这天，小恰克像平时一样赶着驮兽去集市，费尽口舌才用这个月采到的野菜换来了一袋小麦。回程时已近黄昏，为了早点到家，他选了一条平时不怎么走的小路。就在他走到半路时，忽然听见不远处传来奇怪的叫喊声，他连忙牵着驮兽躲在了一块<@qu.key>大石头后面</>。
content.en: As usual, Little Chuck went to the bazaar with his burdenbeast and spent a good part of the day haggling just to trade a month's worth of foraged herbs for a small bag of wheat. The sun was sinking down the horizon when he prepared to head home. Little Chuck chose an unfamiliar shortcut to make it back in time but heard strange howling and shouts halfway down the road. He quickly led his burdenbeast <@qu.key>behind a large rock</> and hid there.

content.cn: 果然是一群裂地者！
content.en: They turned out to be Landbreakers!

content.cn: 小恰克不禁一阵后怕，继续缩在石头后默默观察着这些打扮怪异的暴徒，看着他们用一种几乎看不出颜色的“颜料”在一块石头上涂来涂去，涂来涂去……
content.en: Little Chuck was terrified. Silently he studied these gaudily dressed Landbreakers from behind his rock. The raiders gathered around another piece of rock and started painting it with a colorless and transparent substance.

content.cn: 就在小恰克以为他们要涂到夜幕降临的时候，这些裂地者突然停了下来，拿出铲子在石头前挖了个大洞！
content.en: Little Chuck thought they would keep doing this till night time when the Landbreakers suddenly stopped. They took out their shovels and dug a huge pit before the rock.

content.cn: 然后他们就把一大堆小恰克从没见过的好东西全都埋了进去。
content.en: They buried all sorts of treasures and loot that Little Chuck had never seen before.

content.cn: 小恰克心想，这难道就是他们藏宝贝的方式吗？
content.en: "Is this how they hide their loot?" Little Chuck thought to himself.

content.cn: “没裁员！都说了不要听那些风言风语。你照顾好老爸，我最快下周就回去了。”
content.en: "No! No one got fired! Ignore the gossip and rumors! You take good care of Papa. I'll be back next week if everything works out."

content.cn: “嗯，不辛苦，你更辛苦一点。”
content.en: "Hrnngh. No. I'm okay. You're working harder than me."

content.cn: “一个月吧，下个月我肯定还上，行吗？杰森，咱们这么多年的哥们儿，我什么时候骗过你？”
content.en: Jason, my friend! Come on. Just give me one more month. You'll definitely get your money! We're like the best buddies, right? When did I ever lie to you?

content.cn: “上次……上次是特殊情况嘛！后面我不是都还上了？”
content.en: "Last time...? Hey, hey, partner! Last time was a special case. And I paid you back in the end, right?"

content.cn: “没有拆东墙补西墙啊！唉，我这会儿在开车，不好说话，但你相信我，我肯定——”
content.en: "No, I wasn't borrowing from someone else to pay you back! Look, I'm driving and can't really talk to you right now. Trust me, partner—"

content.cn: “总之先借我一笔填账，医院那边等不得。利息你说了算，真的，哥们儿真不骗你。”
content.en: "Just get me a bit of dough. The hospital can't wait. Just name your interest. Your boy Alex never lied to you, right?"

"Allo?"

content.cn: “对，我接，我去给你接着谈这个单子。你直接说怎么办。……埃里克松商贸？……我什么时候沦落到跟这种人坐一桌吃饭了？”
content.en: "Da. Okay. Got it. I'll negotiate this order for you. Just give me the details ... Erikssohn Trading House...? What? ...These small-timers are actually my competition?"

content.cn: “不是不是，哎，哥，我真没有挑三拣四。他们跟一家啥公司搭上了？终末地？原来你们……咱们公司第一轮就被淘汰了啊。”
content.en: "Oh, no. Don't misunderstand, partner. I'm not being picky. Wait. What you mean? They're partnering with someone else? Endfield? So you ... I mean, they dropped us in round one?"

content.cn: “得看终末地跟埃里克松谈到什么程度了。他们要签合同了？……行，我准备准备就过去那边。”
content.en: "Depends on how far the Endfield-Erikssohn negotiations went... They're signing a contract already...? Sure. I'll get my things together and head right over."

content.cn: “门德斯那些人呢？他们派过来的是汉斯？他才不是什么业务员——他就是个打手！”
content.en: "What about Mendez? They're sending Hans? No, Hans is no negotiator — the guy is a merc!"

content.cn: “我、我当然不会暴露他们啊，别怀疑我的专业程度。不就是吓吓那小子吗？”
content.en: "Me? Expose them? Partner, I'm a true professional. We just need to scare the youngling a little."

content.cn: “这里前不久前还一片混乱，没人会怀疑到他们头上的。”
content.en: "The frontier is filled with breakers and scum. No one would suspect anything else."

content.cn: “嗯，谈下来了，你就帮我去跟上头说点好话……就是，这么多年老员工的情面……是吧？嗯。”
content.en: "Alright. It's settled. Just push a few kind words to the boss for me... I've worked for many years, right...? Hmm?"

content.cn: “……佣金不是说好的二八分？怎么变成你八我二了？！”
content.en: "...I thought we're splitting the commission 20-80. I was the one getting the 80, not you!"

content.cn: “什么写在纸上了，你给我那张契约根本不是这么写的！副本就在我副驾驶箱里呢，你别挂电话，你等着，我找给你看——”
content.en: "Printed and signed? That's not what your contract said! I got a copy of it right in my glove box. Suck-a-blight! Stay on the line! I'll show you —"

content.cn:
伪装成埃里克松商贸的员工与终末地接触,意图抢走订单,来者不善。据说被揭穿后变成明抢了……
实际上其人早已被公司开除。做出这一系列举动的原因是家中变故,急需中转资金。
经过调查,发现是与汉斯合伙抢劫和陷害哈特曼,有诸多不法行为。
事情败露后,有悔改之意。
content.en:
Aleksandr masqueraded as an Erikssohn Trading House employee to hijack their contract negotiations with Endfield. When we saw through his disguise, he revealed his actual company (Clavis) and negotiated on behalf of the latter. 
However, Aleksandr has already been laid off by Clavis. His desperate need for funds to provide for his family was the reason behind his willingness to take part in various illegal actions. 
Further investigations revealed that Aleksandr collaborated with Hans in a scheme to rob Hartmann and set the Erikssohn employee up. 
When the scheme failed, Aleksandr exhibited signs of remorse and guilt.

content.cn: 近日，本刊记者在位于文明环带边缘的四号谷地进行了实地调查，通过走访这里的工团工作人员与普通民众，了解了他们在四号谷地的饮食、居住和就医情况。……不少公司在这里都有外派人员，在本地的侵蚀灾害爆发后，大部分人员都参与到了救援工作中。其中，一家名为“终末地工业”的公司在处理相关危机时显得尤为专业。据消息人士透露，该公司的外派干员大多都是具备丰富实战经验的行业精英，非常擅长在极端危险的环境下处理各类难题。截至目前（本篇报道的撰稿时间），这些来自终末地工业的“问题处理专家”已经帮助四号谷地的人们解决了侵蚀灾害带来的大大小小十余次纠纷与危机。……可以说，该地区在灾后能够如此稳定且高效地展开重建工作，终末地工业功不可没。——以上就是本刊特派记者关于四号谷地的全部报道。
content.en: Recently, our correspondent conducted a tour of Valley IV that lies at the fringes of the Civilization Band. Numerous UWST crew mates and frontiersfolk were interviewed to better understand the food, accommodations, and medical amenities available in Valley IV. ...Many companies have resident liaisons and agents operating in the frontier. When a Blight disaster struck this region, most of them joined various forms of search and rescue operations. A company named Endfield Industries demonstrated their effectiveness in handling various disaster-related crises. A reliable source revealed that many field operators of Endfield are veteran combatants and elites of their field, making them incredibly skilled in handling the challenges posed by the extremely hazardous environments. To date (the time when this article is being written), this Endfield "troubleshooting" team has handled and mediated more than a dozen Blight-induced conflicts and emergencies for the residents of Valley IV. ...We can even say that Endfield played an instrumental role in ensuring regional stability as well as the efficiency of post-disaster rebuilding. — And this concludes our Valley IV report from our special correspondent.

content.en: Yulia: Your offer... tempts. But shadows shouldn't negotiate without lanterns. Who are you? What do you really want?

content.cn: ？？？：我们要的东西很明确，二十年前四号谷地那场爆炸发生时的所有通信记录。
content.en: ???: Our demand is precise: every comms log from that explosion in Valley IV twenty years ago.

content.cn: 尤莉娅：你是说……源石大树爆炸时的通信？你们要那个干什么？
content.en: Yulia: You mean ... When the Great Originium Oak exploded? Why?

content.cn: ？？？：这不是你该操心的。
content.en: ???: That's not your question to ask.

content.cn: 尤莉娅：……我已经受够当工具了。告诉我你们的目的，不然免谈。
content.en: Yulia: ...I'm done being a pawn. State your true endgame, or this conversation ends now.

content.cn: 尤莉娅：我说得很清楚了，你们为什么还要纠缠？
content.en: Yulia: I've drawn my line in the sand. Why do you keep scuffing your boots across it?

content.cn: ？？？：因为我们知道你想要什么。你不是想被看见吗？我们可以提供最好的机遇。
content.en: ???: We know your hunger. To be seen - not as a tool, but as the architect. Our stage offers spotlights, not shadows.

content.cn: 尤莉娅：听着，如果只是技术协助，我可以提供。但出卖情报……你把我当成傻子了？
content.en: Yulia: Listen. Technical assistance? That's negotiable. But selling intel? Don't insult my intelligence.

content.cn: ？？？：联盟工团给不了你想要的东西，我们能。
content.en: ???: The UWST can't feed your ambitions. We can, with the resources to match that brilliant mind of yours.

content.cn: 尤莉娅：放屁，你们给不了！我会修改通信协议，别再联系我了！
content.en: Yulia: BS. You can't deliver. Consider this channel terminated. I'm rewriting the protocols myself.
